T02D2510-2:4b-41: rdo rje pho nya ma dang /
T02D2510-2:4b-43: rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi byang phyogs kyi cha la /
T02D2510-2:4b-46: byang phyogs kyi rdo rje nub phyogs kyi cha la /
T02D2510-2:5a-0: rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi shar @5a * //
T02D2510-2:5a-1: phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje rul pa mo dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-2: rdo rje chu srin mo bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:5a-3: de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa me'i mtshams kyi cha la 'jigs ma /
T02D2510-2:5a-6: dbang ldan du dka' bzlog ma bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:5a-7: dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje 'ju ma dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-9: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu'i shar
T02D2510-2:5a-10: phyogs kyi dbus kyi cha la rdo rje h'um mdzad
T02D2510-2:5a-11: / de'i byang phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-12: khro bo rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02D2510-2:5a-13: rdo rje h'um mdzad de nyid kyi lho phyogs kyi cha la khro bo rdo rje chags pa dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-14: khro bo rdo rje legs pa bri'o //
T02D2510-2:5a-15: dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi lho phyogs kyi cha la rin chen h'um mdzad dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-16: de'i shar phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje rin chen dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-17: khro bo rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02D2510-2:5a-18: de nyid kyi nub phyogs kyi cha la khro bo rdo rje dpal dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-19: khro bo rdo rje bzhad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:5a-20: nub phyogs kyi lha'i snam bu'i dbus kyi cha la chos kyi h'um mdzad /
T02D2510-2:5a-21: de'i g-yas phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje chos dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-22: khro bo rdo rje rnon po'o //
T02D2510-2:5a-23: de nyid g-yon phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje rgyu dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-24: khro bo rdo rje srung ba'o //
T02D2510-2:5a-25: de'i byang phyogs kyi lha'i snam bu'i dbus kyi cha la las kyi h'um mdzad /
T02D2510-2:5a-26: de'i g-yas phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje las dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-27: khro bo rdo rje srung ba'o //
T02D2510-2:5a-28: de'i g-yon phyogs kyi cha la khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-29: khro bo rdo rje khu tshur bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:5a-30: phyi'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi me'i mtshams kyi cha la /
T02D2510-2:5a-31: rdo rje bdug pa ma dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-32: 'jigs ma'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:5a-33: bden bral du rdo rje me tog ma dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-34: lha mo dpal mo'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:5a-35: rlung du rdo rje mar me dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-36: dbyangs can ma'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:5a-37: dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi cha la rdo rje dri ma dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-38: dka' bzlog ma'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:5a-39: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje sgo ba ma dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-40: rdo rje dbang mo dag bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:5a-41: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
T02D2510-2:5a-44: las kyi h'um mdzad ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor
T02D2510-2:5a-45: lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2510-2:5a-46: po / 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i chos kyi
T02D2510-2:5b-0: dkyil 'khor las @5b bshad pa'i rig pa rnams kyis
T02D2510-2:5b-1: po / bri bar bya'o // khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
T02D2510-2:5b-2: rdo rje dril bu'i mthar thug pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:5b-3: sgeg mo la sogs pa ni 'jig rten gsum las
T02D2510-2:5b-4: rnam pa rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i
T02D2510-2:5b-5: phyag rgya chen po'i sngags kyis bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:5b-6: rdo rje rig pa mchog la sogs pa nas rdo rje chu srin gyi mthar thug pa ni /
T02D2510-2:5b-7: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:5b-8: du bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i rig pa rnams
T02D2510-2:5b-11: aom sarbba badzra ga mi ni sarbba ba kshe s'a
T02D2510-2:5b-12: dha ya gu hya badzri ni h'um zhes bya ba
T02D2510-2:5b-13: ni / 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi
T02D2510-2:5b-14: dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i ma mo thams cad kyi
T02D2510-2:5b-17: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2510-2:5b-18: khro bo ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2510-2:5b-19: des me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
T02D2510-2:5b-20: rdo rje shugs kyis zhugs la /
T02D2510-2:5b-21: h'um bzhi brjod cing dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas lan bdun bskor ba byas te /
T02D2510-2:5b-22: lhag pa dang ma tshang ba'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:5b-23: rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing blta bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:5b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad la
T02D2510-2:5b-25: me tog gi phreng ba phul nas gar byas te
T02D2510-2:5b-26: blangs la rang gi spyi bor bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:5b-27: de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D2510-2:5b-28: dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i sgo dbye ba'i
T02D2510-2:5b-29: phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo gnyis ka dbye bar
T02D2510-2:5b-30: bya'o // snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02D2510-2:5b-31: aom badzra autgha ta ya sa ma ya pra be
T02D2510-2:5b-32: sha sh'i ghram sma ra badzra sa ma ya h'um
T02D2510-2:5b-33: phat / de nas bum pa gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-2:5b-34: slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs
T02D2510-2:5b-35: kyi mthar thug pa'i rang nyid 'jug pa'i cho ga
T02D2510-2:5b-36: dang / slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho
T02D2510-2:5b-37: ga'i tshul du rjes su spyad pas de nas bdag
T02D2510-2:5b-38: la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa ji lta
T02D2510-2:5b-40: dkyil 'khor rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:5b-41: de nas bsdu ba byas la /
T02D2510-2:5b-42: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:5b-43: chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi
T02D2510-2:5b-44: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2510-2:5b-45: h'um mdzad la bstod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:5b-46: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:6a-0: @6a * // mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:6a-1: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:6a-2: 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las byas nas zhes
T02D2510-2:6a-3: bya ba ni / de la 'jig rten gsum gyi
T02D2510-2:6a-4: 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i khro
T02D2510-2:6a-5: bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas dgug
T02D2510-2:6a-6: bya ba ni / pa'i las ni // de nyid
T02D2510-2:6a-7: dang por byas pa'i dgug pa la sogs pa las
T02D2510-2:6a-8: gang yin pa de byed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:6a-10: ji skad bshad pa'i khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i
T02D2510-2:6a-11: las kyi phyag rgyas rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs
T02D2510-2:6a-13: de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i
T02D2510-2:6a-14: 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i zhags
T02D2510-2:6a-15: pa'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang /
T02D2510-2:6a-16: lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas bcing ba dang /
T02D2510-2:6a-17: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:6a-18: las bshad pa'i khro po rdo rje 'bebs pa'i las
T02D2510-2:6a-19: kyi phyag rgyas dbang du bya'o //
T02D2510-2:6a-20: de nas khro bo rdo rje gnod spyin gyis bgegs bskrad la /
T02D2510-2:6a-21: khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad nas /
T02D2510-2:6a-22: khro bo rdo rje go chas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:6a-23: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis mchod yon phul la /
T02D2510-2:6a-24: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rdo rje h'um
T02D2510-2:6a-25: mdzad la sogs pa thams cad snga ma bzhin du
T02D2510-2:6a-26: bsgrubs la / de nas chos dad las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgya btab ste /
T02D2510-2:6a-27: dbang bskur nas phyi rol gyi mchod pa dang rdo
T02D2510-2:6a-28: rje sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa
T02D2510-2:6a-29: brgyad dang / rdo rje gser la sogs pa las
T02D2510-2:6a-30: kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis las kyi dkyil 'khor thams
T02D2510-2:6a-31: cad yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2510-2:6a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te /
T02D2510-2:6a-33: slob ma gzhug pa'i gnang ba nod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:6a-34: de nas snga ma bzhin du slob ma la phyag bzhi byed du bcug la /
T02D2510-2:6a-35: rdo rje h'um mdzad du byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2510-2:6a-36: rdo rje h'um mdzad yongs su bzlas pa'i phyi rol na gnas pa'i chus dbang bskur ro //
T02D2510-2:6a-37: rdo rje 'chang pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2510-2:6a-38: rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te zhes bya
T02D2510-2:6a-39: ba ni / de ltar dbang bskur nas slob dpon
T02D2510-2:6a-40: rang nyid rdo rje 'chad pa'i sngar bshad pa'i mtshan
T02D2510-2:6b-0: slob ma yang 'ching @6b du gzhug go //
T02D2510-2:6b-2: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra dh'a ra gri hna sa ma ya h'um /
T02D2510-2:6b-3: 'di skad du smros shig / khyod kyis lha'i rigs ma mthong ba dang /
T02D2510-2:6b-4: las mi shes pa su la yang gsang pa'i las
T02D2510-2:6b-5: 'di ma smra shig ces bya ba las mi shes
T02D2510-2:6b-6: pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pas /
T02D2510-2:6b-7: las kyi dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba las mi shes pa zhes brjod do //
T02D2510-2:6b-8: 'dir 'chad par 'gyur pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las
T02D2510-2:6b-9: bshad pa'i gsang ba de thams cad brjod par mi
T02D2510-2:6b-10: bya'o // khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes bya ba ni gzir par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2510-2:6b-11: de nas yon gyi mchog blangs la /
T02D2510-2:6b-12: rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug ste /
T02D2510-2:6b-13: rdo rje slob dpon rang gi las kyi rdo rje
T02D2510-2:6b-14: 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te zhes
T02D2510-2:6b-15: bya ba ni / slob dpon rang nyid kyis las
T02D2510-2:6b-16: kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje 'dzin ma'i dam tshig
T02D2510-2:6b-17: gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te
T02D2510-2:6b-18: bya ba ni / / khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing slob ma la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:6b-19: slob ma 'di skad brjod du gzhug go //
T02D2510-2:6b-20: aom badzra dzirya zhes bya ba la sogs pa des 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:6b-22: bdag nyid kyis 'jug par bya ste /
T02D2510-2:6b-23: rdo rje shugs kyi snying po 'dis 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:6b-24: aom pra be sha badzra pra be sha badzra a'a be sha badzra aa dhi tishtha badzra h'um /
T02D2510-2:6b-25: gal te snga ma'i 'jug pas bya'o zhe na /
T02D2510-2:6b-26: ma yin te dbab pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:6b-27: 'di nyid kyis babs nas 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:6b-28: de nas snga ma bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams kyis dgug pa dang /
T02D2510-2:6b-32: phyag rgya dang ldan gyi phyag rgya rnams kyi gar
T02D2510-2:6b-33: gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-2:6b-34: babs pa'i mthus ma brlabs pa'i slob ma rnams kyang
T02D2510-2:6b-35: rdo rje gser gyi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang /
T02D2510-2:6b-36: de nas de bkrol na rdo rje chu srin gyi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang /
T02D2510-2:6b-37: de bzhin du rdo rje bza' ba ma'i bar gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2510-2:6b-38: de nas de bkrol la rdo rje sgo ba ma'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:6b-39: de ltar na de ni phyag rgya dang lan gyi
T02D2510-2:6b-40: phyag rgya rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa
T02D2510-2:6b-41: yin no // de ltar byas par gyur na des
T02D2510-2:6b-42: ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na deng phyin chad ces
T02D2510-2:7a-1: las thams cad kyi rdo rje gser la sogs pa'i las byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:7a-2: gang rnams kyis byed par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-2:7a-3: lus dang ngag dang lta ba dang yid dang /
T02D2510-2:7a-4: rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyis zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2510-2:7a-5: de la lus kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:7a-6: rdo rje rig pa dam pa la sogs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D2510-2:7a-7: ngag gi phyag rgya ni de dag gi rig pa'o //
T02D2510-2:7a-8: lta pa'i phyag rgya ni khro bo'i lta ba'o //
T02D2510-2:7a-9: yid kyi phyag rgya ni sgom pa'o //
T02D2510-2:7a-10: rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje 'bar ba la sogs pa nas //
T02D2510-2:7a-11: klu'i rdo rje klu'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:7a-12: der 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:7a-13: bsam pa nyid kyis byed pa ste /
T02D2510-2:7a-14: 'di ni phan yon bshad pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:7a-15: de nas yang gdod g-yogs pa bkrol te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:7a-16: de nas dus phyis gdong g-yogs bkrol par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:7a-17: bkrol nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar gyi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:7a-18: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin to //
T02D2510-2:7a-19: de ltar gar bya zhing mchod pa byas na yang /
T02D2510-2:7a-20: de nas slob ma de la slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D2510-2:7a-21: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs su zhugs kyis /
T02D2510-2:7a-22: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:7a-23: pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi grub pa
T02D2510-2:7a-24: yang thob na / dngos grub gzhan lha smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02D2510-2:7a-25: khyod kyis las kyi dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra shig //
T02D2510-2:7a-26: dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
T02D2510-2:7a-27: de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D2510-2:7a-28: khyod kyis lha'i rigs ma mthong ba dang las mi
T02D2510-2:7a-29: shes pa su la yang gsang pa'i las 'di ma
T02D2510-2:7a-30: smra shig khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re
T02D2510-2:7a-31: zhes bya'o // de nas rdo rje slob dpon rang
T02D2510-2:7a-32: nyid rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya kha thur dang
T02D2510-2:7a-33: zhes bya'o // / gyen du bstan pa bcings te /
T02D2510-2:7a-34: slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D2510-2:7a-35: 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig rdo rje yin gyis /
T02D2510-2:7a-36: gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:7a-37: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02D2510-2:7a-38: mna'i chu snying pos sngags la /
T02D2510-2:7a-39: slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go //
T02D2510-2:7a-40: de la mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02D2510-2:7b-0: rdo rje @7b sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D2510-2:7b-1: snying la yang dag zhugs par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:7b-2: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D2510-2:7b-3: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D2510-2:7b-4: aom badzra au ta ka tha zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T02D2510-2:7b-5: de nas slob ma la 'di skad bsgo shig /
T02D2510-2:7b-6: deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje da
T02D2510-2:7b-7: yin gyis ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang
T02D2510-2:7b-8: yin pa de bya dgos so //
T02D2510-2:7b-9: khyod kyis da la brnyas pa ma byed cig /
T02D2510-2:7b-10: mi bde pa ma spangs pas dus byas nas dmyal
T02D2510-2:7b-11: par ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la /
T02D2510-2:7b-12: 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob la /
T02D2510-2:7b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig ces smros shig ces bsgo'o //
T02D2510-2:7b-14: de nas de rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D2510-2:7b-15: badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis dbab pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:7b-16: de nas me tog dor ro //
T02D2510-2:7b-18: aom pra t'i tstsha aa dhi tishtha badzra ho //
T02D2510-2:7b-19: de nas me tog gi phreng ba blangs la spyi bor bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:7b-21: aom pra ti grihna satvam mi mam sa tva ma h'a ba la /
T02D2510-2:7b-22: de nas de bzhin du gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //
T02D2510-2:7b-24: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis //
T02D2510-2:7b-25: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //

T02D2510-2:10b-5: bzung ste snying po byang chub la mthar thug gi

T02D2510-2:10b-7: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu gzhag ste zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:10b-8: phyir mi ldog pa rnams bla na med pa yang

T02D2510-2:10b-11: 'khor ba'i lam la mi 'jug cing mi ldog pa

T02D2510-2:10b-20: mkhyen bzhin du zhes bya ba ni //

T02D2510-2:10b-31: phyir // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba de gang lags //
T02D2510-2:10b-32: bka' stsol cig ces pa ste /

T02D2510-2:10b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba de'i

T02D2510-2:11a-9: rang gi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i ngo bo ni rang bzhin te /

T02D2510-2:11a-12: 'dod chags spyod pa la sogs pa gang yin pa

T02D2510-2:11a-21: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i spyod pa bstan pa de dang des /
T02D2510-2:11a-22: de lta de ltar sems can gyi don byas pas /
T02D2510-2:11a-23: sems can mngon par 'dod pa'i don yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:11a-25: 'dod chags la sogs gtsang bas bya //

T02D2510-2:11a-38: thugs rje gzhan gyi dbang gis phan pa dang bde

T02D2510-2:11a-41: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //

T02D2510-2:11b-0: de'i don @11b la sbyor bas sangs rgyas kyi don
T02D2510-2:11b-1: du rab tu sbyor ba de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2510-2:11b-2: 'bras bu la rab tu sbyor ba ni /
T02D2510-2:11b-3: sangs rgyas kyi don du sbyor ba'o //

T02D2510-2:11b-13: chos bdag med pa'i chags pa yis //
T02D2510-2:11b-14: mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bar byed //
T02D2510-2:11b-16: 'dra ba ni mtshungs pa ste bde ba gzhan na med pa'o //

T02D2510-2:11b-18: rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la de phul
T02D2510-2:11b-19: bar bsgom pa'i stobs kyis mngon sum du byas pa'o
T02D2510-2:11b-20: // sems can gyi phyir sems can thams cad la

T02D2510-2:11b-22: // rgyu'i phyir ro // gzhan gyi chung ma ni gzhan gyi bud med do //
T02D2510-2:11b-23: gzhan gyi bud med mchog tu gyur pa ni phyag

T02D2510-2:11b-28: de la bsod nams zhes bya ba ni dag byed
T02D2510-2:11b-29: kyi bsod nams te gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dri
T02D2510-2:11b-30: ma 'khrud par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2510-2:11b-31: // de yang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam
T02D2510-2:11b-32: par dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di
T02D2510-2:11b-34: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //

T02D2510-2:11b-41: sor rtog pa dang nan tan du byed pa'i brtson
T02D2510-2:11b-42: 'grus kyi rang bzhin rnam pa bzhi'i brtson 'grus kyi

T02D2510-2:12a-0: shin tu phul du byung bar 'gyur ba nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pa'i bsod @12a * //
T02D2510-2:12a-1: nams bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid thob cing rnyed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:12a-2: yang na srog bcad pa dang ma byin par len
T02D2510-2:12a-3: pa rnams ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs gzhan
T02D2510-2:12a-4: du gsungs pa ltar bshad par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:12a-5: de la byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid rtogs

T02D2510-2:12a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams su rgyal ba'i sras su
T02D2510-2:12a-11: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi
T02D2510-2:12a-12: sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa'i
T02D2510-2:12a-14: pha rol nor rnams phrogs pa ste //
T02D2510-2:12a-15: nyon mongs sems can nor zhes bshad //
T02D2510-2:12a-17: nyon mongs 'jig rten khams rnams kyi //
T02D2510-2:12a-18: dbang byas khro bo cher sprul nas //
T02D2510-2:12a-19: blo ldan rdo rje mgon po yis //
T02D2510-2:12a-20: rtogs pa'i rgyal po 'di gsungs so //
T02D2510-2:12a-21: sems can khro ba rab grub phyir //
T02D2510-2:12a-22: dri ma med pa'i de nyid ni //
T02D2510-2:12a-23: snang byed dge ba 'di bshad las //
T02D2510-2:12a-24: bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags pa //
T02D2510-2:12a-25: de yis 'jig rten ma lus pa //
T02D2510-2:12a-26: rdo rje khro chen kun dga' che //
T02D2510-2:12a-27: snying po bsam mi khyab chen gtso //
T02D2510-2:12a-28: rdo rje h'um mdzad gtso gyur cig / de kho
T02D2510-2:12a-29: na nyid snang ba zhes bya ba las phyi rol
T02D2510-2:12a-30: gyi rdo rje rigs kyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2510-2:12a-32: // / de ltar khro bas khro ba spang ba'i phyir //
T02D2510-2:12a-33: gnang ba nod pas de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i rdo
T02D2510-2:12a-34: rje'i rigs chen po dang phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs des

T02D2510-2:12a-37: da ni gti mug gi gnyen por gyur pa shes

T02D2510-2:12a-39: rgya gtso bor gyur pa'i padma'i rigs des 'dul ba'i
T02D2510-2:12a-40: sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:12a-41: de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
T02D2510-2:12a-42: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni /
T02D2510-2:12a-43: de ma thag pa ste dang por sbyor ba'i ting
T02D2510-2:12a-44: nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i tha

T02D2510-2:12a-46: rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i dang por sbyor ba'i
T02D2510-2:12a-47: ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs su rdo rje sems
T02D2510-2:12a-48: dpa' dang / rdo rje snying po dang /
T02D2510-2:12b-0: padma'i rigs kyi @12b bdag po rdo rje spyan dang /
T02D2510-2:12b-1: rdo rje spyan gnyis pa rdo rje sna tshogs sprul pas bsnan pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:12b-2: de ltar yang ji ltar shes she na /
T02D2510-2:12b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
T02D2510-2:12b-5: gzigs kyi dbang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-2:12b-6: kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas /
T02D2510-2:12b-7: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa gal ba der mngon du phyogs te 'dug nas /
T02D2510-2:12b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rjes thogs la phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D2510-2:12b-11: rdo rje sna tshogs su byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2510-2:12b-12: de nas des byin gyis brlabs pas de thams cad tha dad par gyur to //
T02D2510-2:12b-13: thams cad kyi gzugs ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02D2510-2:12b-14: padma'i rigs sprul par mdzad do zhes de ma thag tu 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:12b-15: thams cad kyang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang
T02D2510-2:12b-16: de yin pa sa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2510-2:12b-17: cad de / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
T02D2510-2:12b-18: rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2510-2:12b-19: cad de / dang / mi bskyod pa dang /

T02D2510-2:12b-26: gsol ba btab pa yin la /

T02D2510-2:12b-28: 'du zhing chogs par mdzad pa de ni gcig tu 'dus pa'o //
T02D2510-2:12b-29: bcom ldan 'das ni bdud bzhi las rgyal ba'o //
T02D2510-2:12b-30: phyag na rdo rje de nyid ces bya ba ni /

T02D2510-2:12b-33: chen po'o // chos thams cad kyi bdag po ni
T02D2510-2:12b-34: chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang de yin pas
T02D2510-2:12b-35: chos thams cad de padma'i rigs kyi gzugs can gyi
T02D2510-2:12b-37: de'i bdag po ni mnga' bdag ste /
T02D2510-2:12b-38: thams cad byed pas na chos kyi dbang phyug go //
T02D2510-2:13a-0: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis @13a * //
T02D2510-2:13a-1: rnam par dag pa'o zhes so sor rtog pa dang /
T02D2510-2:13a-2: sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa la gzigs pas na spyan ras gzigs so //
T02D2510-2:13a-3: de la dbang po ni spyan ras gzigs kyi mnga'
T02D2510-2:13a-4: bdag yin pas na spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug
T02D2510-2:13a-5: go // 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba de blo la gnas pa'o //
T02D2510-2:13a-6: de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa des gsol ba btab pa ni don du gnyer ba'o //
T02D2510-2:13a-8: rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid spyan ras gzigs
T02D2510-2:13a-9: kyi dbang po'i gzugs 'dzin pa la de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:13a-10: pa thams cad kyi padma'i rigs sprul pa'i phyir mtshan
T02D2510-2:13a-11: brgya rtsa brgyad pas gsol ba 'debs pa yin gyis
T02D2510-2:13a-12: la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin
T02D2510-2:13a-13: no // padmo zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D2510-2:13a-14: sems dpa' ni padma'i sems dpa'o //
T02D2510-2:13a-15: padma chen zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam
T02D2510-2:13a-16: par dag pa'i gzugs des thams cad du song bas
T02D2510-2:13a-18: 'jig rten dbang po zhes pa ni 'jig rten dbang
T02D2510-2:13a-19: phyug gi gzugs kyis bzhugs pa de'i 'jig rten dbang
T02D2510-2:13a-20: po'o // dbang phyug che zhes bya ba ni dbang
T02D2510-2:13a-21: phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba rnams la don

T02D2510-2:13a-23: po'o // phyug chen po'o // spyan ras gzigs dbang po zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:13a-24: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o
T02D2510-2:13a-25: zhes gzigs pa dang sems can la gzigs pa 'di
T02D2510-2:13a-26: la mnga' bas na de ni 'dir spyan ras gzigs
T02D2510-2:13a-28: brtan pa'i mchog ces bya ba ni //
T02D2510-2:13a-29: brtan pa ni 'jigs pa med pa'o //
T02D2510-2:13a-30: de dag gi mchog ni shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D2510-2:13a-31: tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin gyis
T02D2510-2:13a-32: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa skrag
T02D2510-2:13a-33: pa dang rtag tu bral ba'i phyir ro //

T02D2510-2:13a-35: de'i chos ni gzugs sna tshogs bstan nas /

T02D2510-2:13a-37: rdo rje chos ni rdo rje chos so //
T02D2510-2:13a-38: yang na rdo rje dang chos ni rdo rje chos te /
T02D2510-2:13a-39: stong pa nyid ni gzugs so //
T02D2510-2:13a-40: gzugs nyid ni stong pa'o zhes gsungs te bdun no //
T02D2510-2:13b-0: chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba @13b ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes ni chos so //

T02D2510-2:13b-2: rgyal po ltar gsal bar byed pas na chos kyi
T02D2510-2:13b-3: rgyal po'o // dag pa chen po zhes bya ba
T02D2510-2:13b-4: ni de nyid kyis nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i le
T02D2510-2:13b-5: shes kyi gzugs kyis thams cad du song ba'i phyir
T02D2510-2:13b-6: dang bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs
T02D2510-2:13b-7: rgyal po'o // pa'i phyir / dag pa yang yin
T02D2510-2:13b-8: la chen po yang yin pas na dag pa chen
T02D2510-2:13b-9: rgyal po'o // pa'i phyir / po'o // sems dpa'i

T02D2510-2:25b-11: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02D2510-2:25b-12: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2510-2:25b-13: nam du yang ni mi spong ngo //
T02D2510-2:25b-14: rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D2510-2:25b-15: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang //
T02D2510-2:25b-16: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2510-2:25b-17: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2510-2:25b-18: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2510-2:25b-19: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D2510-2:25b-20: nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02D2510-2:25b-21: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin //
T02D2510-2:25b-22: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02D2510-2:25b-23: padma'i rigs mchog dag pa la /
T02D2510-2:25b-24: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02D2510-2:25b-25: dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2510-2:25b-26: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D2510-2:25b-27: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02D2510-2:25b-28: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2510-2:25b-29: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D2510-2:25b-30: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D2510-2:25b-31: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas //
T02D2510-2:25b-32: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2510-2:25b-33: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02D2510-2:25b-34: ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi //

T02D2510-2:25b-37: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //

T02D2510-2:26a-0: aom sarbba aa pa ya a'a ka rsha na bi sho dha @26a * //
T02D2510-2:26a-1: ne badzras ma ya h'um phat /

T02D2510-2:26a-3: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis nang du //
T02D2510-2:26a-4: mdzub mo gnyis ni bcings nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:26a-5: legs par gyen du 'phangs pa ni //
T02D2510-2:26a-6: ltung ba slong ba'i dam pa'o //
T02D2510-2:26a-7: zhes bya ba ba'i phyag rgyas ngan song rnams bkug la /
T02D2510-2:26a-8: de nas de rnams la gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba sbyin no //
T02D2510-2:26a-10: ji srid snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /

T02D2510-2:26a-15: aom badzra p'a ni bi spo ta ya sarbba aa pa ya /
T02D2510-2:26a-16: bandha ni pra mo ksha ya /
T02D2510-2:26a-17: sarbba aa pa ya ga te bhya sarbba satva ta
T02D2510-2:26a-18: th'a ga ta bha ba ta badzra sa ma ya
T02D2510-2:26a-20: rdo rje bcings pa dam bcas te //
T02D2510-2:26a-21: gung mo gnyis ka sbyar nas ni //
T02D2510-2:26a-22: tha ma bzhi yi rtse mo sbyar //
T02D2510-2:26a-23: sdig pa 'joms par grags pa yin //
T02D2510-2:26a-24: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /

T02D2510-2:26a-26: sarbba shuddho zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:26a-27: sngags de lan gsum brjod cing badzra mu: zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi snying gar gzhug par bya'o ;
T02D2510-2:26a-28: ; de'i tshe aom h'um hr'i:ho: zhes bya ba'i snying
T02D2510-2:26a-29: po rang gi snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i
T02D2510-2:26a-30: padma'i steng du bsam par bya zhing /

T02D2510-2:26a-32: de'i snying po yang yid kyis brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:26a-33: de nas snying po de nyid dbyangs yig bcu drug
T02D2510-2:26a-34: dang bcas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par

T02D2510-2:26a-37: ksha'i mthar thug pa dang bcas pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis par bsam mo //
T02D2510-2:26a-38: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de nyid bshad ma

T02D2510-2:26a-40: rtse lnga pa snying po de nyid brjod pas rdo
T02D2510-2:26a-41: rje de bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba sna
T02D2510-2:26a-43: de nas de'i dbus su snying po bkod la bi
T02D2510-2:26a-44: shva padma aa ham zhes phyag rgya'i nga rgyal bskyed
T02D2510-2:26b-0: @26b par bya'o // bsgoms la / badzra sa tva aa ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:26b-1: de nas bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor zhing 'di skad brjod do //
T02D2510-2:26b-2: badzra satva aa ham zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2510-2:26b-3: aom h'um hr'i:ho:dza gad bi na ya aa ham zhes brjod la /
T02D2510-2:26b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' de 'gro ba 'dul ba'i bdag nyid du bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:26b-5: ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa ham zhes brjod do //
T02D2510-2:26b-6: de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2510-2:26b-7: sa ma ya aa ham zhes bya'o //
T02D2510-2:26b-8: dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis snying ga dang dpral ba dang ;
T02D2510-2:26b-10: spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:26b-11: sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtra sva m'am zhes bya'o //
T02D2510-2:26b-12: de nas sna tshogs padma 'dzin pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2510-2:26b-14: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams 'gro ba 'dul ba'i bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o ;

T02D2510-2:26b-16: padma'i rgyu'i phyag rgyas stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2510-2:26b-17: zhing gi tshad dang mnyam pa'i 'gro ba 'dul pa'i
T02D2510-2:26b-18: dkyil 'khor chen por sprul la rigs kyi dam tshig
T02D2510-2:26b-20: me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
T02D2510-2:26b-21: ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs nas rang gi spyi
T02D2510-2:26b-22: bor me tog gi phreng ba dor te bcing bar
T02D2510-2:26b-23: byas na / dngos grub kyi padma brtul zhugs kyi
T02D2510-2:26b-24: bar du spyad la dkyil 'khor de mngon sum du
T02D2510-2:26b-25: gyur pa lta bur bsgom par bya'o //

T02D2510-2:26b-27: rang gi lus la lha thams cad kyi gnas rnams su yi ge hr'i:las padma'i gdan bskyed la /
T02D2510-2:26b-28: yang de rnams la sa ma ya aa /
T02D2510-2:26b-29: zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
T02D2510-2:26b-30: yid kyis rang gi lus kyi gnas su 'dug la /
T02D2510-2:26b-31: rang gi lus las phyi rol gyi mdun du /
T02D2510-2:26b-33: zhes bya ba 'dis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D2510-2:26b-34: du bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sna tshogs
T02D2510-2:26b-35: padma sprul la padmo aa ham zhes pa padmo aa
T02D2510-2:26b-36: ham zhes pa padmo'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:26b-37: de nas dza gad bi na ya aa ham zhe
T02D2510-2:26b-38: bya bas 'gro ba 'dul bar bdag nyid bsam sa
T02D2510-2:27a-0: la / de nyid la rta mgrin la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag @27a * //
T02D2510-2:27a-1: rgya rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das dgug pa dang /
T02D2510-2:27a-3: bcing ba dang dbang du bya'o //
T02D2510-2:27a-4: aom h'um hr'i:ho:dri shya zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2510-2:27a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bltas te /
T02D2510-2:27a-7: zhes brjod pa de nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi gnas su gnas pa la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:27a-8: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsgoms la /

T02D2510-2:27a-10: aom h'um hr'i:ho: zhes brjod pas bcom ldan 'das la zhugs pa dang /

T02D2510-2:27a-13: rgya chen po bcings la yid kyis rang gi lus
T02D2510-2:27a-15: rang gi lus las phyi rol gyi mdun du padma
T02D2510-2:27a-16: 'bebs pa'i yi ge aa'i mtha' can gyi sngags kyis
T02D2510-2:27a-17: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du padma'i dril bu
T02D2510-2:27a-18: bskyed la padmo ghanta aa ham /
T02D2510-2:27a-19: zhes padma'i dril bu'i nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D2510-2:27a-20: padma a'a be sha aa ham /

T02D2510-2:27a-28: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02D2510-2:27a-29: dza:h'um bam ho: zhes brjod pas rang gi lus la bcug la /
T02D2510-2:27a-30: sa ma ya stvam zhes bya bas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbab pa dang /
T02D2510-2:27a-31: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02D2510-2:27a-32: zhes pa dang sngags brjod pas padma 'bebs pa dang ;
T02D2510-2:27a-33: bdag nyid lhan cig tu gyur par bsam par bya'o //

T02D2510-2:27b-3: 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs pa nas /

T02D2510-2:27b-5: gi phyag rgyas rang gi lus kyi snying ga dang

T02D2510-2:27b-20: gshegs pa rnams la dbang bskur la 'gro ba 'dul
T02D2510-2:27b-22: padma 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du /

T02D2510-2:27b-24: pa'i rdo rje chos ma'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar

T02D2510-2:27b-26: bdag po'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2510-2:27b-27: ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /

T02D2510-2:27b-30: padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i

T02D2510-2:27b-38: dang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsgom

T02D2510-2:28b-3: dkyil 'khor chen po rgyal mchog dang /

T02D2510-2:28b-13: shin tu dkar ba'i gos bsgo zhing /

T02D2510-2:28b-25: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02D2510-2:28b-26: de nas snying po gsum brjod cing //

T02D2510-2:31a-35: kha dog dkar po dri zhim par srad bu mngon

T02D2510-2:31a-37: phyag rgya chen po bcings te aom h'um hr'i: ho:
T02D2510-2:31a-38: zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi snying ga'i padma las
T02D2510-2:31a-39: grub pa'i grogs po padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi
T02D2510-2:31a-41: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis srad bu de bzung ste /
T02D2510-2:31a-42: dza: zhes bya bas bsgrub pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu srad bu de gtad la /
T02D2510-2:31a-43: phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom zhing shar phyogs su bltas te /
T02D2510-2:31b-0: tshangs @31b pa'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:31b-1: dza: dza: dza: zhes bya ba bsgrub pa'i grogs pos
T02D2510-2:31b-2: yi ge dza: gsum gyis thig skud drang bar bya'o
T02D2510-2:31b-3: // yang slob dpon lho ru 'dug la byang du bltas te /
T02D2510-2:31b-4: tshangs pa'i thig gnyis pa gdab par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:31b-5: de nas me'i char gnas la byang phyogs su bltas
T02D2510-2:31b-6: te phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi thig gdab bo
T02D2510-2:31b-7: // rlung gi phyogs su gnas la lho phyogs su bltas te nub kyi thig gdab bo //
T02D2510-2:31b-8: de nyid du 'dug ste shar du bltas nas byang gi phyogs kyi thig gdab bo //
T02D2510-2:31b-9: yang me'i mtshams su 'dug ste nub tu bltas la lho phyogs kyi thig gdab bo //
T02D2510-2:31b-10: de bzhin du lha'i snam bu dang /
T02D2510-2:31b-11: kha khyer gyi thig kyang gdab par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:31b-12: yang me'i mtshams su gnas te rlung gi phyogs kyi mtshams kyi bar du thig gdab pa dang /
T02D2510-2:31b-13: yang bden bral gyi mtshams su gnas te /
T02D2510-2:31b-14: dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi bar du thig gdab pa dang /
T02D2510-2:31b-16: rta babs kyi thig kyang btab la de'i nang du
T02D2510-2:31b-17: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed
T02D2510-2:31b-18: kyi tshad la zur bzhi pa'i ri mo gnyis pa
T02D2510-2:31b-19: ni sgo la mngon par phyogs par thig gdab par
T02D2510-2:31b-20: bya'o // ri mo gnyis pa'i dbus su padma'i phreng ba bris la /
T02D2510-2:31b-21: ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa'i cha gsum mnyam par thig btab nas /
T02D2510-2:31b-22: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i thig ni gdab par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:31b-23: de la re zhig srad bu'i sngags ni /
T02D2510-2:31b-24: aom badzra sa ma ya sv'a tram m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02D2510-2:31b-25: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2510-2:31b-27: g-yon par yi ge hr'i: las nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
T02D2510-2:31b-28: khro bo'i lta bas kun nas bltas pas sgo rnams dbye'o //
T02D2510-2:31b-29: slob dpon dang bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog bsgyings pa'i tshul
T02D2510-2:31b-30: gyis bskor phyogs su 'gro bar bya ba ni thig
T02D2510-2:31b-31: gi cho ga'o // de nas tshon rtsi byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D2510-2:31b-32: de la tshon dkar po la yi ge aom las rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po /
T02D2510-2:31b-33: tshon sngon po la yi ge h'um las mi bskyod
T02D2510-2:31b-34: pa sku mdog mthing ga / tshon ser po la
T02D2510-2:31b-35: yi ge tr'am las rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog
T02D2510-2:31b-36: ser po / tshon dmar po la yi ge hr'i:
T02D2510-2:31b-37: las 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog dmar po
T02D2510-2:31b-38: ser po / / tshon ljang gu la yi ge
T02D2510-2:31b-39: aa las don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang gur
T02D2510-2:31b-40: ser po / / bskyed la / aom badzra tsi
T02D2510-2:31b-41: tra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba 'di phyag
T02D2510-2:31b-42: rgya dang ldan pas re re la yang lan bdun
T02D2510-2:32a-2: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis las ni //
T02D2510-2:32a-3: mdzub mo'i rtse mo mnyam sbyar ba //
T02D2510-2:32a-4: byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad ni //
T02D2510-2:32a-5: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya //
T02D2510-2:32a-6: yi ge hi zhes bya ba mthar sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:32a-7: de nas aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um
T02D2510-2:32a-8: zhes bya ba'i snying po dang dbang ldan gyi phyogs
T02D2510-2:32a-9: nas brtsams te / g-yas nas bskor ba'i rim pas
T02D2510-2:32a-10: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis tshon rtsi thog
T02D2510-2:32a-11: mar bkye la phyi ma ni rdo rje khu tshur
T02D2510-2:32a-12: nas brtsams te / med kyang bya'o // rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2510-2:32a-17: thams cad kyi nang du dkar po bya'o //
T02D2510-2:32a-18: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02D2510-2:32a-19: nang gi dkyil 'khor ni zur bzhi bsnol ba'i ri mo gnyis pa bris la /
T02D2510-2:32a-20: ri mo gnyis pa'i dbus su padma'i phreng ba bris la /
T02D2510-2:32a-21: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa lta bu'i ka ba brgyad pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:32a-22: padma de'i ge sar gyi dbus su /
T02D2510-2:32a-23: seng ge dang padma'i gdan la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:32a-24: la bzhugs pa rnam par snang mdzad sngar bshad pa'i
T02D2510-2:32a-26: de'i phyogs rnams su padma dang zla ba'i gdan la phyag rgya bzhi bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:32a-27: de ltar 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs pa yang zla ba dang padma'i gdan la bri ba dang /
T02D2510-2:32a-28: bskal pa bzang po rnams kyang sngar bshad pa'i rim pas phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams rnams su /
T02D2510-2:32a-29: byams pa la sogs pa'i bskal pa bzang po stong du bzhis mtshang ba padma dang /
T02D2510-2:32a-30: zla ba'i gdan la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:32a-31: shar phyogs la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su mnyam pa'i rim pa bzhin du bya'o ;
T02D2510-2:32a-32: / de nas shar gyi snam bu la /
T02D2510-2:32a-33: sangs rgyas padma bzhin du padma'i rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2510-2:32a-34: lho phyogs kyi snam bu la rdo rje rin po che bzhin du rin chen padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2510-2:32a-35: yang nub phyogs kyi snam bu la rdo rje chos bzhin du rdo rje padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2510-2:32a-36: byang phyogs kyi snam bu la padma gar gyi dbang phyug bzhin du sna tshogs padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2510-2:32a-37: de la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni sku mdog dkar po /
T02D2510-2:32a-38: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa /
T02D2510-2:32a-40: zhal dang po shar du gzigs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:32b-0: rdo rje sems ma'i gnas su padmas @32b mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
T02D2510-2:32b-1: rdo rje rin chen ma'i gnas su yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtse mo padma can /
T02D2510-2:32b-2: rdo rje chos ma'i gnas su padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i rdo rje padma /
T02D2510-2:32b-3: rdo rje las ma'i gnas su padma 'dab ma bzhi pa /
T02D2510-2:32b-7: ljang gu'i 'dab ma bzhi pa lte ba dkar po'o //
T02D2510-2:32b-8: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba ni phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar dmar /
T02D2510-2:32b-9: phyag g-yon pas padma'i sdong bu bzung nas phyag g-yas
T02D2510-2:32b-10: pas thugs kar padma 'byed par mdzad pas bzhugs pa'o
T02D2510-2:32b-11: // sangs rgyas padma ni sh'akya thub pa'i gzugs can gser gyi mdog mnga' ba /
T02D2510-2:32b-12: g-yon bsnyems pas padma'i dril bu bzung nas /
T02D2510-2:32b-13: phyag g-yas pas kha tv'am ga padmas mtshan pa'i rdo
T02D2510-2:32b-14: rje rtse lnga pa gung mo'i rtse mo la rang
T02D2510-2:32b-15: gi snying gar 'degs pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2510-2:32b-16: padma'i rgyal po ni sku mdog ser po phyag g-yas kyi dang po na rdo rje /
T02D2510-2:32b-18: g-yon gyi dang po na lcags kyu /
T02D2510-2:32b-19: g-yon gyi gnyis pa na padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2510-2:32b-20: padma'i chags pa sku mdog dmar po padma'i mda' gzhu
T02D2510-2:32b-21: 'gengs pas sangs rgyas thams cad gsod pa'i tshul du
T02D2510-2:32b-22: mdzad pa'o // padma legs pa ni margad kyi mdog
T02D2510-2:32b-23: can padma'i se gol brdabs pas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-2:32b-24: thams cad mnyes par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:32b-25: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ral pa'i dbus na 'od
T02D2510-2:32b-26: dpag tu med pa phyag g-yon pas padma bsnams pa
T02D2510-2:32b-27: / phyag g-yas pa ting nge 'dzin mchog gis bzhugs pa /
T02D2510-2:32b-28: sku mdog dmar po sangs rgyas thor tshugs zhes brjod pa'o //
T02D2510-2:32b-29: padma'i khro gnyer ni sku mdog ser phyag g-yas pa
T02D2510-2:32b-30: padma'i khu tshur gyis padmas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi
T02D2510-2:32b-31: nor bus dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog pa'i phyag
T02D2510-2:32b-32: g-yon pa'i bsnyems pas padma'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2510-2:32b-33: padma'i nyi ma ni sku mdog dmar po nyi ma lta bu phyag g-yon pas padma bsnams shing /
T02D2510-2:32b-34: phyag g-yas pas padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i de
T02D2510-2:32b-35: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od kyis snang bar mdzad
T02D2510-2:32b-36: pa bsnams pa'o // padma'i dpal zla ba'i mdog dang
T02D2510-2:32b-37: de'i cha byad can phyag g-yon pas padmas mtshan pa'i
T02D2510-2:32b-38: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa /
T02D2510-2:33a-2: padma bzhad pa sku mdog dkar ser zhal bcu gcig pa /
T02D2510-2:33a-3: phyag bcu gnyis pa tshangs pa'i cha byad can ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa dang /
T02D2510-2:33a-4: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o //
T02D2510-2:33a-5: de la zhal dang po zhi ba /
T02D2510-2:33a-6: de bzhin du zhal g-yas pa dang /
T02D2510-2:33a-7: g-yon pa'i phyogs kyang zhi ba yin la /
T02D2510-2:33a-8: rgyab kyi zhal gcig ni mi sdug pa'i nyams can no //
T02D2510-2:33a-9: yang zhal dang po'i steng ma gcig ni mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D2510-2:33a-10: de'i g-yas g-yon gyi zhal gnyis ni mi sdug pa'i nyams can /
T02D2510-2:33a-11: de'i rgyab ni mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa /
T02D2510-2:33a-12: de'i steng ma'i zhal dang po ni mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D2510-2:33a-13: zhal g-yas pa ni mche ba phyung ba /
T02D2510-2:33a-14: g-yon pa ni drag cing cher bzhad pa /
T02D2510-2:33a-15: de'i steng ma gcig ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal lo //
T02D2510-2:33a-16: phyag dang po gnyis ni chos ston pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:33a-17: gnyis pa gnyis ni me tog gi thal mo mdzad pa /
T02D2510-2:33a-18: phyag g-yas pa na so'i phreng ba padmar chud pa'i
T02D2510-2:33a-19: rdo rje can gyis mtshan pa des de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:33a-20: pa thams cad 'dzum pa la nges par sbyor ba'o
T02D2510-2:33a-22: lnga pa na ral gri dang bgrang phreng bsnams pa /
T02D2510-2:33a-23: phyag gcig gis sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:33a-24: phyag g-yon pas padma dang glegs bam dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T02D2510-2:33a-25: ril ba spyi blugs bsnams par bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:33a-26: padma'i ting nge 'dzin ni brgya byin gyi cha lugs can /
T02D2510-2:33a-27: spyan stong dang ldan pa sku mdog dmar po ting
T02D2510-2:33a-28: nge 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgya'i phyag g-yon pas rdo
T02D2510-2:33a-30: padma'i sgrol ma ni rdo rje chos kyi gzugs can no //
T02D2510-2:33a-31: gzhon nu ni gdong drug bzhin du sku mdog dmar po phyag bzhi pa /
T02D2510-2:33a-32: phyag g-yon pa padma'i khu tshur gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa /
T02D2510-2:33a-33: phyag g-yas ba'i khu tshur gyis padma'i ral gris de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcod par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:33a-34: g-yas kyi gnyis pa na mdung bsnams pa /
T02D2510-2:33a-35: g-yon gyi gnyis ba na padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2510-2:33a-36: padma'i rgyu khyab 'jug gi gzugs can /
T02D2510-2:33a-37: mgrin pa sngon po spyan gsum pa phyag g-yas pa gnyis na 'khor lo dang be con bsnams pa /
T02D2510-2:33b-0: g-yon pa gnyis na @33b padma dang dung bsnams pa /
T02D2510-2:33b-1: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can sbrul nag po'i mchod phyir thogs 'chang ba /
T02D2510-2:33b-2: ri dags kyi pags pa stod g-yogs su bsnams pa /
T02D2510-2:33b-4: padma'i gsung ni tshangs pa'i gzugs can /
T02D2510-2:33b-5: mdog dkar dmar zhal bzhi pa /
T02D2510-2:33b-6: phyag g-yas pa gnyis na bgrang phreng dang dbyig pa /
T02D2510-2:33b-7: g-yon pa gnyis na padma dang ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa'o //
T02D2510-2:33b-8: padma don yod pa'i dbang phyug ni lha chen po'i
T02D2510-2:33b-9: gzugs can zhal bzhi pa spyan gsum pa mgrin pa
T02D2510-2:33b-10: sngo ba sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs 'chang ba stag
T02D2510-2:33b-11: gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D2510-2:33b-12: ri dags nag po'i pags pa stod g-yogs su bsnams pa /
T02D2510-2:33b-13: phyag g-yas kyi dang pos mchog sbyin pa /
T02D2510-2:33b-15: g-yon gyi dang po na mdung rtse gsum pa gnyis pas na ral gri /
T02D2510-2:33b-20: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gar gyi dbang phyug gi gzugs can /
T02D2510-2:33b-21: phyag g-yas pa rnams na padma dang lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02D2510-2:33b-22: g-yon pa rnams na mdung rtse gsum pa dang lcags
T02D2510-2:33b-23: sgrog dang dril bu bsnams ba sku mdog dkar po
T02D2510-2:33b-24: spyan gsum pa'o // padma'i bsrung ba ni gser gyi mdog can /
T02D2510-2:33b-25: phyag g-yas kyi dang pos mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa /
T02D2510-2:33b-26: g-yon gyi dang pos padma bsnams pa /
T02D2510-2:33b-27: phyag gnyis kyis padma'i go cha bsnams pa /
T02D2510-2:33b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la go bskon pa'o //
T02D2510-2:33b-29: padma'i gnod sbyin ni sku mdog nag po gsus po che ba /
T02D2510-2:33b-30: zhal mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa /
T02D2510-2:33b-31: padma'i mche ba gnyis phyag gnyis kyi khu tshur gyis
T02D2510-2:33b-32: bzung nas khar bzhag pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2510-2:33b-34: padma'i khu tshur ni sku mdog ser po dam tshig
T02D2510-2:33b-35: gi padma'i khu tshur gyis padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje
T02D2510-2:33b-37: padma'i sgeg mo ni mdog dkar mo padma'i khu tshur
T02D2510-2:33b-38: gnyis kyis padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D2510-2:33b-39: gnyis bzung nas bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis bsam pa g-yos
T02D2510-2:33b-40: pas 'dud pa'o // padma'i phreng ba ma mdog ser po /
T02D2510-2:33b-41: padma rin po che'i phreng bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2510-2:34a-0: padma'i glu ma ni mdog dkar @34a * //
T02D2510-2:34a-1: dmar padma'i pi wang brdung ba'o //
T02D2510-2:34a-2: padma'i gar ma ni sna tshogs pa'i mdog can padmas
T02D2510-2:34a-3: mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams pas gar bskor
T02D2510-2:34a-5: padma'i bdug pa ma ni sku mdog dkar dmar padma'i
T02D2510-2:34a-6: spos khang bsnams nas padma'i bdug pas de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:34a-7: pa thams cad tshim par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:34a-8: padma'i me tog ma ni sku mdog ser po /
T02D2510-2:34a-9: phyag g-yon pas padma'i me tog gi snod bsnams pa /
T02D2510-2:34a-10: phyag g-yas pas padma'i me tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:34a-11: padma'i mar me ma ni mdog dmar skya padma'i mar
T02D2510-2:34a-12: me'i sdong bus da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang
T02D2510-2:34a-13: bar byed pa'o // padma'i dri ma ni sna tshogs pa'i mdog can /
T02D2510-2:34a-14: phyag g-yon pas padma'i dri'i dung bsnams pa /
T02D2510-2:34a-15: phyag g-yas pas padma'i dris de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:34a-16: rta mgrin ni mdog dmar skya /
T02D2510-2:34a-17: padma'i lcags kyus de bzhin gshags pa thams cad 'gugs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:34a-18: zhal dang po'i mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa /
T02D2510-2:34a-19: de'i steng du rta'i gdong mgrin pa bstod pa mdog ljang gu'o //
T02D2510-2:34a-20: don yod pa'i zhags pa ni phyugs bdag gi gzugs can spyan gsum pa ;
T02D2510-2:34a-21: phyag bzhi pa g-yas kyi dang po na zhags pa /
T02D2510-2:34a-23: g-yon gyi dang po na dbyig pa /
T02D2510-2:34a-24: g-yon gyi gnyis pan padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2510-2:34a-25: padma'i lcags sgrog ni mdog dmar skya /
T02D2510-2:34a-26: padma'i lcags sgrog dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'ching bar byed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:34a-27: padma 'bebs pa ni zhal drug pa /
T02D2510-2:34a-28: gzhon nu kun 'gyed kyi cha lugs can /
T02D2510-2:34a-29: mdog dmar po phyag g-yas kyi dang po na dril bu /
T02D2510-2:34a-32: g-yon gyi dang po na padma /
T02D2510-2:34a-33: gnyis pa na lcags sgrog / gsum pa na khyim bya bsnams pas bzhugs pa'o //

T02D2510-2:34a-36: bskal pa bzang po rnams ni rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2510-2:34a-37: lhag ma rnams ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i padma'i phreng ba'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2510-2:34b-1: ting nge 'dzin padma'i rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:34b-2: 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs pa lhag ma rnams ni sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:34b-5: padma'i ting nge 'dzin ni zhi ba'i gzig dang po'o//
T02D2510-2:34b-6: lhag ma rnams rdo rje lta ba can no //
T02D2510-2:34b-7: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas dgongs ka'i dus su
T02D2510-2:34b-8: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas me
T02D2510-2:34b-10: rdo rje shugs kyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par byas shing /
T02D2510-2:34b-11: aom h'um hr'i: ho: zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:34b-12: yang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lhag pa dang mtshang
T02D2510-2:34b-13: ba'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bltas la
T02D2510-2:34b-14: / rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing dkyil 'khor la
T02D2510-2:34b-15: lan bdun bskor ba byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2510-2:34b-16: la phreng ba de phul te /
T02D2510-2:34b-17: rdo rje gar byas la blangs nas rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:34b-18: aom h'um hr'i: ho: zhes rgyun mi 'chad pa kho nar bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:34b-19: de nas yi ge h'um las bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:34b-20: de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni //
T02D2510-2:34b-21: rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas //
T02D2510-2:34b-22: rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po //
T02D2510-2:34b-23: yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya //
T02D2510-2:34b-24: aom badzra autgha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um /
T02D2510-2:34b-25: de'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2510-2:34b-26: rdo rje mdzub mo gnyis legs par //
T02D2510-2:34b-27: sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su //
T02D2510-2:34b-28: rab tu bros nas dbye ba ni //
T02D2510-2:34b-29: sgo dbye ba yi mchog yin no //
T02D2510-2:34b-30: de nas rin po che'am sa las byas pa'i bum
T02D2510-2:34b-31: pa rtsa ba mi gnag pa gsus pa che ba
T02D2510-2:34b-36: padma'i me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:34b-37: dri zhim po'i chus yongs su bkang ba /
T02D2510-2:34b-39: mgul pa ras dkar po bzang pos bcings pa /
T02D2510-2:34b-41: 'bras bu dri zhim pas kha brgyan pa /
T02D2510-2:34b-42: sbos chu dri zhim pas kun nas byugs te /
T02D2510-2:34b-43: me tog gi phreng ba btags pa ji lta ba bzhin du lhag par gnas pa byas la ;
T02D2510-2:34b-44: rdo rje chos mas padma'i me tog gi lcug ma yongs su bzung la /
T02D2510-2:34b-45: aom badzra au da ka h'um zhes bya bas bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas la /
T02D2510-2:34b-46: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sngags kyang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02D2510-2:34b-47: bum pa de bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o//
T02D2510-2:35a-0: @35a * // gnyis pa la 'gro ba 'dul ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02D2510-2:35a-1: 'jug pa'i sgor mngon par phyogs par gzhag par bya zhing /
T02D2510-2:35a-2: chu des bdag nyid dang slob ma la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:35a-3: 'jug pa'i dus su rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2510-2:35a-4: slob ma yang 'ching du gzhug go //
T02D2510-2:35a-5: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bum pa yang so so rang rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa /
T02D2510-2:35a-6: de rnams kyi rang rang gi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D2510-2:35a-7: yongs su bzlas la dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi
T02D2510-2:35a-8: khyams rnams su gzhag pa dang /
T02D2510-2:35a-9: de rnams kyi phyi rol du bum pa gang ba'o //
T02D2510-2:35a-10: ma rnyed par gyur na bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba
T02D2510-2:35a-11: 'dul ba la rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang
T02D2510-2:35a-15: don yod dbang phyug rnams la rang rang gi sngags bzlas pa'i bum pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:35a-16: aom badzra dzhi zhes bya ba'i rigs kyi snying po
T02D2510-2:35a-17: 'dis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rigs kyi bum pa la
T02D2510-2:35a-18: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te /
T02D2510-2:35a-19: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i lha rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:35a-20: aom badzra ratna mu ku ta h'um zhes bya bas
T02D2510-2:35a-21: sangs rgyas thor tshugs kyi rigs kyi bum pa la'o
T02D2510-2:35a-22: // aom dharmma padma hr'i: zhes bya bas padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bum pa la'o //
T02D2510-2:35a-23: aom sarbba mu khi h'um zhes bya bas padma don
T02D2510-2:35a-24: yod dbang phyug gi bum pa la brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D2510-2:35a-26: don yod dbang phyug gi rigs kyi lha rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:35a-27: de nas bdag po lnga'i bum pa gang ba dang /
T02D2510-2:35a-28: rigs bzhi'i bum pa gang ba bzhi dbul bar bya ste /
T02D2510-2:35a-29: byams pa la sogs pa'i bskal pa bzang po'i byang
T02D2510-2:35a-30: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi rig pa yongs
T02D2510-2:35a-31: su bzlas pa'i bum pa gang bar byas la dbul
T02D2510-2:35a-32: bar bya'o // ma rnyed na bum pa rnams dang
T02D2510-2:35a-33: bum pa gang ba bcu las nyung ba dbul bar
T02D2510-2:35a-35: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2510-2:35a-36: ji skad bshad pa de dag byas pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2510-2:35a-37: de nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i zhes bya
T02D2510-2:35a-38: ba'i padma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad
T02D2510-2:35a-39: do zhes bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor nas brtsams
T02D2510-2:35a-40: te / dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi
T02D2510-2:35a-41: bar du slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga'i bye
T02D2510-2:35b-0: te / brag rgyas par phye'o// @35b de la dang po kho nar zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:35b-1: dbab pa la sogs pa'i sngon du song ba'o //
T02D2510-2:35b-2: padma'i slob dpon zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnal 'byor chen po dang /
T02D2510-2:35b-3: byin gyis brlabs pa'i slob dbon ni padma'i slob dpon no //
T02D2510-2:35b-4: rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la ji
T02D2510-2:35b-5: lta ba bzhin du bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-2:35b-7: phyag bzhi byas te sdom pa bzung la /
T02D2510-2:35b-8: phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid la dbang bskur te /
T02D2510-2:35b-9: slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga bzhin du rdo rje
T02D2510-2:35b-10: chos ma bcings la 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba
T02D2510-2:35b-11: 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgra'i
T02D2510-2:35b-12: don yin no // rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:35b-13: de las bshad pa'i tshul gyis dbab pa la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o //
T02D2510-2:35b-14: snying po 'dis las rnams bya'o zhes bya ba ni dbab pa dang me tog dor ba dang /
T02D2510-2:35b-15: phreng ba bcing ba'i dbang dang /
T02D2510-2:35b-18: dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba dang /
T02D2510-2:35b-20: phyag rgya'i dbang gis cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2510-2:35b-23: ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2510-2:35b-24: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi rjes thogs la /
T02D2510-2:35b-25: padma'i rigs kyi snying po rjes thogs la 'chad par 'gyur bar brjod pa ni /
T02D2510-2:35b-26: aom padma spho ta aa dhi tishtha aa zhes phyogs
T02D2510-2:35b-27: gcig dper brjod pa tsam gyis de dag gi snying
T02D2510-2:35b-28: po rnams kyang bstan pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:35b-29: snying po 'di dper brjod pa tsam gyis /
T02D2510-2:35b-30: de rnams kyi snying po'ang shes par bya ste /
T02D2510-2:35b-31: las rnams bya'o zhes bya ba bshad pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:35b-32: aom padma spho ta aa dhi tishtha aa zhes bya ba ni dbab pa'i don to //
T02D2510-2:35b-33: dkyil 'khor 'dir dbab pa'i snying po 'di dang /
T02D2510-2:35b-34: rdo rje padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas nas /
T02D2510-2:35b-35: thal mo sbyar nas lan brgya'i bar du bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:35b-36: de nas rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mos /
T02D2510-2:35b-37: rdo rje padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gung mo
T02D2510-2:35b-38: lan brgya'i bar du dral zhing aa zhes brjod do
T02D2510-2:35b-39: // de nas de bzhin du bka' ma nos nas
T02D2510-2:35b-40: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:35b-41: chen po la bshad pa'i me tog dor ba la
T02D2510-2:35b-42: sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga'i go rims
T02D2510-2:36a-2: ji lta ba bzhin du slob ma 'jug pa'i gnang ba mnos te /
T02D2510-2:36a-3: de nas yang dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid
T02D2510-2:36a-4: dbang bskur te zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rdo
T02D2510-2:36a-5: rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las rdo rje
T02D2510-2:36a-6: dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa dbang bskur
T02D2510-2:36a-7: bar bshad pa de bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i
T02D2510-2:36a-8: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje chos
T02D2510-2:36a-9: kyi phyag rgyas gang la 'od dpag tu med pa'i
T02D2510-2:36a-11: slob dpon gyis zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02D2510-2:36a-12: padmo'i dbyibs blangs nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:36a-13: sangs rgyas kun gyi padmo'i dbang //
T02D2510-2:36a-14: de ring khyed la bskur bar bya //
T02D2510-2:36a-15: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab grub phyir //
T02D2510-2:36a-18: shing las byas pa'i padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa sdong bu dang bcas pa /
T02D2510-2:36a-19: lte ba'i dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa sor brgyad pa /
T02D2510-2:36a-20: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i nang du chud pa /
T02D2510-2:36a-21: 'og gi cha'i 'dab ma brgyad kha gyes pa /
T02D2510-2:36a-22: steng gi cha'i cung zad kha ma bye bar gyur pa'i padma'i dbyibs dang /
T02D2510-2:36a-23: padma'i dril bu dang bcas pa blangs te rang gi ming gi dbang bskur ro //
T02D2510-2:36a-24: rang gi padmo'i ming nas brjod la zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:36a-25: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas lo ke shva ra padma ham zhes pa'am /
T02D2510-2:36a-26: gzhan gang yang rung ba ji ltar thob pa rang gi padma'i ming grags pas na brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:36a-27: padma'i lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:36a-28: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i cho gas sprul pa dang /
T02D2510-2:36a-30: padmo'i sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2510-2:36a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa byas la /
T02D2510-2:36a-32: sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas sgo phye la /
T02D2510-2:36a-33: rta mgrin la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02D2510-2:36a-37: padma'i gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad la /
T02D2510-2:36a-38: ra ba dang dra ba byas te /
T02D2510-2:36a-39: padma'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas sgo bcad la /
T02D2510-2:36a-40: padma'i bsrung ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs te /
T02D2510-2:36a-41: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la phyag byas te /
T02D2510-2:36a-42: 'gro ba 'dul ba la mchod yon dang /
T02D2510-2:36b-1: sngags dang phyag rgyas so sor dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:36b-2: de nas chos kyi phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis sems
T02D2510-2:36b-3: dpa' chen po rnams bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba
T02D2510-2:36b-4: ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas padma
T02D2510-2:36b-5: 'bebs pa'i bar du phyis 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dam
T02D2510-2:36b-6: tshig gi phyag rgya yin gyi /
T02D2510-2:36b-7: 'dir de'i chos kyi phyag rgyar mngon par 'dod pa'i yi ge bdag nyid ni 'di ma yin te /
T02D2510-2:36b-8: sgrub pa'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:36b-9: gang gi phyir dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dngos su
T02D2510-2:36b-10: sgrub par bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa de'i phyir
T02D2510-2:36b-11: / skabs 'dir mngon par 'dod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang ma yin la /
T02D2510-2:36b-12: 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya la chos kyi phyag
T02D2510-2:36b-13: rgyas zhes brjod par mi bya'o zhes kyang brjod par
T02D2510-2:36b-14: mi nus te / de skad du yang /
T02D2510-2:36b-15: rgyud phyi ma las padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya rnam
T02D2510-2:36b-16: pa bzhi ka la yang chos kyi phyag rgyar brjod
T02D2510-2:36b-17: la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya rnams
T02D2510-2:36b-18: ni phyag rgya chen po zhes bya zhing /
T02D2510-2:36b-19: rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya rnams la ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya la /
T02D2510-2:36b-20: nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi ka la yang
T02D2510-2:36b-21: las kyi phyag rgya zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir
T02D2510-2:36b-22: ro // de nas dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:36b-23: ji ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang ;
T02D2510-2:36b-24: sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pas //
T02D2510-2:36b-25: de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub //
T02D2510-2:36b-26: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing zhes bya bas
T02D2510-2:36b-27: lha thams cad kyi rang gi rig pas dngos grub
T02D2510-2:36b-28: sgrub pa'i rgyur bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang
T02D2510-2:36b-29: dngos grub kyi don du 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:36b-31: ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor bris la khrus byas te /
T02D2510-2:36b-32: de nas bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2510-2:36b-33: ji lta ba bzhin du sgo dbye ba byas nas
T02D2510-2:36b-34: snga ma bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnal 'byor
T02D2510-2:36b-35: dang rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan pa'i slob dpon
T02D2510-2:36b-36: gyis gos dkar mo dang 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rjes
T02D2510-2:36b-37: su mthun pa'i rgyan rnams la dri zhim pos byug
T02D2510-2:36b-38: pa dang / bdug pas bdugs te padma'i gnod sbyin
T02D2510-2:36b-39: gyi sngags kyis gos thams cad la yongs su bzlas
T02D2510-2:36b-40: la ze'u ka la sogs pa bcings te /
T02D2510-2:36b-41: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad
T02D2510-2:36b-42: pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyis rgyan thams cad la
T02D2510-2:37a-1: bsngags la bdag nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i ci rigs pa'i rgyan btags te /
T02D2510-2:37a-2: yang sngags gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
T02D2510-2:37a-3: tu med pa dang ldan pa'i padma'i phreng ba'i cod
T02D2510-2:37a-4: pan la yongs su bzlas te /
T02D2510-2:37a-5: padma'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur bas bdag nyid la dbang bskur te /
T02D2510-2:37a-6: mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2510-2:37a-7: dkyil 'khor thams cad blos mngon sum lta bur byas la phyag byas te /
T02D2510-2:37a-8: mchod yon phul nas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2510-2:37a-9: padma dang dril bu bzung nas yang gdong g-yogs dang gos la padma'i gnod sbyin dang /
T02D2510-2:37a-10: rta mgrin la sogs pa sgo srung rnams kyi sngags yongs su bzlas la /
T02D2510-2:37a-12: me tog gi phreng ba btags la slob dpon gyis phyag bzhi bya'o //
T02D2510-2:37a-13: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2510-2:37a-14: sdom pa gzung bar byas te /
T02D2510-2:37a-15: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D2510-2:37a-16: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2510-2:37a-17: zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas /
T02D2510-2:37a-18: dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02D2510-2:37a-21: de nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus
T02D2510-2:37a-22: bdag nyid la dbang bskur la rdo rje padma'i dam
T02D2510-2:37a-23: tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te 'jug pa'i cho gas
T02D2510-2:37a-24: zhugs te / de nas rdo rje mna'i chu 'thungs la dbab pa'i cho gas dbab pa byas te /
T02D2510-2:37a-25: aom padma spho ta aa dhi tishtha aa zhes bya
T02D2510-2:37a-26: ba brgya dang yang aa zhes bya ba lan brgya'i
T02D2510-2:37a-28: de nas me tog dor la rang gi spyi bor bcings te /
T02D2510-2:37a-29: gdong g-yogs bkrol nas dkyil 'khor bltas la /
T02D2510-2:37a-30: dbab ba nye bar bsdu ba byas nas //
T02D2510-2:37a-31: slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i cho gas bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02D2510-2:37a-32: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2510-2:37a-33: mig 'byed pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:37a-34: tshigs bcad gnyis kyis rjes su gnang ba mnos nas /
T02D2510-2:37a-35: de nyid kyis ni padma gzung //
T02D2510-2:37a-36: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02D2510-2:37a-37: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher //
T02D2510-2:37a-38: de nas byin gyis brlabs te 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying po bzlas la /
T02D2510-2:37a-39: dngos grub kyi padma'i brtul zhu gas blangs te /

T02D2510-2:40b-14: nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya //
T02D2510-2:40b-15: gang tshe nyams gyur rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2510-2:40b-17: khyod kyis srog chags bsad mi bya //
T02D2510-2:40b-18: ma byin par yang mi blang ngo //
T02D2510-2:40b-19: 'dod pa log par mi spyod cing //
T02D2510-2:40b-20: brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02D2510-2:40b-21: phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba ni /
T02D2510-2:40b-22: chang ni rnam par spang bar bya //
T02D2510-2:40b-23: sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs par //
T02D2510-2:40b-24: bya ba ma yin thams cad spang //
T02D2510-2:40b-25: dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing //
T02D2510-2:40b-26: rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya //
T02D2510-2:40b-27: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //
T02D2510-2:40b-28: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang //
T02D2510-2:40b-29: yid kyi rnam pa gsum rnams kyang /
T02D2510-2:40b-30: ci nus par ni rjes su skyong //
T02D2510-2:40b-31: theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya //
T02D2510-2:40b-32: sems can don la rgyab phyogs min //
T02D2510-2:40b-33: 'khor ba dag ni yongs mi spang //
T02D2510-2:40b-34: rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags //
T02D2510-2:40b-35: lha dang lha min gsang ba pa //
T02D2510-2:40b-36: khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing //
T02D2510-2:40b-37: phyag rgya gzhon pa mtshon cha dang //
T02D2510-2:40b-38: mtshan ma bgom par mi bya'o //
T02D2510-2:40b-39: 'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02D2510-2:40b-40: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bsrungs //
T02D2510-2:40b-41: des kyang 'di skad brjod bya ste //
T02D2510-2:40b-42: slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson //
T02D2510-2:40b-43: gtso bos ji ltar ba k'a stsal pa //
T02D2510-2:40b-44: de dag bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal //
T02D2510-2:40b-45: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D2510-2:40b-46: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa //
T02D2510-2:40b-47: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D2510-2:40b-48: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2510-2:40b-51: ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:40b-52: gang zhig sdom pa mi 'dzin par byed pa de la ni /
T02D2510-2:40b-53: deng khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod par mi bya ste /
T02D2510-2:40b-54: slob dpon du rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02D2510-2:40b-55: dbang bskur ba yang mi bya'o //
T02D2510-2:40b-56: de nas de ma thag tu /
T02D2510-2:41a-0: @41a * // aom sarbba yo ga tsitta autpa da ya mi zhes bya ba 'dis /
T02D2510-2:41a-1: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D2510-2:41a-2: dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas su //
T02D2510-2:41a-3: de yi snying gar snying pos ni //
T02D2510-2:41a-4: rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya //
T02D2510-2:41a-5: su ra te sa ma ya satvam ho badzra siddhi ya th'a su kham /
T02D2510-2:41a-6: de nas de 'gro ba 'dul par byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2510-2:41a-7: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang //
T02D2510-2:41a-8: rdo rje padma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2510-2:41a-9: de nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te /
T02D2510-2:41a-10: dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod yon gyi mchog blangs te /
T02D2510-2:41a-11: rdo rje brtul zhugs kyis dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:41a-12: de la dang po re zhig slob dpon gyis /
T02D2510-2:41a-13: aom badzra padma sa ma ya satvam zhes brjod cing
T02D2510-2:41a-14: rdo rje padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rang nyid
T02D2510-2:41a-15: bcings la slob ma yang 'ching du gzhug par bya'o
T02D2510-2:41a-16: // de nyid kyi gung mo'i sor mo gnyis kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la /
T02D2510-2:41a-17: aom padma sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di dang /
T02D2510-2:41a-18: rta mgrin gyi lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas shar phyogs kyi sgo nas bcug la dgug par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:41a-19: lho phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug la
T02D2510-2:41a-20: don yod zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas gzhug par
T02D2510-2:41a-21: bya'o // yang nub phyogs kyi sgor bcug la padma'i
T02D2510-2:41a-22: lcags sgrog gi las kyi phyag rgyas bcing bar bya'o
T02D2510-2:41a-23: bya'o // // de nas yang byang phyogs kyi sgo
T02D2510-2:41a-24: nas bcug la padma 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas
T02D2510-2:41a-25: bya'o // // dbang du bya'o // yang shar phyogs
T02D2510-2:41a-26: kyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug la 'di skad
T02D2510-2:41a-28: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi padma'i rigs su zhugs kyis /
T02D2510-2:41a-29: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub pa yang thob na /
T02D2510-2:41a-30: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02D2510-2:41a-31: de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par byas /
T02D2510-2:41a-32: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams
T02D2510-2:41a-33: la smra bar ma byed cig / khyod dam tshig
T02D2510-2:41a-35: de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis rdo rje padma'i
T02D2510-2:41a-36: dam tshig gi phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa
T02D2510-2:41a-37: dang / gyen du bstan pa bcings la padma slob
T02D2510-2:41a-38: ma'i spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod par
T02D2510-2:41b-0: dang / bya'o // 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje dam tshig yin @41b gyis ;
T02D2510-2:41b-1: gal te tshul 'di 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:41b-2: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang
T02D2510-2:41b-3: mna'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas pa'i chus padma'i
T02D2510-2:41b-4: slob ma de 'thung du bcug la 'di skad ces
T02D2510-2:41b-5: brjod par bya'o // de la mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02D2510-2:41b-6: padma'i sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D2510-2:41b-7: snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzad //
T02D2510-2:41b-8: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D2510-2:41b-9: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D2510-2:41b-11: de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2510-2:41b-12: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyis phyag na padmo ba yin gyis /
T02D2510-2:41b-13: ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
T02D2510-2:41b-14: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /
T02D2510-2:41b-15: mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas
T02D2510-2:41b-16: dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re /
T02D2510-2:41b-17: de nas yang 'di skad du bsgo bar bya ste /
T02D2510-2:41b-18: gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di su la yang
T02D2510-2:41b-19: ma smra shig / khyod mi bde ba ma sbangs
T02D2510-2:41b-20: par dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar
T02D2510-2:41b-21: gyur ta re / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis rlobs la /
T02D2510-2:41b-22: padma'i sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces smros shig ces bsgo'o //
T02D2510-2:41b-23: de nas myur du slob dpon gyis rdo rje padma'i
T02D2510-2:41b-24: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces
T02D2510-2:41b-26: 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste //
T02D2510-2:41b-27: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02D2510-2:41b-28: rdo rje ye shes bla med ni //
T02D2510-2:41b-29: de ring nyid du 'bab par shog / badzra a'a
T02D2510-2:41b-30: be sha aa: zhes bya ba lan brgya'i bar du
T02D2510-2:41b-31: brjod par bya'o // de'i tshe khro bo'i khu tshur bcings la /
T02D2510-2:41b-32: rdo rje padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dral bar bya zhing /
T02D2510-2:41b-33: aom h'um hr'i: ho: aa aa aa aa /
T02D2510-2:41b-34: zhes lan brgya'i bar brjod na nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:41b-35: gang gi tshe de ltar babs pas padma /
T02D2510-2:41b-36: sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe slob
T02D2510-2:41b-37: dpon gyis padma khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcing bar

T02D2510-2:41b-42: gang gi tshe padma legs pa'i phyag rgya 'ching pa de'i tshe /
T02D2510-2:41b-43: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:42a-0: @42a * // gang gi tshe padma khro gnyer gyi phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe /

T02D2510-2:42a-6: gang gi tshe padma bzhad pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe /
T02D2510-2:42a-7: padma sgrol ma'i phyag rgya bya'o //

T02D2510-2:42a-9: de nas babs pa de'i lce la yi ge h'um
T02D2510-2:42a-10: las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bsams la

T02D2510-2:42a-12: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi
T02D2510-2:42a-13: dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i gar gyi phyag rgya dang
T02D2510-2:42a-14: / khro bo rdo rje bsrung ba'i gnas su bzhad pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2510-2:42a-15: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2510-2:42a-16: bru hi badzra de nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:42a-17: de nas phreng ba de pra t'i tstsha badzra ho:
T02D2510-2:42a-18: zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor chen por dor bar bya'o
T02D2510-2:42a-19: // de nas aom pra ti gri hna stvam mi
T02D2510-2:42a-20: mam satva ma h'a b'a la zhes bya bas phreng
T02D2510-2:42a-21: ba de de'i mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:42a-23: padma'i sems dpa' deng khyod kyis //
T02D2510-2:42a-24: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02D2510-2:42a-25: mig ni thams cad 'byid mdzad de //
T02D2510-2:42a-26: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02D2510-2:42a-27: he badzra p'a shya de nas rta mgrin nas brtsams
T02D2510-2:42a-28: te bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar
T02D2510-2:42a-29: du dkyil 'khor chen po bstan par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:42a-30: de nas ti shtha badzra dri bho me bh'a ba /
T02D2510-2:42a-31: sh'a shva to me bha ba /
T02D2510-2:42a-32: hri da yam aa dhi tishtha sarbba siddhi mme pra
T02D2510-2:42a-33: ya tstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho: zhes bya
T02D2510-2:42a-34: ba'i snying po 'dis dbab pa'i phyag rgya snying gar
T02D2510-2:42a-35: dgrol bar bya'o // de nas gang la me tog
T02D2510-2:42a-36: babs pa'i lha de sku dam tshig gi phyag rgyas

T02D2510-2:42a-38: rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i khyad par gyis
T02D2510-2:42a-39: slob ma byin gyis brlabs la rang gi lha'i phyag
T02D2510-2:42a-41: de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du
T02D2510-2:42a-42: kha shar phyogs kyi sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'am
T02D2510-2:42a-43: / phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du padma dang zla ba'i steng du bzhag la /
T02D2510-2:42a-44: mchod yon byin nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2510-2:42a-45: sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2510-2:42b-0: rang gi lha'i @42b bum pas dbang bskur zhing /
T02D2510-2:42b-1: de'i sngags kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:42b-2: phyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las padma'i khu tshur gyis chu blangs la /

T02D2510-2:42b-4: de'i sngags aom badzra aa bhi shi nytsa zhes brjod par bya'o //

T02D2510-2:42b-9: aom badzra dharmm'a sa ma ye badzra padmi ne h'um /

T02D2510-2:42b-13: gung mo rdo rje mnyam sbyar ba //
T02D2510-2:42b-14: chos kyi rdo rje rab grags pa //
T02D2510-2:42b-15: de yis dbang bskur sbyin par bya //
T02D2510-2:42b-16: yi ge hr'i: las 'od dpag tu med pa bsams la /
T02D2510-2:42b-17: 'di de'i spyi bor gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:42b-18: 'di ni chos kyi sku'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba yin no //
T02D2510-2:42b-19: de nas ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje padma dang /
T02D2510-2:42b-20: padma'i dril bu dang bcas pa'i slob ma'i lag pa gnyis su byin nas /
T02D2510-2:42b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02D2510-2:42b-22: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D2510-2:42b-23: sangs rgyas kun du rab grub phyir //
T02D2510-2:42b-24: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02D2510-2:42b-25: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam /
T02D2510-2:42b-27: ti shtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2510-2:42b-28: de nas aom badzra satva n'a ma aa bhi shi
T02D2510-2:42b-29: nyts'a mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta
T02D2510-2:42b-30: / kye 'jig rten dbang phyug padma zhes bya ba
T02D2510-2:42b-31: la sogs pa'i sngags 'dis ming gis dbang bskur bar
T02D2510-2:42b-32: / bya ste / slob ma rdo rje thal mo bskor ba dang /
T02D2510-2:42b-33: slob dpon la phyag byed du bcug la /
T02D2510-2:42b-35: dbang bskur thams cad sbyin par bya'o //

T02D2510-2:42b-37: padma'i sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyis slob ma la mchod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:42b-38: 'di ni sdom pa gzung ba dang /
T02D2510-2:42b-39: sdom pa ma bzung ba rnams kyi thun mong gi dbang bskur ba yin no //
T02D2510-2:42b-40: slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa rnams kyis khyad par brjod par bya ste /
T02D2510-2:42b-41: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las khru gnyis tsam dor bar
T02D2510-2:42b-42: dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad kyi khru
T02D2510-2:42b-43: bzhi pa sgo nub tu bltas pa /
T02D2510-2:42b-44: shar phyogs kyi sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i dkyil 'khor tshon sna lngas bris la /
T02D2510-2:43a-2: de'i steng du rdo rje padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa bris la /
T02D2510-2:43a-3: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du dkyil 'khor de yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2510-2:43a-6: zla ba dar gyis g-yogs la /
T02D2510-2:43a-7: padma'i gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas te slob ma bzhag la /
T02D2510-2:43a-8: de'i steng du bla re bre ba dang /
T02D2510-2:43a-10: me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dkar po rin po che'i tog can bya'o //
T02D2510-2:43a-11: g-yon logs su gos dkar po sna tshogs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D2510-2:43a-12: ba dan sna tshogs pa btsugs la 'gro ba 'dul ba dang /
T02D2510-2:43a-13: yi ge aom yongs su bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:43a-14: de nas slob ma 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam tshig
T02D2510-2:43a-15: gi phyag rgyas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs su bskyed
T02D2510-2:43a-16: la / de phyag rgya chen po gnas pa la /

T02D2510-2:43a-18: pa'i gnas rnams su dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams
T02D2510-2:43a-19: kyis rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2510-2:43a-20: 'gro ba 'dul ba nas brtsams nas padma 'bebs pa'i
T02D2510-2:43a-21: mthar thug pa'i dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i khyad par thams
T02D2510-2:43a-22: cad bkod la / yang de nyid la yi ge
T02D2510-2:43a-23: ma las rnam par snang mdzad kyi cod pan dang
T02D2510-2:43a-24: cad bkod la / / yi ge nga las brang du mi bskyod pa'i dpal be'u dang /
T02D2510-2:43a-25: yi ge nya las smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02D2510-2:43a-26: yi ge na las mchu gnyis kyi bar du 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
T02D2510-2:43a-27: yi ge na las spyi gtsug tu don yod grub pa dang /
T02D2510-2:43a-28: yi ge ya las snying gar padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D2510-2:43a-29: yi ge ra las dpral bar padmas mtshan pa'i yid
T02D2510-2:43a-30: bzhin gyi nor bu gtsang ma zhes bya ba dang
T02D2510-2:43a-31: / yi ge la las lkog ma'i phyogs su rdo rje padma dang /
T02D2510-2:43a-32: yi ge wa las mgo bor sna tshogs padma dang /
T02D2510-2:43a-33: aa a'a zhes bya bas rna ba g-yas g-yon du padma'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02D2510-2:43a-35: ai a'i las mig g-yas g-yon gnyis su padma'i chags pa dang /

T02D2510-2:97a-45: dkyil 'khor lngas ni brgyan gyur pa //

T02D2510-2:97b-1: par bya'o // rin chen zur brgyad pa /

T02D2510-2:97b-3: 'phros pa'i rin po che lcug mas phyi rol kun
T02D2510-2:97b-4: la yongs su bskor ba ni /

T02D2510-2:97b-6: rang gi phyag rgyas bskor ba ste //
T02D2510-2:97b-7: der ni sangs rgyas gzhag par bya //
T02D2510-2:97b-9: dkyil 'khor rnam pa lnga'i dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gang
T02D2510-2:97b-10: yin pa de la rnam par snang mdzad bris la

T02D2510-2:97b-16: thams cad kyang rang gi snying pos nam mkha'i phyogs
T02D2510-2:97b-17: nas bkug la dbab par bya'o zhes shes par bya'o
T02D2510-2:97b-18: // de la snying po 'di dag yin te /

T02D2510-2:97b-20: dgod pa'i snying bo yin no //
T02D2510-2:97b-22: rdo rje sems ma'i gnas kyi rdo rje nor bu ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:97b-23: aom badzra ratnam aam kur h'um /
T02D2510-2:97b-24: rdo rje rin chen ma'i gnas kyi'o //
T02D2510-2:97b-26: rdo rje chos ma'i gnas su'o //
T02D2510-2:97b-27: aom badzra ratna p'a sha h'um /
T02D2510-2:97b-28: rdo rje las ma'i gnas su rin chen char 'bebs kyi phyag rgya'o ;

T02D2510-2:97b-30: rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni //
T02D2510-2:97b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs ba ni /

T02D2510-2:97b-33: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po'o //

T02D2510-2:97b-35: / rdo rje snying po der gnas shing //
T02D2510-2:97b-36: rin chen mchog ni sbyin par bri //
T02D2510-2:97b-38: dkyil 'khor gyi gnas der bzhugs pas na der gnas so //

T02D2510-2:97b-40: nam mkha'i snying po bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:97b-41: rin chen mchog ni sbyin par bri //
T02D2510-2:97b-43: rin po che'i mchog ster bar byed pa bri bar bya'o //

T02D2510-2:97b-48: yid bzhin gyi nor bus mtshan pa'i rdo rje la
T02D2510-2:97b-49: sogs pa'i rang gi mtshan ma phyag na bsnams pa
T02D2510-2:98a-1: ma la sogs pa bsnams pa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams bri par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:98a-2: ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du //
T02D2510-2:98a-4: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho ga bri bar bya'o //

T02D2510-2:98a-10: dkyil 'khor 'di ni rin chen phreng ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:98a-11: / ro // de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du //
T02D2510-2:98a-12: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
