T02D2510-2:98a-17: rin chen padma 'dzin khyab bdag / de yi dbus gnas bri bar bya //
T02D2510-2:98a-19: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su rin chen padma bsnams pa /
T02D2510-2:98a-20: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po ting nge 'dzin la
T02D2510-2:98a-21: sogs par zhugs pa bri bar bya zhes bya ba'i
T02D2510-2:98a-22: tha tshig go // rin chen char 'bebs dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2510-2:98a-23: rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni //
T02D2510-2:98a-24: zhes bya ba ni rin chen char 'bebs ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02D2510-2:98a-25: rin chen char 'bebs ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po yin la /
T02D2510-2:98a-28: de nas kyi sgra ni dam thag pa ste /
T02D2510-2:98a-29: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas rdo rje dbyings kyi
T02D2510-2:98a-30: dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho ga thams
T02D2510-2:98a-31: cad byas pa'i rjes la don thams cad grub pa'i

T02D2510-2:98a-33: po'i rnal 'byor dang nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor

T02D2510-2:98a-35: ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te zhes bya ba ni /

T02D2510-2:98a-37: slob dpon bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying

T02D2510-2:98a-42: de nas zhes bya ba ni rang gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2510-2:98a-43: rin po ches byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus
T02D2510-2:98b-0: nor bu'i slob @98b mal dbang bskur te zhes bya
T02D2510-2:98b-1: ba ni / 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po mngon
T02D2510-2:98b-2: par bzlas pa'i 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs
T02D2510-2:98b-3: par gzhag pa'i bum pa ni rin po che'i byin
T02D2510-2:98b-5: de'i phyir nor bu'i rigs kyi bdag por byin gyis brlabs pa'i slob ma la chu blangs la /
T02D2510-2:98b-6: nor bu'i slob ma de la chu des bsang gtor dang /
T02D2510-2:98b-9: rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la zhes bya ba smos te /

T02D2510-2:98b-12: rang nyid kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2510-2:98b-13: de yang 'ching du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:98b-16: de nas kha dog ji lta ba bzhin du rnyed
T02D2510-2:98b-17: pa'i gos 'dis ni gos gzhan ji ltar rnyed pa
T02D2510-2:98b-18: thams cad gzung bar bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das nyid
T02D2510-2:98b-19: kyis gnang ba sbyin par ston to //
T02D2510-2:98b-20: snying po 'dis rang dang gzhan 'jug par bya ste /
T02D2510-2:98b-21: aom h'um pra be sha ma ni r'a dza ku lam /
T02D2510-2:98b-22: dam tshig gnyis su byas te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:98b-23: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis g-yas pa'i rdo
T02D2510-2:98b-24: rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dral bar
T02D2510-2:98b-25: bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:98b-26: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:98b-27: don thams cad grub pa rab tu sbyin pa'i sngags
T02D2510-2:98b-28: 'dir theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes
T02D2510-2:98b-29: brjod do // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2510-2:98b-30: dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du de
T02D2510-2:98b-31: brjod cing sgo srung nas brtsams nas /
T02D2510-2:98b-32: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar du blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:98b-33: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-2:98b-34: la thug gi bar du dkyil 'khor chen po bstan
T02D2510-2:98b-35: par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:98b-36: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D2510-2:98b-37: ci 'byor pas mchod par byas nas /
T02D2510-2:98b-38: dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i
T02D2510-2:98b-39: bar gyi gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni de'i cho ga
T02D2510-2:98b-40: rgyas pa'i don bstan pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:98b-41: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02D2510-2:98b-42: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por dam tshig dang /
T02D2510-2:98b-43: dbang bskur ba thob pa des dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod na /
T02D2510-2:98b-44: dang por re zhig rim pa 'dis sngon du bsnyen pa byas te /
T02D2510-2:99a-1: mtshams la mal nas langs te /
T02D2510-2:99a-2: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas langs te /
T02D2510-2:99a-3: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes bzlas pas /
T02D2510-2:99a-4: bdag nyid rdo rje gnod sbyin du sbrul la 'di
T02D2510-2:99a-5: nyid brjod cing gdong la sogs pa dag par bya'o
T02D2510-2:99a-6: // yang 'di nyid brjod cing lha'i khang par dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2510-2:99a-7: bdag nyid bsgrub pa'i grogs pos g-yas nas bskor zhing rim gyis skyang nul bya'o //
T02D2510-2:99a-8: de nas slob dpon khrus la mngon par zhen na khrus bya'o //
T02D2510-2:99a-9: gal te rnam par rtog pa spyod pa yin pa de'i tshe chu'i khrus kyis cho ga bya ba'am /
T02D2510-2:99a-10: chos bdag med pa la lhag par mos pa dang
T02D2510-2:99a-11: rang gi sngom pa bsrung ba rnams kyis nang gi
T02D2510-2:99a-12: bdag nyid can gyis khrus rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid
T02D2510-2:99a-13: du bya'o // de la rnam par rtog pa la
T02D2510-2:99a-14: spyod pa de'i chu'i khrus kyi cho ga ni 'di
T02D2510-2:99a-15: du bya'o // yin te / re zhig thog mar
T02D2510-2:99a-16: yi ge h'um las rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar
T02D2510-2:99a-18: aom dhu pi dhu pi ka ya h'u bi pra dz'a li ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2510-2:99a-20: khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te /

T02D2510-2:99a-22: rdo rje bsdams pa nang bcings nas //
T02D2510-2:99a-23: sor mo nang du 'bar byas la //

T02D2510-2:99a-27: de'i rjes la bdag nyid aom h'um zhes bdag nyid go cha'i phyag rgyas go cha bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:99a-28: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2510-2:99a-29: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis su byas pas snying gar mdud pa bcing ba'i tshul du bya ba dang /
T02D2510-2:99a-30: de bzhin du mgrin pa dang /
T02D2510-2:99a-37: de nas dbang bskur ba'i gnas su mdud pa'i tshul gyis dar dpyangs bcing ba'i tshul du byas te /
T02D2510-2:99a-38: sgeg pa dang bcas pas lag pa g-yas pa dang /
T02D2510-2:99a-39: g-yon pa mtha' ma nas bkrol te /
T02D2510-2:99a-40: dar dpyangs 'phyang ba'i tshul du byed cing mthar mnyam
T02D2510-2:99a-41: pa'i thal mo dang badzra tu shya ho zhes bya
T02D2510-2:99a-43: de nas aom bhur dz'a la h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2510-2:99a-44: zhes bya bas sa blangs nas cha gsum du byas te /
T02D2510-2:99b-0: rig pa 'di nyid mngon bar bzlas la khrus byed pa'i sa phyogs su @99b gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:99b-1: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2510-2:99b-2: yi ge h'um gis chu dang chu'i gnas thams cad kyi bgegs thams cad bza' bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:99b-3: yang rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2510-2:99b-4: 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi chu dang chu'i bgegs thams cad bza' bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:99b-5: yi ge aa las rdo rje thal mo'i mthe bo gnyis brkyang la /
T02D2510-2:99b-6: mdzub mo gnyis mche ba'i tshul du bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:99b-7: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:99b-8: de nas aom bhur dz'a la h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2510-2:99b-10: chu snyim pa gsum blangs la steng bcing ba'i phyir bsang gtor bya ba dang /
T02D2510-2:99b-11: rig pa 'di nyid zlos shing sngar bshad pa'i sa cha gsum las gcig blangs la /
T02D2510-2:99b-12: rked pa'i phyogs bkru ba dang lag pa bkrus la nye reg bya'o //

T02D2510-2:99b-14: cha gsum pa dang bcas pa dang yan lag thams cad khrus byas la /
T02D2510-2:99b-15: aom bhur dz'a la h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2510-2:99b-16: zhes brjod cing nye reg byas nas rang gi mgo
T02D2510-2:99b-17: la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang de'i
T02D2510-2:99b-18: sngags kyis chu blugs par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:99b-19: de nyid kyis bdas rang byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2510-2:99b-20: langs la aom shi kha re ru ta phat /
T02D2510-2:99b-21: ces bzlas pa'i chus gos la sogs pa bsangs te /
T02D2510-2:99b-22: badzra satva zhes brjod cing ji lta ba bzhin du bgos la /
T02D2510-2:99b-23: yid kyis chu'i gnas kyi bsrung ba bkrol la /
T02D2510-2:99b-24: rang gi lha'i nga rgyal gyis de'i sngags brjod cing
T02D2510-2:99b-25: lha'i khang pa dang nye bar rkang pa bkrus te

T02D2510-2:99b-27: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur dang h'um phat ces bya bas lha'i khang ba'i bgegs bskrad pa dang /
T02D2510-2:99b-28: g-yas pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis lha'i khang pa bsrung ba byas te 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:99b-29: yang rdo rje rtse mo bzlas pa'i dri'i chu dang
T02D2510-2:99b-30: nor bu'i gnod sbyin bzlas pas stan dang lha'i khang
T02D2510-2:99b-31: pa bsangs te / sa ma ya stram /
T02D2510-2:99b-33: de nas yi ge hr'i: las lkog ma'i phyogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02D2510-2:99b-34: lce'i padma'i 'dab mar h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bskyed la /
T02D2510-2:99b-35: badzra dzi hva zhes bya ba 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:99b-36: lag pa gnyis su yang aa las zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2510-2:99b-37: 'khor re re bsams la de nyid kyi steng du
T02D2510-2:99b-38: tra gnyis las rdo rje rin po che gnyis bsam
T02D2510-2:99b-39: zhing sor mo'i rtse mo rnams rdo rje nor bu
T02D2510-2:100a-1: gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2510-2:100a-2: de la yi ge h'um las rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bdag nyid bsams te /
T02D2510-2:100a-3: aom ghi badzra sa ma ya h'um bam zhes zlos shing khro bo ti r'inti ri bcing bar bya'o //

T02D2510-2:100a-8: yi ge h'um gis ti r'anti ri bcings te /
T02D2510-2:100a-9: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um aa bhi
T02D2510-2:100a-10: shinytsa m'am zhes brjod cing rdo rje bsdams pa nang
T02D2510-2:100a-11: du bcings pa'i mthe bong gnyis gzhi bas te /
T02D2510-2:100a-12: rdo rje khu tshur gyi steng du 'jog pa ni rdo rje ti rinti ri ste /
T02D2510-2:100a-14: phyogs bzhir rdo rje phreng ba bcing ba'i tshul gyis bskor te /
T02D2510-2:100a-15: dbral ba'i phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:100a-16: snga ma bzhin du go cha bcings te /
T02D2510-2:100a-17: mthar mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par byas nas /

T02D2510-2:103a-18: de nas rang gi snying po len gsum bzlas la /
T02D2510-2:103a-19: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod cing /
T02D2510-2:103a-20: lha thams cad kyi sku dang /
T02D2510-2:103a-21: gsung dang thugs bdag yin no zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:103a-22: de nas aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes zlos
T02D2510-2:103a-23: shing gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i chos bdag med pa'i
T02D2510-2:103a-25: aom sarbba sa mo& ham zhes brjod cing /
T02D2510-2:103a-26: chos bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis lha thams
T02D2510-2:103a-27: cad bdag nyid dang lhan cig tha mi dad par
T02D2510-2:103a-29: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i sku dang /
T02D2510-2:103a-30: gsung dang thugs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:103a-31: gzhung 'di tsam gyis rnal 'byor chen po rdzogs pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:103a-32: da ni gnas kyi nges pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D2510-2:103a-33: de la sngags pa'i rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02D2510-2:103a-34: rigs kyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po dang /
T02D2510-2:103a-35: de'i mdun du nor bu'i mtshan ma dang /
T02D2510-2:103a-36: g-yas phyogs su rin chen rgyal po dang /
T02D2510-2:103a-37: g-yon phyogs su rin chen chags pa dang /
T02D2510-2:103a-38: rgyab tu rin chen legs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:103a-39: yang rnal 'byor pa'i dpral ba'i phyogs su rin chen lta ba dang /
T02D2510-2:103a-40: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur pa'i phreng ba dang /
T02D2510-2:103a-41: mgo bo'i rgyab tu rin chen nyi ma dang /
T02D2510-2:103a-42: phrag pa gnyis su rin chen dpal /
T02D2510-2:103a-43: so'i phreng ba gnyis la rin chen bzhad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:103a-44: lkog ma'i phyogs su rin chen padma 'dzin dang /
T02D2510-2:103b-0: @103b gtong pa ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po'o //
T02D2510-2:103b-1: nu ma gnyis kyi bar du rin chen rnon po /
T02D2510-2:103b-3: lce la rin chen gsung ba'o //
T02D2510-2:103b-4: spyi bor rin chen char 'bebs dang /
T02D2510-2:103b-6: nam tshong gnyis su rin chen go cha /
T02D2510-2:103b-8: dkur nor bu'i khu tshur ro //
T02D2510-2:103b-9: nor bu'i mtshan ma'i g-yon phyogs su nor bu sgeg mo /
T02D2510-2:103b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin
T02D2510-2:103b-11: po che phreng pa'i g-yon du rin chen phreng ba
T02D2510-2:103b-12: ma / gtod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po /
T02D2510-2:103b-13: g-yon du rin chen glu ma /
T02D2510-2:103b-14: nor bu mchod pa'i g-yon du rin chen gar ma'o //
T02D2510-2:103b-15: yang rnal 'byor pa'i gsang ba'i gnas su rin chen bdug pa ma /
T02D2510-2:103b-16: mgo bor rin chen me tog ma /
T02D2510-2:103b-17: mig gnyis la rin chen mar me ma /
T02D2510-2:103b-18: nu ma dang brang dang snying gar rin chen byug pa ma /
T02D2510-2:103b-19: brlag g-yas pa la rin chen lcags kyu /
T02D2510-2:103b-20: brla g-yon pa la rin chen zhags pa /
T02D2510-2:103b-21: byin pa g-yas pa la rin chen lcags sgrog /
T02D2510-2:103b-22: byin pa g-yon pa la rin chen 'bebs pa rnams yang dag par bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:103b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yan lag thams cad
T02D2510-2:103b-24: la chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa bzhin du bzhugs
T02D2510-2:103b-25: so // nyin re bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:103b-26: de ltar rnal 'byor chen po byas nas thun bzhi'i
T02D2510-2:103b-27: sbyor bas thams cad kyi sngags 'bum bzlas la bsgrub
T02D2510-2:103b-28: par bya ba'am / yang na rang gi snying gar
T02D2510-2:103b-29: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:103b-30: las bshad pa'i tshul gyis don thams cad grub pa'i
T02D2510-2:103b-34: lo gcig gi bar du ji srid dkyil 'khor mngon
T02D2510-2:103b-35: sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar
T02D2510-2:103b-37: yang na ji skad bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po bsgrubs nas /
T02D2510-2:103b-38: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2510-2:103b-39: nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas te /
T02D2510-2:103b-40: mig ni g-yon dang g-yas pa nyid dag la //
T02D2510-2:103b-41: aa med ta dang ma las nyi zla dgod //
T02D2510-2:103b-42: h'um las mig 'bras bskal pa'i me lta bu //
T02D2510-2:103b-43: tshul du gnas pa rdo rje'i lta ba bya //
T02D2510-2:103b-44: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um las 'bar ba'i rdo rje /
T02D2510-2:103b-45: rdo rje'i lte ba la yi ge'i sa bon dang
T02D2510-2:103b-46: bcas pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrug par bsam par
T02D2510-2:104a-1: /'od zer 'bar bdes sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad thal bar byas la /
T02D2510-2:104a-2: de nas nam mkha'i phyogs su stong gsum pa'i sangs
T02D2510-2:104a-3: rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad dang mnyam pa'i zla ba'i
T02D2510-2:104a-4: mdog can gyi yi ge kham rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2510-2:104a-5: kyi rang bzhin 'o ma can gyi chu dang mtshungs
T02D2510-2:104a-6: pa'i bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun gyis bsregs pa'i sangs
T02D2510-2:104a-7: rgyas kyi zhing rnams bkrus nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
T02D2510-2:104a-8: gyi bar du dpa' rlabs 'khrug pa'i phreng ba can
T02D2510-2:104a-9: gyi rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su yi ge ram
T02D2510-2:104a-10: bskal pa'i me dang mtshungs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:104a-11: yi ge ram des chu bskol bas rin po che
T02D2510-2:104a-12: chen po'i padma'i rgyal po dpag tshad bye ba du
T02D2510-2:104a-13: ma'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i gzugs yongs su gyur pa
T02D2510-2:104a-14: de rin po che padma mtha' yas pas yongs su
T02D2510-2:104a-15: bskor ba'i padma de'i rtsa ba'i yi ge pra gser
T02D2510-2:104a-16: gyi mdog can las gser gyi rus sbal tshad gzhal
T02D2510-2:104a-17: du med pa padma'i gzhir gyur pa'o //
T02D2510-2:104a-18: yang padma'i lte bar yi ge pra gser gyi mdog can dang /
T02D2510-2:104a-19: yi ge kham rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin
T02D2510-2:104a-20: nam mkha'i phyogs nas 'ongs nas gnas par bsam par
T02D2510-2:104a-21: bya'o // de nas padma dang yi ge pra dang
T02D2510-2:104a-22: yi ge kham gcig tu gyur pa las h'um sum
T02D2510-2:104a-23: h'um zhes brjod pas ri'i rgyal po ri rab chen
T02D2510-2:104a-24: po zur bzhi pa rin po che sna bzhi'i rang
T02D2510-2:104a-25: bya'o // bzhin can / rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:104a-26: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa sal reg par byas te /
T02D2510-2:104a-27: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:104a-28: de nas rin chen rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgya don
T02D2510-2:104a-29: thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po sbrul la
T02D2510-2:104a-30: / rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su aa sam
T02D2510-2:104a-31: ai zhes bya bas seng ge dang padma'i gdan la
T02D2510-2:104a-32: / / h'um gga h'um zhes bya bas mi bskyod pa'i gnas su glang po che'i gdan dang /
T02D2510-2:104a-33: tra pam tra zhes bya bas rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rta'i gdan dang /
T02D2510-2:104a-34: hri mam hri zhes bya ba las 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su rma bya'i gdan dang /
T02D2510-2:104a-35: aam gga aa zhes bya bas don yod grub pa'i gnas su nam mkha' lding gi gdan te /
T02D2510-2:104a-36: de rnams la aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:104a-38: rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu las bshad pa'i tshogs
T02D2510-2:104a-39: mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'i rim gyis
T02D2510-2:104a-40: mngon par sangs rgyas nas ri rab kyi steng du
T02D2510-2:104b-0: babs te / de bzhin gshegs @104b pa thams cad
T02D2510-2:104b-1: kyi gdan la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
T02D2510-2:104b-2: yongs su bskor te gnas so //
T02D2510-2:104b-4: rdo rje rin chen gnyis dang /
T02D2510-2:104b-6: rdo rje las gnyis ji lta ba bzhin du bskyed nas /
T02D2510-2:104b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i dbus na
T02D2510-2:104b-8: bzhugs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dang
T02D2510-2:104b-9: por sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
T02D2510-2:104b-11: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas
T02D2510-2:104b-12: rin po che'i rigs kyi don thams cad grub pa'i
T02D2510-2:104b-13: dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i phyir bdag nyid la gsol ba
T02D2510-2:104b-15: de nas don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2510-2:104b-16: gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas /
T02D2510-2:104b-17: aom badzra ratna h'um zhes brjod cing /
T02D2510-2:104b-18: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por sbrul pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:104b-19: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:104b-20: pa thams cad la dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o
T02D2510-2:104b-21: // de nas rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2510-2:104b-25: rdo rje sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2510-2:104b-26: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta a'a sha pa ri p'u ra na ma h'a ratna h'um /
T02D2510-2:104b-31: zhes bya ba'i rig pa dam pa lnga po de
T02D2510-2:104b-32: rnams kyis 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos don thams
T02D2510-2:104b-33: cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskyed pa'i rgyur
T02D2510-2:104b-34: gyur pa 'di byin gyis brlab pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:104b-35: de nas 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po dang bdag
T02D2510-2:104b-36: nyid tha mi dad par 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying
T02D2510-2:104b-37: po'i rang bzhin du nges par byas nas /
T02D2510-2:104b-38: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo
T02D2510-2:104b-39: rje nor bu rin po che las don thams cad
T02D2510-2:104b-40: grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs yid kyis phyung
T02D2510-2:104b-41: la 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam sprin rgya mtsho
T02D2510-2:104b-42: thams cad du rin po che'i rigs dang ldan pa'i
T02D2510-2:104b-43: sems can gyi khams thams cad rin po che'i rigs
T02D2510-2:104b-44: kyi rang bzhin du bskyed nas /
T02D2510-2:104b-45: slar log ste rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-2:104b-46: po'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i
T02D2510-2:104b-47: skyil mo krung gis bzhugs te /
T02D2510-2:104b-48: lha thams cad kyi gzugs kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
T02D2510-2:104b-49: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02D2510-2:104b-50: rin chen thams cad bsdus pa ni //
T02D2510-2:105a-3: aom buddha ratna h'um zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2510-2:105a-4: aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa:/
T02D2510-2:105a-5: zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D2510-2:105a-6: sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa
T02D2510-2:105a-7: rnams kyis rang gi snyid po 'di brjod cing /
T02D2510-2:105a-8: de dag rang gi gnas su gzhug par bsgom par
T02D2510-2:105a-9: bya'o zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni don
T02D2510-2:105a-10: thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:105a-11: rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis
T02D2510-2:105a-12: pa yin no // de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi
T02D2510-2:105a-13: dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas bsdu
T02D2510-2:105a-14: pa yin no // ba byas te / de bzhin
T02D2510-2:105a-15: du rang la dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i cho
T02D2510-2:105a-16: ga thams cad rjes su spyad pa 'di ni don
T02D2510-2:105a-17: thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i las kyi
T02D2510-2:105a-18: mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa bshad
T02D2510-2:105a-19: pa yin no // ba byas te / pa yin
T02D2510-2:105a-20: no // de ltar ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum
T02D2510-2:105a-21: bsgoms nas yang don thams cad grub pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2510-2:105a-22: pa yin no // ba byas te / pa yin
T02D2510-2:105a-23: no // pas ; don thams cad grub pa'i gnas
T02D2510-2:105a-25: de nas don kun sgrub byed pa'i //
T02D2510-2:105a-26: phyag rgya chen po lhur bcings nas //
T02D2510-2:105a-27: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'dis //
T02D2510-2:105a-28: lan cig par du brjod par bya //
T02D2510-2:105a-29: de nas sgo rnams thams cad du //
T02D2510-2:105a-30: lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas //
T02D2510-2:105a-31: las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis //
T02D2510-2:105a-32: dam tshig mchog ni gzhug par bya //
T02D2510-2:105a-33: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang //
T02D2510-2:105a-34: sangs rgyas rin chen la sogs pas //
T02D2510-2:105a-35: de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub //
T02D2510-2:105a-36: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes rab brjod //
T02D2510-2:105a-38: snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02D2510-2:105a-42: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes bya bas /
T02D2510-2:105a-43: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la mchod yon phul la /
T02D2510-2:105a-44: aom pra ba ra satk'a ra pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2510-2:105a-45: zhes bya bas snga ma bzhin du zhabs bsil dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:105a-46: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2510-2:105a-47: aom buddha ratna h'um dri shya dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D2510-2:105a-50: aom buddha ratna zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:105a-51: de bzhin du rin chen 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2510-2:105a-52: aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa dri shya dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D2510-2:105b-0: aom ma ni ratna @105b a'a be sha aa zhes
T02D2510-2:105b-1: bya ba'i bar du lan gsum brjod pas thams cad
T02D2510-2:105b-3: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po
T02D2510-2:105b-4: rnams kyis thams cad rgyas btab la dbang bskur ba'i
T02D2510-2:105b-5: phyag rgya gnyis kyis ji lta ba bzhin du dbang
T02D2510-2:105b-6: bskur te / yang mchod yon dbul ba sngon du
T02D2510-2:105b-7: 'gro bas mchod pa rnam ba lnga la sogs pa'i
T02D2510-2:105b-8: mchod pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la
T02D2510-2:105b-9: bskur te / phyag byas te / bcom ldan 'das
T02D2510-2:105b-10: rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la
T02D2510-2:105b-11: bskur te / phyag byas te / / aom badzra a'atma ko& ham /
T02D2510-2:105b-12: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D2510-2:105b-14: zhes zlos shing don rnam pa gsum bsgoms la /
T02D2510-2:105b-15: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rang
T02D2510-2:105b-16: bzhin bdag nyid yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed par
T02D2510-2:105b-17: bya'o // aom sarbba aa ratha si ddhi pra ta h'um zhes brjod cing /
T02D2510-2:105b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni bdag nyid yin no zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:105b-19: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas ji srid dkyil
T02D2510-2:105b-20: 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs su bdag nyid mngon sum du
T02D2510-2:105b-21: mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du nyin
T02D2510-2:105b-22: re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:105b-23: de nas dkyil 'khor gyis spyad ba dang /
T02D2510-2:105b-24: sa yongs su gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:105b-25: de nas bdag nyid khrus bya zhing //
T02D2510-2:105b-26: lus dris byugs la ji snyed pa'i gos dang rgyan gang gas shing gdong dri zhim par byas la /
T02D2510-2:105b-27: dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug ste /
T02D2510-2:105b-28: rin po che'i rgyu'i phyag rgyas rang gi dkyil 'khor chen po sbrul la /
T02D2510-2:105b-30: phyag bya ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i
T02D2510-2:105b-31: sdom pa gzung ba byas la snga ma bzhin du
T02D2510-2:105b-32: rnal 'byor chen po yang dag par bsgrubs te /
T02D2510-2:105b-33: khang bu brtsegs pa dang gdan rnams sprul la ;
T02D2510-2:105b-34: dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
T02D2510-2:105b-35: bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:105b-36: deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02D2510-2:105b-37: bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas //
T02D2510-2:105b-38: lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam pas //
T02D2510-2:105b-39: gyur par bdag ni the tshom med //
T02D2510-2:105b-40: byang chub sems dang sems gcig las //
T02D2510-2:105b-41: mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te //
T02D2510-2:105b-42: nor bu chen po'i rigs su ni //
T02D2510-2:105b-43: deng bdag skyes par the tshom med //
T02D2510-2:105b-44: deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste //
T02D2510-2:105b-45: bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med //
T02D2510-2:105b-46: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i //
T02D2510-2:105b-47: deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no //
T02D2510-2:106a-1: lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la /
T02D2510-2:106a-2: spos snod lag tu thogs te /
T02D2510-2:106a-3: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:106a-4: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yis //
T02D2510-2:106a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //

T02D2510-2:123a-22: gnyis su gyur pa der gter yod par shes par
T02D2510-2:123a-23: // 'gyur te / der bcings de ni gnyis 'gyur na //
T02D2510-2:123a-24: gter ni yod par shes par bya //
T02D2510-2:123a-26: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni //
T02D2510-2:123a-27: gter rnams kun du btsal nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:123a-29: snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'am /
T02D2510-2:123a-30: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor bya ba la phyis de'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2510-2:123a-31: rin chen nor bu la sogs pa de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2510-2:123a-32: rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje nor bu'i dbus su /
T02D2510-2:123a-33: aom ma h'a ratna pa ri ksha bi shu ddhi
T02D2510-2:123a-34: ya bi sha / zhas bya ba yid kyis bris
T02D2510-2:123a-35: te / snga ma bzhin du bsgrub pa byas nas /
T02D2510-2:123a-36: gang la re bar gyur pa de na gter yod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:123a-37: de la ji srid du bsgoms pa de'i babs par gyur pa de'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:123a-38: de na gter ni yod par bshad //
T02D2510-2:123a-40: dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:123a-41: gter rnams kun du btsal nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:123a-42: zhes bya ba ni rin chen lta ba'am /
T02D2510-2:123a-43: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-2:123a-44: de dang de'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2510-2:123a-45: rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje nor bu rin po che'i dbus su /
T02D2510-2:123a-46: aom ratna sa ma ya tre dha darsha ya zhes
T02D2510-2:123a-47: yid kyis bris nas snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs te
T02D2510-2:123b-0: / gter gyi gnas su ji srid @123b du bsgoms
T02D2510-2:123b-1: pa de'i tshe phyag rgya dgrol bar mi nus par
T02D2510-2:123b-2: 'gyur ba de na gter yod par shes par bya'o
T02D2510-2:123b-3: / // ting nge 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni //
T02D2510-2:123b-4: de rnams kun nas btsal nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:123b-5: zhes bya ba ni rin chen padma dang /
T02D2510-2:123b-6: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-2:123b-7: phyis ratna pa ri ksha dzny'a na a'a be sha /
T02D2510-2:123b-8: zhes bya ba lta ba la yid kyis bris te /
T02D2510-2:123b-9: snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs nas ji srid bsgoms pa de'i tshe gter rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:123b-10: las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:123b-11: gter rnams kun du btsal du nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:123b-12: zhes bya ba la rin chen char 'bebs sam /
T02D2510-2:123b-13: rin chen mchod pa la sogs pa de'i rigs kyi
T02D2510-2:123b-14: rnal 'byor byas la rin chen char 'bebs sam de'i
T02D2510-2:123b-15: rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2510-2:123b-16: rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje nor bu rin chen char 'bebs bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:123b-18: aom ma ni karmma bhra ma ya zhes bya ba
T02D2510-2:123b-19: ni yid kyis bris la snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs
T02D2510-2:123b-20: na / gnas gang du gter yod pa yin no zhes /
T02D2510-2:123b-21: 'jig rten phal cher re bar 'gyur ba der /
T02D2510-2:123b-22: ji srid bsgoms pa de'i tshe las kyi phyag rgya 'khor bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:123b-23: de nas de na gter yod par shes par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:123b-24: de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par
T02D2510-2:123b-25: bya'o zhes bya ba ni gter gyi lha dang mnyam
T02D2510-2:123b-26: par sbyor bas / bsgom pa gsang ba'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:123b-27: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la //
T02D2510-2:123b-28: gter rnams kun du tshol byed cing //
T02D2510-2:123b-29: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'am /
T02D2510-2:123b-30: nor bu'i mtshan ma la sogs pa de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-2:123b-31: de nas rang gi snying gar rdo rje nor bu
T02D2510-2:123b-32: bsams la de'i dbus su aom ma ni yo ga
T02D2510-2:123b-33: a'a be sha / zhes bya ba yid kyis bris
T02D2510-2:123b-34: te / don thams cad grub pa dang /
T02D2510-2:123b-35: de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la snga ma bzhin du bsgrub pa dang /
T02D2510-2:123b-36: gter gyi gnas su cho ga thams cad rjes su
T02D2510-2:123b-37: spyad la gter gyi lha dang lha mo'i gzugs su
T02D2510-2:123b-39: ji srid du ltan cig mnyam par sbyor bas bsgoms
T02D2510-2:123b-40: pa de srid babs par gyur nas mngon sum mthong
T02D2510-2:123b-41: bar 'gyur ro // dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:123b-42: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rin chen lta ba 'am /
T02D2510-2:124a-0: @124a * // de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la rin chen lta
T02D2510-2:124a-1: ba dang de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te
T02D2510-2:124a-2: / rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje rin po che la /
T02D2510-2:124a-3: aom sa ma ya san yo ga dri dho me bha ba zhes bya ba yid kyis bris te /
T02D2510-2:124a-4: snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs la gter gyi gnas su cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:124a-5: ji srid du gter gyi lha dang lhan cig tu bsgoms pa de mngon sum lta bur 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:124a-6: de ltar bsgoms nas phyag rgya gang du bstan par
T02D2510-2:124a-7: gyur pa na gter gyi lha mthong ba'i tshul gyis
T02D2510-2:124a-8: gter yod pa'i phyogs der ston par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:124a-9: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la //
T02D2510-2:124a-10: gter rnams kun du tshol byed cing //
T02D2510-2:124a-11: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rin chen padma'am de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-2:124a-12: aom ni di dzny'a na a'a be sha m'a ma
T02D2510-2:124a-13: yo ga / zhes lce la yid kyis bris te
T02D2510-2:124a-14: / snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs pa byas la /
T02D2510-2:124a-15: gter yod pa'i gnas su song nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:124a-16: ji srid du gter gyi lha dang mnyam par sbyor
T02D2510-2:124a-17: bar bsgoms pa de srid du gter mthong bar 'gyur
T02D2510-2:124a-18: ro // dbang po gnyis kyi ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2510-2:124a-19: las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni //
T02D2510-2:124a-20: zhes bya ba la rin chen char 'bebs pa'am /
T02D2510-2:124a-21: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-2:124a-22: rdo rje nor bu char 'bebs rang gi snying gar bsams la /
T02D2510-2:124a-24: aom sarbba karmma spho ta sa ma yo ga zhes
T02D2510-2:124a-25: bya ba yid kyis bris la snga ma bzhin du
T02D2510-2:124a-26: bsgrub te / rin chen char 'bebs sam /
T02D2510-2:124a-27: de'i rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2510-2:124a-28: phyis gter gyi gnas su song la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-2:124a-29: gter gyi lha dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyor bas
T02D2510-2:124a-30: ji srid du bsgoms pa de'i tshe phyag rgya gnyis
T02D2510-2:124a-31: su 'gyur te / rang grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:124a-32: de nas gter gyi lha grub par gyur pa des gter ston pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:124a-33: de ltar dngos grub kyi ye shes bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:124a-34: da ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-2:124a-35: po las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams don thams cad
T02D2510-2:124a-36: grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i phyag
T02D2510-2:124b-0: rgya bzhi po rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin @124b
T02D2510-2:124b-1: du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la bsgrubs te
T02D2510-2:124b-2: / mdun du lha spyan drangs nas rang gi phyag
T02D2510-2:124b-3: rgya bzhi po rnams kyis rgyas btab la bsgrub pa
T02D2510-2:124b-4: / na / sgrub pa po spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2510-2:124b-5: phyag rgya'i 'bras bu bstan par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:124b-6: de nas nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgya thams
T02D2510-2:124b-7: cad kyi ye shes bslab po zhes bya ba gsungs
T02D2510-2:124b-8: la / de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
T02D2510-2:124b-9: dngos grub kyi ye shes bstan pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-2:124b-10: chen po yang yin la nor bu'i rigs kyang yin pas na /
T02D2510-2:124b-11: nor bu'i rigs chen po ste /
T02D2510-2:124b-12: don yod par grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
T02D2510-2:124b-13: de la thams cad ni phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D2510-2:124b-15: dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya rnams so //
T02D2510-2:124b-16: de rnams kyi ye shes su nges pa de bslab par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:124b-17: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings pa ni 'di yin te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:124b-18: phyag rgya chen po bcings pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D2510-2:124b-19: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug nas so //
T02D2510-2:124b-20: ji lta ba yi ri mo bzhin //
T02D2510-2:124b-22: 'dri mkhan gyis ji lta ba'i ri mo'i rjes su 'brangs nas ji lta ba bzhin bri ba'o //
T02D2510-2:124b-24: ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:124b-25: nor bu rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i sku'i
T02D2510-2:124b-26: gsang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i cho
T02D2510-2:124b-27: gar gsungs pa de'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs
T02D2510-2:124b-28: nas / bdag nyid kyang sku'i gsang ba'i rang bzhin rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa bsgoms te /
T02D2510-2:124b-29: yang dang yang du mngon du bya ba yin no //
T02D2510-2:124b-30: de gang gi yin zhe na /
T02D2510-2:124b-31: phyag rgya chen po zhes smos te /
T02D2510-2:124b-34: don gyi mchog kun grub par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:124b-36: don yang yin la kun kyang yin pas na don gyi mchog kun te /
T02D2510-2:124b-37: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin gyi mthar thug pa'o //
T02D2510-2:124b-38: de'i mchog gi dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po
T02D2510-2:124b-39: mngon sum du byas nas de rtogs par bsgom pa'o
T02D2510-2:124b-41: rdo rje nor bu myu gu dang /
T02D2510-2:125a-2: rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs kyi phyag rgya chen po ni /
T02D2510-2:125a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang /
T02D2510-2:125a-5: gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying
T02D2510-2:125a-6: po dang nor bu'i mchod pa rnams kyi phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:125a-7: chen po nyid kyis shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:125a-8: de nas zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2510-2:125a-9: la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi 'bras
T02D2510-2:125a-11: sangs rgyas phyag rgya sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D2510-2:125a-12: ces bya ba la rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag
T02D2510-2:125a-13: rgya chen po ni sangs rgyas phyag rgya chen po
T02D2510-2:125a-14: ste / de sangs rgyas nyid 'grub pa ster ba'o //
T02D2510-2:125a-15: dngos grub zab mo 'di la mnga' bas na rab grub po //
T02D2510-2:125a-16: gang gi phyag rgya yin zhe na //
T02D2510-2:125a-18: don thams cad grub pa dang /
T02D2510-2:125a-19: nor bu'i mtshan ma dag gi phyag rgya chen po
T02D2510-2:125a-20: de rnams rab tu 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i
T02D2510-2:125a-21: tha tshig go ; / rin chen lcags kyu ni /
T02D2510-2:125a-22: rin chen rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02D2510-2:125a-23: des phyogs bcu kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa spyan 'dres par byed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:125a-24: nor bu dga' ba ni nor bu chags pa chen po ste /
T02D2510-2:125a-25: nor bu'i chags pas rjes su dga' bar byed pas
T02D2510-2:125a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa sems can gyi
T02D2510-2:125a-27: khams la rjes su dga' bar byed pa dang /
T02D2510-2:125a-28: sgrub pa po'i bka' bzhin byed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:125a-29: nor bu legs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni nor bu'i mgu ba'o //
T02D2510-2:125a-30: shin tu mgu bar byed pas na rab tu mgu
T02D2510-2:125a-31: ba phul du byung ba byed ces bya ba'i byed
T02D2510-2:125a-32: ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-2:125a-33: nor bu lta ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni nor bu'i lta ba'o //
T02D2510-2:125a-34: nor 'phrog ba ni dbang bskur ba la sogs pa bkug nas /
T02D2510-2:125a-35: rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba ni de
T02D2510-2:125a-36: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i nor bu'i
T02D2510-2:125a-37: phreng ba ste / de'i phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa de ni nor bu'i dbang bskur ba'am /
T02D2510-2:125a-38: sgrub pa po la dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2510-2:125a-39: nor bu'i nyi ma'i phyag rgya chen po ni nor
T02D2510-2:125a-40: bu'i nyi ma ste gzi brjid bzang po mnga' bas
T02D2510-2:125a-42: nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi me'i
T02D2510-2:125a-43: 'od zer de 'gyed pas na gzi brjid mchog ster
T02D2510-2:125b-0: bas @125b te ; nor bu'i nyi ma nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:125b-1: nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya chen po ni
T02D2510-2:125b-2: yid bzhin nor bu ste de ci dgar ster ba'o
T02D2510-2:125b-3: // des ci dgar sbyin pa ni gang dang gang
T02D2510-2:125b-4: gis mngon par 'dod pa'i bsgrub par bya ba de
T02D2510-2:125b-5: dang de nyid yongs su rdzags par byed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:125b-6: rin chen bzhad ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni rin chen bzhad ba ste /
T02D2510-2:125b-7: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa 'jig rten
T02D2510-2:125b-8: las 'das pa'i don 'phrog cing sgrub par byed pa'o
T02D2510-2:125b-9: // rin chen padma'i phyag rgya chen po ni rin chen mchog ste /
T02D2510-2:125b-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos de mtshan nyid kyi chos de ster ba'o ;
T02D2510-2:125b-11: / gtong ba ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi snying
T02D2510-2:125b-12: po'i phyag rgya chen po ni gtong ba mchog ste
T02D2510-2:125b-13: / zag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnyed pa dam pa 'thob pa'o //
T02D2510-2:125b-14: rin chen rnon po'i phyag rgya chen po ni rin chen ral gri ste /
T02D2510-2:125b-15: shes rab kyi ye shes chen po'i mdzod ster ba'o //
T02D2510-2:125b-16: nor bu 'khor lo'i phyag rgya chen po ni nor bu'i 'khor lo ste /
T02D2510-2:125b-17: de'i bdag po ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:125b-18: gyi bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chen po nor
T02D2510-2:125b-19: bu'i 'khor lo de ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:125b-20: rin chen gsung ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni smra
T02D2510-2:125b-21: ba stsal ba'i dngos grub ste spros pa med pa'i
T02D2510-2:125b-22: ye shes kyi dngos grub nor bu'i gsung ba nyid
T02D2510-2:125b-23: thob pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T02D2510-2:125b-24: / rin chen char 'bebs kyi phyag rgya chen po
T02D2510-2:125b-25: ni rin po che char 'bebs te /
T02D2510-2:125b-26: de nor bu chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' chen
T02D2510-2:125b-27: po rin po che'i char nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro
T02D2510-2:125b-28: // nor bu mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni nor bu chen po ste /
T02D2510-2:125b-29: de shin tu legs par mchod pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:125b-30: nor bu bsrung ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni rin chen go cha brtan par byed pa ste /
T02D2510-2:125b-31: phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus ni nor bu'i bsrung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-2:125b-32: nor bu gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya chen po ni nor bu'i mche ba gzung ba dang /
T02D2510-2:125b-33: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'joms pas na de'i nor 'phrog pa'o //
T02D2510-2:125b-34: nor bu'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya chen po ni
T02D2510-2:125b-35: khu tshur des nor bu'i dngos grub thob pa ste
T02D2510-2:125b-36: / de mngon sum du byas pas de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:125b-37: pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i
T02D2510-2:126a-1: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'ang zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-2:126a-2: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam
T02D2510-2:126a-3: tshig 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2510-2:126a-4: rgya'o // rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam
T02D2510-2:126a-5: tshig gi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni ye
T02D2510-2:126a-7: rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya ni //
T02D2510-2:126a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur thob //
T02D2510-2:126a-9: ces bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:126a-10: chen po'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying
T02D2510-2:126a-11: po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gang yin pa de
T02D2510-2:126a-12: ni rdo rje rin chen gyi bdag nyid kyis sangs
T02D2510-2:126a-13: rgyas thams cad la dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab
T02D2510-2:126a-14: ste / de'i mtshan nyid ni rdo rje bsdams pa
T02D2510-2:126a-15: las mthe bong gnyis bsnyams la mdzub mo gnyis bkug
T02D2510-2:126a-16: pa'i rtse mo sprad pa ni rdo rje rin chen
T02D2510-2:126a-17: ste / te / rdo rje rin chen de nyid 'ching ba'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D2510-2:126a-18: aom badzra ratna h'um zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang bskur ba sbyin no ;
T02D2510-2:126a-19: / rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las
T02D2510-2:126a-20: bshad pa'i 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rnal 'byor

T02D2510-2:129a-24: // rdo rje bsdams te 'khor lo bya //
T02D2510-2:129a-25: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:129a-26: gyi bdag po ster bar byed pa'i rdo rje rab
T02D2510-2:129a-27: tu sbyin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:129a-28: de nyid thal mo'i tshul du byas //
T02D2510-2:129a-29: kha nas 'dren par byas pa ni //
T02D2510-2:129a-31: nor bu 'khor lo'i dam tshig gi phyag rya nyid las /
T02D2510-2:129a-32: nor bu'i thal mo sbyar te /
T02D2510-2:129a-33: kha nas 'dren pa'i tshul du byed pa ni nor bsrung ba'i'o //
T02D2510-2:129a-34: de nyid bcings ba ni rin chen gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor pas de bcings pa'o //
T02D2510-2:129a-35: ngag yin te nor bu gsung ba'i'o //
T02D2510-2:129a-36: rang gi bkas ni rang gi tshig de nor bu gsung ba'i bka'o //
T02D2510-2:129a-37: nga rgyal gyi nor gsung bas 'phrog cing 'gugs par byed pa ste /
T02D2510-2:129a-38: rang gi rig pas byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:129a-39: rdo rje nor bu che bcings la //
T02D2510-2:129a-41: mdzub mo bsnyams te rgyab bkug pa /
T02D2510-2:129a-42: mthe bong rdo rje bcings pa ni //
T02D2510-2:129a-43: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba //
T02D2510-2:129a-44: rdo rje nor bu che zhes bshad //
T02D2510-2:129a-45: de bcings la sor mo lhag ma rnams gyen du brkyang nas /
T02D2510-2:129a-46: nor bu lta bu'i tshul gyis bskyod pa de bzhin du sor mo thams cad kyang bskyod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:129a-48: sor mo thams cad bsgreng nas ni //
T02D2510-2:129b-0: zhes @129b bya ba 'di ni rin chen char 'bebs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:129b-1: rdo rje nor bu che bcings la //
T02D2510-2:129b-2: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2510-2:129b-3: gar byas gtsug phug dbus pa bzhag nas //
T02D2510-2:129b-4: zhes bya ba ni gar byed cing spyi gtsug gi
T02D2510-2:129b-5: phyogs kyi phyogs su mchod pas yang dag par mchod
T02D2510-2:129b-6: par byed pa'o // kun la cho ga bzhin bcings nas //
T02D2510-2:129b-7: rin chen kun gyis de mchod 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:129b-8: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje nor bu chen por byas la /
T02D2510-2:129b-9: sor mo lhag ma brkyang gdong sbyar nas /
T02D2510-2:129b-10: nor bu'i tshul du btags pa'i nor bu chen po
T02D2510-2:129b-11: cho ga bzhin du yang dag par mchod pa de
T02D2510-2:129b-12: rnal 'byor pas / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-2:129b-13: la rin po che'i nor bu dngos grub thob par
T02D2510-2:129b-14: byed pa'i phyir mchod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:129b-16: rin chen char 'bebs nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings nas /
T02D2510-2:129b-17: gar byas te spyi gtsug gi dbus su gzhag pa
T02D2510-2:129b-18: 'di ni nor bu mchod pa'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2510-2:129b-19: rgya'o// don kun grub pa'i phyag rgya ni //
T02D2510-2:129b-20: mgrin pa'i phyogs su 'khyud par bya //
T02D2510-2:129b-21: nor bu bcing ba zhes bya ste //
T02D2510-2:129b-22: bsrung ba yi ni cho gar grags //
T02D2510-2:129b-23: zhes bya ba ni nor bu bsrung ba'i'o //
T02D2510-2:129b-25: rdo rje bsdams pa la mdzub mo gnyis nor bur byas nas /
T02D2510-2:129b-26: mthe bo gnyis brkyang ste kha phye la /
T02D2510-2:129b-27: rang gi mgrin pa'i phyogs su 'khyud pa ltar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:129b-28: de nyid don kun grub pa'i phyir //
T02D2510-2:129b-29: gnod sbyin tshul du khar gzhag go //
T02D2510-2:129b-30: zhes bya ba ni nor bu bsrung ba'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:129b-31: nyid las mtho bong gnyis brkyang nas khar gzhag pa
T02D2510-2:129b-32: ni nor bu mche ba zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin
T02D2510-2:129b-34: nor bu'i gnod sbyin la sogs pa don thams cad 'gugs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:129b-35: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
T02D2510-2:129b-36: mdzub bkug mthe bo gnyis kyis ni //
T02D2510-2:129b-37: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis dang rang gi
T02D2510-2:129b-38: mthe bong gnyis gdong sbyar nas legs par mnan te
T02D2510-2:129b-39: btsir ba ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig
T02D2510-2:129b-40: gi phyag rgya'o // dam tshig rnams kyi mchod mchog rnams //
T02D2510-2:129b-41: zhes bya ba ni sgeg mo la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:129b-43: rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul du ni //
T02D2510-2:129b-44: ji bzhin nor bu ldan pa yi //
T02D2510-2:129b-45: 'dir ni dam tshig mchog tu brtags //
T02D2510-2:130a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ji @130a * //
T02D2510-2:130a-2: nor bu'i rigs kyi sbyor ba ni //
T02D2510-2:130a-3: gung mo nor bu'i tshul bya bar //
T02D2510-2:130a-5: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad
T02D2510-2:130a-6: pa'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2510-2:130a-7: rgya de nyid 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgyar brtag
T02D2510-2:130a-8: par bya'o // 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:130a-9: nor bu'i mtshan ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2510-2:130a-10: mthe bong bsnyams la snying gar gzhag / rab tu brkyang bas phreng ba ma'i //
T02D2510-2:130a-11: thal mo sbyar ba kha nas dbyung //
T02D2510-2:130a-12: gar la thal sbyar spyi bor gzhag / rdo rje bcing ba thur du blugs //
T02D2510-2:130a-13: rang gi thal sbyar gyen du gtor //
T02D2510-2:130a-14: mthe bong bsnyams te rab tu bsdams //
T02D2510-2:130a-15: rab tu bskyang nas byug pa'o //
T02D2510-2:130a-16: zhes bya ba ni nor bu sgeg mo la sogs pa nas /
T02D2510-2:130a-17: nor bu'i dri chab ma la mthar thug pa'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:130a-18: 'dir rang gi thal mi ni thal mo sbyar ba
T02D2510-2:130a-19: rin po che'i thal mor gzung bar bya'o / lcags
T02D2510-2:130a-20: kyu bcing sogs tshul du ni /
T02D2510-2:130a-21: las rnams thams cad rab grub byed //
T02D2510-2:130a-22: ces bya ba ni nor bu mtshan ma'i phyag rgya de nyid bcings nas /
T02D2510-2:130a-23: mdzub mo gcig tu bkug pa dang //
T02D2510-2:130a-24: mthe bong gnyis na mdud pa dor //
T02D2510-2:130a-25: mthe bong mdzub mo gdu bur bcing //
T02D2510-2:130a-26: rdo rje bcing ba mdzub mor bsdams //
T02D2510-2:130a-27: zhes bya ba ni sgo srung rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:130a-28: de nas nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi
T02D2510-2:130a-29: phyag rgya ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-2:130a-30: chos kyi phyag rgyar nges pa ste /
T02D2510-2:130a-31: yi ge tra ni rdo rje snying po dang /
T02D2510-2:130a-33: rdo rje nor bu rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o//
T02D2510-2:130a-34: grva ni rin chen rgyal po'i'o //
T02D2510-2:130a-35: tri ni nor bu chags pa'i'o //
T02D2510-2:130a-36: hri ni nor bu legs pa'i'o //
T02D2510-2:130a-37: yi ge shri ni rin chen lta ba dang /
T02D2510-2:130a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang /
T02D2510-2:130a-39: rdo rje rin po che myu gu ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:130a-40: ai ni rin chen gzi brjid kyi'o //
T02D2510-2:130a-41: ra ni nor bu dpal gyi'o ;
T02D2510-2:130a-42: / ha ni nor bu bzhad pa'i'o //
T02D2510-2:130a-43: hri ni rin chen padma dang /
T02D2510-2:130a-44: gtong ba ting nge 'dzin ye shes snying po dang /
T02D2510-2:130a-45: rdo rje rin chen padma rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:130a-46: dhi ni rin chen rnon po'i'o //
T02D2510-2:130a-48: b'a ni nor bu gsung ba'i'o //
T02D2510-2:130b-0: rin chen chen char 'bebs pa dang nor bu'i @130b mchod pa dang /
T02D2510-2:130b-1: rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:130b-2: ha ni nor bu bsrung ba'i'o //
T02D2510-2:130b-3: ya ni nor bu gnod sbyin gyi'o //
T02D2510-2:130b-4: aa ni nor bu khu tshur gyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:130b-5: yi ge h'um rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02D2510-2:130b-6: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyi ni /

T02D2510-2:130b-8: rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams la khyad par ni 'di yin te /
T02D2510-2:130b-9: yi ge tram mthar sbyar ba'o //
T02D2510-2:130b-10: rin chen phyag rgya gnyis byas las //
T02D2510-2:130b-11: las kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya //
T02D2510-2:130b-12: zhes bya ba ni nor bu khu tshur gyi dam
T02D2510-2:130b-13: tshig gi phyag rgya de 'dir rin po che'i khu
T02D2510-2:130b-15: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02D2510-2:130b-16: rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur te /
T02D2510-2:130b-17: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i tshul gyis byas te /
T02D2510-2:130b-19: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
T02D2510-2:130b-20: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya ;
T02D2510-2:130b-21: / byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste //
T02D2510-2:130b-22: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin pa'o //
T02D2510-2:130b-23: rnam par snang mdzad kyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:130b-24: bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yi ni /
T02D2510-2:130b-25: nor bu'i mtshan ma dang rdo rje rin chen ma rnams kyi'o //
T02D2510-2:130b-26: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa ni /
T02D2510-2:130b-30: legs so sbyin pa snying gar gzhag pa ni /

T02D2510-2:130b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang /
T02D2510-2:130b-34: rdo rje rin chen myu gu ma'i'o//
T02D2510-2:130b-35: snying gar nyi ma bstan par bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:130b-37: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs pa ni rin chen dpal gyi'o //
T02D2510-2:130b-38: de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:130b-40: g-yas pa yis ni g-yon pa dbye ba ni /
T02D2510-2:130b-42: gtong ba ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi snying po dang /
T02D2510-2:130b-44: snying gar g-yon pa ral gri 'dud ni rin chen rnon po'i'o //
T02D2510-2:130b-45: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba ni nor bu 'khor lo bskor ba'i'o //
T02D2510-2:130b-46: rin chen gnyis ka kha nas dbyung ba ni /
T02D2510-2:130b-48: rin chen gar bskor bkrol ba yis //
T02D2510-2:130b-49: thal mo 'gram ba spyi bor gzhag /
T02D2510-2:131a-2: rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:131a-3: go cha ni nor bu bsrung ba'i'o //
T02D2510-2:131a-4: mthe chung mche ba ni nor bu'i gnod sbyin gyi'o //
T02D2510-2:131a-5: khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa ni /
T02D2510-2:131a-7: rin chen po spyings pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2510-2:131a-8: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par bya //
T02D2510-2:131a-10: phreng ba bcings dang ni rin chen phreng ba ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:131a-11: kha nas dbyung ni rin chen glu ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:131a-12: gar la thal sbyar spyi bor gzhag pa ni /
T02D2510-2:131a-14: rin chen khu tshur thur du blugs pa ni /
T02D2510-2:131a-16: thal mo sbyar ba gyen du gtor //
T02D2510-2:131a-18: mthe bong bsnyams te rab tu bsdams pa ni rin chen mar me ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:131a-19: rab tu brkyang nas byug pa ni /
T02D2510-2:131a-20: rin chen po dri chab ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:131a-21: mdzub mo lcag skyu bcing ba ni //
T02D2510-2:131a-22: mthe'u chung las te lcags kyu che //
T02D2510-2:131a-24: mkhrig ma mdud pa ni rin chen zhags pa'i'o //
T02D2510-2:131a-25: mdzub gnyis mdud pa ni rin chen lcags sgrog gi'o //
T02D2510-2:131a-26: rgyab gnyis kyang ni mnyam ste mnan ni rin chen 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:131a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sems can thams cad
T02D2510-2:131a-28: kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni
T02D2510-2:131a-29: mtshan nyid can gyi las ni de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-2:131a-32: nor bu'i rigs de nyid kyi rtogs pa chen po ni rtog pa las byung ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:131a-33: de ston par byed pa'i tshig gi tshogs la yang rtog pa chen po zhes bya ste /
T02D2510-2:131a-34: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs
T02D2510-2:131a-35: par byed pa'i las kyi rtog pa thams cad zil
T02D2510-2:131a-36: gyis mnan nas mdzes shing 'bar bar byed pas na
T02D2510-2:131a-37: / rgyal po ste de'i phyir rtog pa'i rgyal po'o //
T02D2510-2:131a-38: de bas na don thams cad grub pa zhes bya
T02D2510-2:131a-39: ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs
T02D2510-2:131a-40: so zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi don
T02D2510-2:131a-41: mthar thug pa'o // 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i 'grel pa /
T02D2510-2:131a-42: de kho na nyid snang bar byed pa las don
T02D2510-2:131a-43: thams cad grub par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i
T02D2510-2:131a-46: // / de ltar phyag rgya chen po gtso bor gyur
T02D2510-2:131b-0: pa'i nor @131b bu'i rigs chen pos 'dul ba'i sems
T02D2510-2:131b-1: can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir don thams cad grub
T02D2510-2:131b-2: pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:131b-3: da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur
T02D2510-2:131b-4: ba'i nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba'i
T02D2510-2:131b-5: sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:131b-6: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-2:131b-7: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2510-2:131b-8: dang por sbyor ba'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2510-2:131b-9: 'dir dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni don
T02D2510-2:131b-10: thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dang
T02D2510-2:131b-11: por sbyor ba nyid yin no //
T02D2510-2:131b-12: yang gi sgra ni zlos pa'i don te don thams
T02D2510-2:131b-13: cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la ltos pa'o
T02D2510-2:131b-14: // bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2510-2:131b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba ni
T02D2510-2:131b-16: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por rtogs
T02D2510-2:131b-17: pa rnam par snang mdzad nas rdo rje rin chen
T02D2510-2:131b-19: de'i gzungs ni de'i rigs te /
T02D2510-2:131b-20: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje
T02D2510-2:131b-21: rin chen char 'bebs ma'i mthar thug pa gnyis su
T02D2510-2:131b-23: shes rab yang dag par ldan pa'i sems so //
T02D2510-2:131b-24: de dag gi dam tshig ni bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2510-2:131b-25: par snang mdzad kyi nor bu'i rigs chen po'i gzungs
T02D2510-2:131b-27: de las byung ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i
T02D2510-2:131b-28: thugs ka'i rdo rje rin po che gang las byung
T02D2510-2:131b-29: ba de la de skad ces bya ste /
T02D2510-2:131b-30: des byin gyis brlabs pa ni brtan par byas pa'o //
T02D2510-2:131b-31: gang dang gang gis don gyi rjes su song ba'i
T02D2510-2:131b-32: ting nge 'dzin ming de skad ces bya ba la
T02D2510-2:131b-33: snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi phyag rgya 'chad par
T02D2510-2:131b-34: 'gyur ba 'di dag gis gsungs shing bshad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:131b-35: nor bu'i rigs chen po rang gi gzungs kyi dkyil
T02D2510-2:131b-36: 'khor sprul pa'i phyir 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i
T02D2510-2:131b-37: thugs ka'i rdo rje nor bu'i rnam par thugs rtse
T02D2510-2:131b-38: gcig tu mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2510-2:131b-39: mdzad kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs
T02D2510-2:131b-40: so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:131b-41: rang gi rigs las byung ba ni don thams cad
T02D2510-2:131b-42: grub pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i rgyu rang
T02D2510-2:131b-43: gi rigs yang dag par byung ba ni 'dir phyag
T02D2510-2:131b-44: na rdo rje'i rig pa lags so //
T02D2510-2:131b-45: de bzhin du rdo rje snying po dang /
T02D2510-2:132a-2: rdo rje sna tshogs rnams kyis rang gi phyag rgya gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:132a-5: rin chen char 'bebs rnams gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02D2510-2:132a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i
T02D2510-2:132a-7: thugs ka'i rdo rje rin po che las rang gi
T02D2510-2:132a-8: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad sprul pa'i phyir de
T02D2510-2:132a-9: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sngar bgad pa'i tshul
T02D2510-2:132a-10: gyis dbul bar bya'o zhes shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:132a-11: de la de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2510-2:132a-12: aom sarbba aa bhi sheka p'u dza sa ma ya
T02D2510-2:132a-13: h'um zhes bya ba ni mthar thug pa'i gzhung 'di
T02D2510-2:132a-14: tsam gyis ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil
T02D2510-2:132a-15: 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2510-2:132a-16: gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:132a-17: de nas bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa la
T02D2510-2:132a-18: sogs pa'i las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i

T02D2510-2:140b-24: ba'i gnas su rdo rje rin chen phreng ba ma'i'o
T02D2510-2:140b-25: / // de nyid rdo rje nyi ma bskor //
T02D2510-2:140b-26: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen phreng ba
T02D2510-2:140b-27: ma'i phyag rgya nyid snying gar nyi ma'i tshul gyis
T02D2510-2:140b-28: bskor ba 'di ni nor bu nyi ma'i gnas kyi
T02D2510-2:140b-29: nor bu rin chen nyi ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:140b-30: dpung pa spyi bor brkyang bar bya //
T02D2510-2:140b-31: zhes bya ba ni rin chen phreng ba ma'i phyag
T02D2510-2:140b-32: rgya nyid las dpung pa brkyang nas spyi bor gzhag
T02D2510-2:140b-33: pa 'di ni nor bu dang las kyi gnas su
T02D2510-2:140b-34: nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi
T02D2510-2:140b-35: nor bu zla ba'i rgyal mtshan mchog ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:140b-36: bzhad pa'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni rdo rje
T02D2510-2:140b-37: rin chen phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya nyid las bzhad
T02D2510-2:140b-38: pa'i tshul du yongs su bskor ba ni nor bu
T02D2510-2:140b-39: rin chen bzhad pa'i gnas su nor bu rin chen
T02D2510-2:140b-40: bzhad pa ma'i'o // rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:140b-41: mdzub mo srin lag gyen du bsgreng //
T02D2510-2:140b-43: gung mo gnyis ni nor bur byas //
T02D2510-2:140b-44: rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis dang srin
T02D2510-2:140b-45: lag gnyis padma 'dra bar byas la gung mo gnyis
T02D2510-2:140b-46: nor bur byas pa 'di ni rin chen padma'i gnas
T02D2510-2:140b-47: su nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:141a-2: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i ting nge 'dzin padma'i
T02D2510-2:141a-3: phyag rgya nyid la'ang tha ma sbyin pa gtong ba'i
T02D2510-2:141a-4: tshul du byed pa 'di ni gtong ba ting nge
T02D2510-2:141a-5: 'dzin ye shes kyi snying po'i gnas kyi nor bu
T02D2510-2:141a-6: rin chen gtong ba'i dam tshig ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:141a-7: rdo rje ral gri sbyar ba dang //
T02D2510-2:141a-8: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i ting nge 'dzin padma'i
T02D2510-2:141a-9: phyag rgya nyid las ral gris gcod pa'i tshul du
T02D2510-2:141a-10: byed pa 'di ni rin chen rnon po'i gnas su
T02D2510-2:141a-11: rin chen dam tshig ral gri ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:141a-12: rdo rje 'khor lo'i tshul du bya //
T02D2510-2:141a-13: zhes bya ba ni nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma'i
T02D2510-2:141a-14: phyag rgya nyid las mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin bskor
T02D2510-2:141a-15: ba 'di ni nor bu 'khor lo ma'i gnas su
T02D2510-2:141a-16: nor bu dam tshig gi 'khor lo ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:141a-17: de nyid kha nas dbyung bar bya //
T02D2510-2:141a-18: zhes bya ba ni nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma'i
T02D2510-2:141a-19: phyag rgya nyid las tshig 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha
T02D2510-2:141a-20: gyen du 'dren pa ni nor bu gsung ba'i gnas
T02D2510-2:141a-21: kyi nor bu gsung mchog ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:141a-22: rdo rje rin chen myu gur bcing //
T02D2510-2:141a-23: sor mo thams cad brkyang ba dang //
T02D2510-2:141a-24: de dag spyi bor bzhag pa ni //
T02D2510-2:141a-25: rin chen char gyi char 'bebs so //
T02D2510-2:141a-26: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems ma bcings la /
T02D2510-2:141a-27: rdo rje rin chen gyi mthe bong dang /
T02D2510-2:141a-28: mdzub mo gnyis kha sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu ste /
T02D2510-2:141a-29: de bcings pa las mthe bong dang /
T02D2510-2:141a-32: mthe'u chung rnams brkyang ba'i phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag
T02D2510-2:141a-33: la sor mo'i rtse mo nor bu'i gzugs su bsgoms
T02D2510-2:141a-34: nas rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i lha mo bsams
T02D2510-2:141a-35: pa 'di ni rin chen char 'bebs kyi gnas su
T02D2510-2:141a-36: rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:141a-37: de nyid 'khor lo'i tshul du ni //
T02D2510-2:141a-38: zhes bya ba ni rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag
T02D2510-2:141a-39: rgya nyid mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du gar gyi
T02D2510-2:141a-40: tshul bstan pa 'di ni nor bu mchod pa'i gnas
T02D2510-2:141a-41: su nor bu mchod pa'i dam tshig ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:141a-42: snying gar rin chen gnyis byas pa //
T02D2510-2:141a-43: zhes bya ba ni rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag
T02D2510-2:141a-44: rgya nyid kha gnyis su byas pa 'di ni nor
T02D2510-2:141a-45: bu cho ga ma'i gnas su nor bu dam tshig
T02D2510-2:141a-46: bsrung ba ma'i'o // nor bu 'dzin rtse mche ba yin //
T02D2510-2:141a-47: zhes bya ba 'di ni rin chen char 'bebs ma'i
T02D2510-2:141a-48: phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis bskum la mche ba
T02D2510-2:141a-49: bzhin du khar 'jog pa 'di ni nor bu gnod
T02D2510-2:141a-50: sbyin gyi gnas su nor bu mche ba gtsigs ma'i'o
T02D2510-2:141b-0: // dbus su mnyam pa @141b khu tshur ro //
T02D2510-2:141b-1: zhes bya ba ni rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya'i dbus su mdzub mo gnyis dang /
T02D2510-2:141b-2: rang gi mthe bo gnyis kha sbyar bar byas pa
T02D2510-2:141b-3: 'di ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyi gnas su nor
T02D2510-2:141b-4: bu dam tshig khu tshur 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2510-2:141b-5: po'o // rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa nas
T02D2510-2:141b-6: rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams ni don
T02D2510-2:141b-7: thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad
T02D2510-2:141b-8: pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid 'dir phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:141b-10: de nas zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po
T02D2510-2:141b-11: las bshad pa'i rjes thogs nyid la dam tshig gi
T02D2510-2:141b-13: dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'ching ba'i mtshan nyid nges par bslab cing bstan par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:141b-14: phyag rgya chen po de dag nyid //
T02D2510-2:141b-15: snyim sbyar byas te bcings nas ni //
T02D2510-2:141b-16: zhes bya ba la thal mo sbyar la mthe bo
T02D2510-2:141b-17: gnyis dang gung mo gnyis brkyang mdzub mo gnyis bkug
T02D2510-2:141b-18: nas rin po che lta bur byas pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:141b-19: dpral bar gzhag pa 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2510-2:141b-20: kyi phyag rgya'o // thal mo sbyar ba mthe bo
T02D2510-2:141b-21: gnyis bsnol la mdzub mo gnyis nor bur byas pa
T02D2510-2:141b-22: 'di ni rdo rje nor bu chen po'i dam tshig
T02D2510-2:141b-23: gi phyag rgya yang 'di yin no //
T02D2510-2:141b-24: snyim pa sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe bo
T02D2510-2:141b-25: gnyis kyi gdong sbyar nas gung mo gnyis nor bu
T02D2510-2:141b-26: 'dra bar byas pa phyag rgya dpral bar gzhag pa
T02D2510-2:141b-27: 'di ni rin chen phreng ba ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:141b-28: snyim pa sbyar la gung mo nor bur byas nas
T02D2510-2:141b-29: mdzub mo dang srin lag brkyang ste padma 'dra bar
T02D2510-2:141b-30: byas pa 'di ni nor bu'i rin chen padma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:141b-31: snyim pa sbyar la gung mo gnyis rin po che
T02D2510-2:141b-32: 'dra bar byas nas sor mo lhag ma brkyang ba'i
T02D2510-2:141b-33: phyag rgya spyi gtsug tu bzhag la sor mo thams
T02D2510-2:141b-34: cad kyi rtse mo nor bu'i gzugs su bsgom pa
T02D2510-2:141b-35: 'di ni rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:141b-36: snyim pa sbyar la gung mo gnyis dang mthe bo gnyis rin po che ltar byas te /
T02D2510-2:141b-37: srin lag gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis brkyang ste /
T02D2510-2:141b-38: lce bzhin du khar gzhag pa 'di ni don kun grub par rab sbyin ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:141b-39: don kun grub par rab sbyin ma'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo gnyis myu gu ltar byas te /
T02D2510-2:141b-40: snying gar gzhag pa 'di ni nor bu rin chen 'gugs ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:141b-41: nor bu rin chen 'gugs pa ma'i phyag rgya nyid
T02D2510-2:141b-42: las mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyur byas pa 'di ni
T02D2510-2:141b-43: rin chen dam tshig lcags kyu ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:142a-1: kun grub par rab tu ster ma'i phyag rgya las

T02D2510-2:142a-3: 'phen pa'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni nor bu
T02D2510-2:142a-5: nor bu chags pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya las
T02D2510-2:142a-6: mdzub mo dang mthe bo legs so sbyin pa'i tshul
T02D2510-2:142a-7: du byed pa 'di ni nor bu legs pa ma'i'o
T02D2510-2:142a-8: // snyim pa sbyar la gung mo gnyis nor bur
T02D2510-2:142a-9: byas nas mthe bo'i logs su byas nas gzhag pa
T02D2510-2:142a-10: 'di ni rdo rje nor bu rin chen lta ba'i'o
T02D2510-2:142a-11: // // rdo rje nor bu rin chen lta ba'i phyag rgya nyid las srin lag dang /
T02D2510-2:142a-12: mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug nas phan tshun nang
T02D2510-2:142a-13: du kha sbyar te bcings la mdzub mo'i lcags kyu
T02D2510-2:142a-14: gnyis mthe bo gnyis kyis bkan te dpral bar gzhag
T02D2510-2:142a-15: pa 'di ni rdo rje rin chen phreng ba ma'i'o
T02D2510-2:142a-16: // rdo rje rin chen phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:142a-17: nyid snying gar nyi ma'i tshul gyis bskor ba ni
T02D2510-2:142a-19: rdo rje nor bu phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya nyid

T02D2510-2:142a-21: ni nor bu zla ba rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i'o
T02D2510-2:142a-22: // nor bu rin chen phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:142a-23: nyid bzhad pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor ba 'di
T02D2510-2:142a-24: ni nor bu bzhad pa ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:142a-25: snyim pa sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag
