T02D2510-2:142a-27: byed pa 'di ni nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma'i'o
T02D2510-2:142a-28: // nor bu ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya nyid
T02D2510-2:142a-29: las mthe'u chung sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshul du byed
T02D2510-2:142a-30: pa 'di ni gtong ba dam tshig ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:142a-31: nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma'i phyag rgya nyid las
T02D2510-2:142a-32: ral gris gcod pa'i tshul du sbyor ba 'di ni
T02D2510-2:142a-33: nor bu dam tshig gi ral gri ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:142a-34: nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma'i phyag rgya nyid mgal
T02D2510-2:142a-35: me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bskor ba 'di ni nor
T02D2510-2:142a-36: bu dam tshig gi 'khor lo ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:142a-37: nor bu'i ting nge 'dzin padma'i phyag rgya nyid tshig
T02D2510-2:142a-38: 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha nas 'dren par byed pa
T02D2510-2:142a-39: / 'di ni nor bu gsung ba mchog ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:142a-40: snyim pa sbyar la gung mo gnyis myu gu ltar brtan par byas la mthe bo gnyis gshibs te /
T02D2510-2:142a-41: mdzub mo'i rtse mo dang sbyar nas rin po cher byas la mthe bo dang gung mo dang /
T02D2510-2:142a-43: mthe'u chung gi sor mo rnams brkyang ste sor mo
T02D2510-2:142a-44: thams cad kyi rtse mo nor bu'i gzugs su bsams
T02D2510-2:142a-45: te / rin po che char 'bebs ma'i lha mo
T02D2510-2:142b-0: bsgom pa 'di ni rin chen @142b char rgyun ma'i'o
T02D2510-2:142b-1: te / // rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:142b-2: nyid mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du gar gyi spyor
T02D2510-2:142b-3: bas ston pa ni nor bu mchod pa'i dam tshig
T02D2510-2:142b-4: te / // ma'i'o // rin chen char rgyun ma'i
T02D2510-2:142b-5: phyag rgya nyid gnyis su byas nas snying gar 'dzin
T02D2510-2:142b-6: pa ni nor bu dam tshig bsrung ba ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:142b-7: rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo
T02D2510-2:142b-8: gnyis bskum ste mtshe ba bzhin du khar 'jog pa
T02D2510-2:142b-9: 'di ni nor bu mche ba gtsigs pa ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:142b-10: rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya'i dbus su mdzub
T02D2510-2:142b-11: mo gnyis dang rang gi mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse
T02D2510-2:142b-12: mor sbyar bar byas pa 'di ni nor bu dam
T02D2510-2:142b-13: tshig gi khu tshur gyi gzungs kyi dam tshig gi
T02D2510-2:142b-14: phyag rgya'o // rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa
T02D2510-2:142b-15: nas rin chen 'debs pa'i gzungs kyi mthar thug pa
T02D2510-2:142b-16: rnams ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-2:142b-17: po las bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid
T02D2510-2:142b-18: phyag rgya'o // gzung bar bya'o // mdor bsdus gsang ba'i gsang ba ste //
T02D2510-2:142b-19: dngos grub bzhi 'gyur sbyin par bya //
T02D2510-2:142b-20: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gsang ba ste /
T02D2510-2:142b-21: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni gsang ba'i gsang ba'o //
T02D2510-2:142b-22: mdor bsdus nas phyi rol gyi bya ba la mi
T02D2510-2:142b-23: ltos pa bsgom pa gtso bor gyur pa yin no
T02D2510-2:142b-25: sgrub pa po mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bas na dngos grub ster ba'o ;
T02D2510-2:142b-26: / gal te phyag rgya gzhan zla ba bzhis dngos
T02D2510-2:142b-27: grub ster na 'di ni zla ba gcig gis 'gyur
T02D2510-2:142b-28: ro // gzhan zhag bzhis 'grub na 'di zhag gcig
T02D2510-2:142b-29: gis 'grub pa ces bya ba de'i phyir dngos grub
T02D2510-2:142b-31: gsang ba'i gsang pa dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so //
T02D2510-2:142b-32: de ltar rdo rje gsang ba bzhin //
T02D2510-2:142b-33: dus kun du ni sbyor mi bya //
T02D2510-2:142b-34: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi
T02D2510-2:142b-35: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du gsang ba'i dam tshig gi
T02D2510-2:142b-36: phyag rgya las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya dus
T02D2510-2:142b-37: kun du bcing bar mi bya ba de bzhin du
T02D2510-2:142b-38: 'dir yang gsang ba'i gsang ba khu tshur las byung
T02D2510-2:142b-39: ba'i las kyi phyag rgya dus thams cad du bcing
T02D2510-2:142b-41: gsang ba'i gsang ba dam tshig gi phyag rgya mi bcing ngo //
T02D2510-2:142b-42: dgag pa des dam tshig gi phyag rgya med na
T02D2510-2:142b-43: dam tshig gi phyag rgya des lha bsgrub par mi
T02D2510-2:142b-44: bya'o zhes sngar bstan zin to //
T02D2510-2:142b-45: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:143a-1: mdzad kyi lcags kyu la chos kyi phyag rgyar bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-2: tre ni don kun grub pa sbyin pa dang /
T02D2510-2:143a-3: nor bu rin chen 'gugs ma dang /
T02D2510-2:143a-4: nor bu dam tshig gi gzungs kyi'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-5: ghe ni nor bu'i dam tshig gi rin chen lcags kyu ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-6: hre ni nor bu chags pa'i dam tshig ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-7: sve ni nor bu legs pa ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-8: kye ni rdo rje nor bu rin chen spyan dang /
T02D2510-2:143a-9: rdo rje rin chen phreng ba ma dang /
T02D2510-2:143a-10: nor bu rin chen phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i gzungs rnams kyi'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-11: kham ni nor bu rin chen nyi ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-12: dhre ni nor bu zla ba rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-13: hye ni nor bu bzhad pa ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-14: dree ni nor bu rin chen padma mo dang /
T02D2510-2:143a-15: nor bu rin chen gtong ba'i dam tshig ma dang /
T02D2510-2:143a-16: nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma rnams kyi'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-17: byee ni nor bu dam tshig ral gri ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-18: kee ni nor bu dam tshig 'khor lo ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-19: bee ni nor bu gsung ba mchog ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-20: kru ni nor bu rin chen char 'bebs ma dang /
T02D2510-2:143a-21: mchod pa chen mo'i dam tshig ma dang /
T02D2510-2:143a-22: nor bu rin chen char gyi rgyun ma rnams so //
T02D2510-2:143a-23: ree ni nor bu dam tshig bsrung ba'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-24: y+ya ni nor bu mche ba gtsigs ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-25: m'i ni nor bu dam tshig khu tshur gyi gzungs te /
T02D2510-2:143a-26: lce rnams la bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-27: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa don thams cad
T02D2510-2:143a-28: grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa yin
T02D2510-2:143a-29: no // gsang ba gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2510-2:143a-31: gsang ba gsang ba'i khu tshur ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143a-32: nor bu'i dam tshig gi gzungs kyi phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2510-2:143a-33: dam tshig gi phyag rgya de rnams khu tshur gnyis
T02D2510-2:143a-34: su byin nas las kun byed pa ste las kyi
T02D2510-2:143a-35: phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i don to ;
T02D2510-2:143a-37: nor bu'i dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi gzungs kyi
T02D2510-2:143a-38: phyag rgya chen po gnyis su byas nas rdo rje
T02D2510-2:143a-39: dbyings kyi tshul gyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D2510-2:143a-40: pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa'i gzungs kyi mthar thug
T02D2510-2:143a-41: pa rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o
T02D2510-2:143a-42: // gzhan yang nor bu'i dam tshig gi khu tshur
T02D2510-2:143a-43: gyi gzungs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su
T02D2510-2:143a-44: byas nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas
T02D2510-2:143a-45: rin chen 'bebs pa'i gzungs kyi mthar thug pa rnams
T02D2510-2:143a-46: rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis las kyi phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:143a-47: // bcing bar bya'o // de nas 'dir rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor bas /
T02D2510-2:143b-0: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo @143b ni ;
T02D2510-2:143b-1: / g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
T02D2510-2:143b-2: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che //
T02D2510-2:143b-3: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-4: bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yis ni nor bu
T02D2510-2:143b-5: rin chen 'dren pa dang nor bu dam tshig gi
T02D2510-2:143b-6: gzungs kyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-7: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa ni nor bu rin chen dam tshig gi lcags kyu'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-8: mda' 'phang ba'i tshul ni nor bu chags pa'i dam tshig ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-9: legs so sbyin pa snying gar gzhag pa ni nor bu legs pa ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-10: dbang bskur ba'i rin chen gnyis ni don yod grub pa rab tu ster ma dang /
T02D2510-2:143b-11: rdo rje nor bu rin po che'i spyan ma dang /
T02D2510-2:143b-12: rdo rje rin chen phreng ba ma dang /
T02D2510-2:143b-13: nor bu rin chen phreng ba ma rnams kyi'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-14: snying gar nyi ma bstan pa ni nor bu rin chen nyi ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-15: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs ni nor bu zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-16: de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya ba ni nor bu bzhad pa ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-17: g-yas pa'i ni g-yon pa dbye ba ni nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma dang /
T02D2510-2:143b-18: nor bu rin chen gtong ba'i dam tshig ma dang /
T02D2510-2:143b-19: nor bu rin chen padma rnams kyi'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-20: snying gar g-yon pa ral gri mdud ni nor bu dam tshig ma'i ral gri ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-21: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba ni nor bu dam tshig gi 'khor lo ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-22: nor bu gnyis ka kha nas dbyung ba ni nor bu gsung ba'i mchog ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-23: rdo rje gar bskor bkrol ba yis //
T02D2510-2:143b-24: thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag pa ni rin chen char 'bebs ma dang /
T02D2510-2:143b-25: mchod pa chen po dam tshig ma dang /
T02D2510-2:143b-26: nor bu rin chen char 'bebs kyi dam tshig ma rnams kyi'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-27: go cha ni nor bu dam tshig bsrung ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-28: mthe chung mche ba ni rdo rje nor bu mche
T02D2510-2:143b-29: ba gtsigs pa ma'i'o khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o
T02D2510-2:143b-30: ni nor bu dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi gzungs
T02D2510-2:143b-32: rin chen 'gying ba'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2510-2:143b-33: bsam pa g-yon pas mdud par bya ba ni rin chen sgeg mo'i gzungs kyi'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-34: phreng ba bcing dang ni rin chen phreng ba'i gzungs kyi'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-35: kha nas dbyung ba ni rin chen glu ma'i gzungs kyi'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-36: rin chen gar ni bskor ba yin ni rin chen gar ma'i gzungs kyi'o //
T02D2510-2:143b-37: rin chen khu tshur tshul gyis ni //
T02D2510-2:143b-38: bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin //
T02D2510-2:143b-39: sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa ni //
T02D2510-2:144a-2: / mdzub mo'i lcags kyu bcing ba ni //
T02D2510-2:144a-3: mthe chung las te lcags kyu che //
T02D2510-2:144a-4: mkhrig ma mdud la mdzub gnyis mdud //
T02D2510-2:144a-5: rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan //
T02D2510-2:144a-6: rin po che ni nor bu'i rigs so //
T02D2510-2:144a-7: gsang ba'i phyag rgya ni gzungs kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2510-2:144a-8: de'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i bye brag rgyas pa de rdzogs pa ni mthar thug pa'o //
T02D2510-2:144a-9: nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2510-2:144a-11: // / de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor
T02D2510-2:144a-12: gyur pa nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:144a-13: des 'dul ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir
T02D2510-2:144a-14: bstan nas / da ni chos kyi phyag rgya gtso
T02D2510-2:144a-15: bor gyur pa'i nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil
T02D2510-2:144a-16: 'khor gyis 'dul ba'i sems can gyi don gyi phyir
T02D2510-2:144a-17: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la
T02D2510-2:144a-19: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2510-2:144a-20: dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2510-2:144a-21: 'dir dang bor sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin don thams
T02D2510-2:144a-22: cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i
T02D2510-2:144a-23: dang por sbyor ba lta bu nyid yin no //
T02D2510-2:144a-24: yang zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs
T02D2510-2:144a-25: kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pas yang zhes bya ba
T02D2510-2:144a-26: smos so // bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2510-2:144a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba
T02D2510-2:144a-28: zhes bya ba ni nor bu rin po che'i rigs
T02D2510-2:144a-29: so // de'i ye shes ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2510-2:144a-30: la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug
T02D2510-2:144a-31: so // pa ste / rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba //
T02D2510-2:144a-32: gdod nas dag pa mkha' dang mtshungs //
T02D2510-2:144a-33: byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med //
T02D2510-2:144a-36: de'i dam tshig ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2510-2:144a-37: mdzad kyi nor bu rin chen gyi nang du gtogs
T02D2510-2:144a-39: de las byung ba'i 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i
T02D2510-2:144a-40: thugs ka'i rdo rje nor bu rin po che gang
T02D2510-2:144a-41: yin pa de las byung ba de la de skad
T02D2510-2:144a-42: ces bya'o ; / des byin gyis brlabs pa ni
T02D2510-2:144a-43: dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i bya
T02D2510-2:144a-44: ba gang gis de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2510-2:144a-45: gang yin pa de la ming de skad ces bya
T02D2510-2:144a-46: ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas
T02D2510-2:144a-47: rang gi bdag nyid kyi rigs dam pa 'di zhes
T02D2510-2:144b-0: bya ba blo la gnas pa gsungs @144b shing bshad
T02D2510-2:144b-1: ces bya'o ; pa'o // de nas phyag na rdo
T02D2510-2:144b-2: rjes don thams cad grub pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:144b-4: rdo rje snying pos rin chen lta ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2510-2:144b-5: rdo rje spyan gyis rin chen padma'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2510-2:144b-6: rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rin chen char 'bebs kyi
T02D2510-2:144b-7: chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir rang gi rig
T02D2510-2:144b-8: pa dam pa 'di rnams gsungs so //
T02D2510-2:144b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pas
T02D2510-2:144b-10: rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje rin po che las
T02D2510-2:144b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snga ma bzhin yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:144b-13: de la de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas /
T02D2510-2:144b-14: aom sarbba aa bhi she ka dzny'a na h'um zhes
T02D2510-2:144b-15: bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni nor
T02D2510-2:144b-16: bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2510-2:144b-17: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge
T02D2510-2:144b-18: 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:144b-19: de nas snga ma bzhin du bsdu ba dang byin
T02D2510-2:144b-20: gyis brlab pa la sogs pa ni nor bu'i rigs
T02D2510-2:144b-21: kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rgyal po
T02D2510-2:144b-22: mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin
T02D2510-2:144b-24: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las
T02D2510-2:144b-25: bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams ni don thams cad grub
T02D2510-2:144b-26: pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba
T02D2510-2:144b-27: thob pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i
T02D2510-2:144b-29: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
T02D2510-2:144b-30: nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2510-2:144b-31: gzhung gis slob dpon dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho
T02D2510-2:144b-32: ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:144b-33: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2510-2:144b-34: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa'o //
T02D2510-2:144b-35: rang gi rigs ni nor bu chen po'i rigs so //
T02D2510-2:144b-36: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor te de gsungs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:144b-37: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'i don brjod pa ste /
T02D2510-2:144b-38: sngon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2510-2:144b-40: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las
T02D2510-2:144b-41: bshad pa'i don thams cad grub pa'i rdal 'byor dang
T02D2510-2:144b-42: / de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas
T02D2510-2:144b-43: la phyis chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i bcom
T02D2510-2:144b-44: ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2510-2:145a-2: / snga ma bzhin du sna'i rtse mor 'chad bar
T02D2510-2:145a-3: 'gyur ba'i don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya bzhi
T02D2510-2:145a-4: pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i cho gas chos kyi
T02D2510-2:145a-6: de nas chos kyi 'khor lo las bshad pa'i ting
T02D2510-2:145a-7: nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom pa'i phyir zhes bya
T02D2510-2:145a-8: bas zhag bdun chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o
T02D2510-2:145a-9: // de nas de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:145a-10: de nas zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs ston pa ste /
T02D2510-2:145a-11: gang gi phyir chos kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa
T02D2510-2:145a-12: med na des 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams rnams
T02D2510-2:145a-13: kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub tu mi 'gyur
T02D2510-2:145a-15: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
T02D2510-2:145a-16: ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
T02D2510-2:145a-18: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la //
T02D2510-2:145a-19: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D2510-2:145a-20: rin chen ye shes zhes bshad do //
T02D2510-2:145a-21: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D2510-2:145a-22: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
T02D2510-2:145a-23: zhes bya ba la don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyings su'o //
T02D2510-2:145a-24: dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre //
T02D2510-2:145a-25: zhes bya ba ni de'i phyi rol dang nang bzhin
T02D2510-2:145a-26: du 'di'i yang phyi rol dang nang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:145a-27: bya'o // don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-2:145a-28: por ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
T02D2510-2:145a-29: bris pa de bzhin du 'dir yang bri bar bya'o
T02D2510-2:145a-30: zhes de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:145a-31: chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
T02D2510-2:145a-32: snying ga'i mtshan ma bri bar bya //
T02D2510-2:145a-34: 'di ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
T02D2510-2:145a-35: rdo rje rtse lnga ba de'i lte bar bcom ldan
T02D2510-2:145a-36: 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas bskal
T02D2510-2:145a-37: pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa rdo rje skyil mo
T02D2510-2:145a-39: rang gi mtshan ma nas 'bras tsam gyi snying ga'i
T02D2510-2:145a-40: phyi rol du bsnams nas rdo rje bsdams pa bkan
T02D2510-2:145a-41: te / skyil mo krung gi steng du gzhag pa de bzhin du 'dir yang bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:145a-42: de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i ye shes kyi snying po
T02D2510-2:145a-43: ni 'di rnams so zhes bya ba ni rnam par
T02D2510-2:145a-44: snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi snying po
T02D2510-2:145a-46: ye shes kyi snying po de ston par byed pa'i
T02D2510-2:145a-47: sgra'i gzugs su bzhugs pa de dag bsgrubs pas las
T02D2510-2:145a-48: thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i sngags yin no zhes
T02D2510-2:145b-1: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa ghi she ka dzny'a na au tta ma h'um /
T02D2510-2:145b-2: zhes bya ba'i sdugs 'dis rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D2510-2:145b-3: sogs pa nam mkha'i phyogs nas phab ste gzugs brnyan
T02D2510-2:145b-4: la gzhug pa'am / yang na 'dis bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:145b-6: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nor bu chen mo'i'o //
T02D2510-2:145b-7: aom badzra ratna aam ku ra h'um zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen myu gu ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:145b-8: aom badzra badzra ratna padma h'um /
T02D2510-2:145b-9: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen padma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:145b-11: zhes bya ba ni rin chen char 'bebs ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:145b-12: aom sarbba aartha siddhi dzny'a na h'um /
T02D2510-2:145b-13: zhes bya ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i'o //
T02D2510-2:145b-14: aom ma ni dzny'a na h'um /
T02D2510-2:145b-15: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i mtshan ma'i'o //
T02D2510-2:145b-16: aom ma ni tsint'a aam ku sha zhes bya ba ni rin chen rgyal po ste /
T02D2510-2:145b-18: aom ma ni dzny'a na mu shi h'um /
T02D2510-2:145b-19: zhes bya ba'i bar du bris la nam mkha'i phyogs
T02D2510-2:145b-20: nas phab ste rang gi phyogs su gzhag par bya'o
T02D2510-2:145b-21: // de nas don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:145b-22: chen po las bshad pa'i rin chen sgeg mo la
T02D2510-2:145b-23: sogs pa nas rin chen char 'bebs ma'i bar gyi
T02D2510-2:145b-25: de'i rjes la bskal pa bzang po rnams ni rang gi rig pas so //
T02D2510-2:145b-26: de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji
T02D2510-2:145b-27: lta ba bzhin byas nas zhes bya ba ni don
T02D2510-2:145b-28: thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad
T02D2510-2:145b-29: pa'i cho ga thams cad dang /
T02D2510-2:145b-30: rang gi cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:145b-31: slob dpon gyis rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2510-2:145b-32: de nas rang gi ming nas brjod par byas la /
T02D2510-2:145b-33: dkyil 'khor thams cad rdo rjer bsgrubs te /
T02D2510-2:145b-34: de nas bsdu ba byas nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de bsgo zhing las bya ba dang /
T02D2510-2:145b-35: bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:145b-37: zhabs bsil dbul ba byas nas dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2510-2:145b-38: rgya rnams kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
T02D2510-2:145b-39: bsgrubs te / de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la /
T02D2510-2:145b-40: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dbang bskur te /
T02D2510-2:145b-41: rdo rje rin po che myu gu don thams cad
T02D2510-2:145b-42: grub pa la sogs pa nor bu'i rigs thams cad
T02D2510-2:145b-43: grub pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:145b-44: de nas phyag bya ba dang /
T02D2510-2:146a-0: mchod pa thams cad kyis de bzhin @146a * //
T02D2510-2:146a-1: gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2510-2:146a-2: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug
T02D2510-2:146a-3: pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin slob ma 'jug
T02D2510-2:146a-4: par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni cho ga rgyas
T02D2510-2:146a-5: pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas zhes bya
T02D2510-2:146a-7: slob ma la 'di skad bsgo bar bya ste zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D2510-2:146a-8: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la nas 'bras tsam gyis rdo rje nor bu dang /
T02D2510-2:146a-9: rdo rje nor bu rin po che'i dril bu byin
T02D2510-2:146a-10: nas don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po
T02D2510-2:146a-11: las bshad pa'i slob ma'i cho ga thams cad bya
T02D2510-2:146a-12: ba yin no // slob dpon gyi las dang slob
T02D2510-2:146a-13: ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i gzhung tsam nyid
T02D2510-2:146a-15: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang
T02D2510-2:146a-16: slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bstan nas
T02D2510-2:146a-17: / da ni don thams cad grub pa'i cho ga'i
T02D2510-2:146a-18: dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dbang bskur ba thob pa
T02D2510-2:146a-19: rnams la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i de las
T02D2510-2:146a-20: gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams slob dpon gyis bshad par
T02D2510-2:146a-21: bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir nor bu'i
T02D2510-2:146a-22: rigs kyi chos kyi ye shes bskyed par bya'o zhes

T02D2510-2:181b-27: de dag la gnod par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:181b-28: sdug bsngal ba las bton nas sdig pa las bzlog pa'o //
T02D2510-2:181b-29: de'i don du cung zad cig byang chub tu sems
T02D2510-2:181b-30: bskyed pa la sogs pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi las
T02D2510-2:181b-31: kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rnam pa bzhi las
T02D2510-2:181b-32: kyi mtshan nyid kyi dgos pa'i bya ba gang byed
T02D2510-2:181b-33: pa de khro bo'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas /
T02D2510-2:181b-34: las kyi rigs kyi rnam pa bzhi po 'di rdo
T02D2510-2:181b-35: rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad rab tu sbyin
T02D2510-2:181b-38: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:181b-39: chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi khro bo'i rnal
T02D2510-2:181b-40: 'byor dang / de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02D2510-2:181b-41: de nas rdo rje khro bo'i sgeg mo la sogs
T02D2510-2:181b-42: pa'i mchod pa rnam pa brgyad kyis bdag nyid yang
T02D2510-2:182a-2: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:182a-3: las bshad pa'i mchod pa rnams de las bshad pa'i
T02D2510-2:182a-4: tshogs sprul la / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
T02D2510-2:182a-5: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i bcom
T02D2510-2:182a-6: ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor chen
T02D2510-2:182a-7: tshogs sprul la / po bcings te / rang gi
T02D2510-2:182a-8: mchod pa rnam pa bzhi'i rig pa brjod par bya'o
T02D2510-2:182a-9: tshogs sprul la / po bcings te / // de ltar rin chen h'um mdzad dang /
T02D2510-2:182a-10: las kyi h'um mdzad rnams 'jig rten gsum las rnam
T02D2510-2:182a-11: par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i
T02D2510-2:182a-12: phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2510-2:182a-13: las dang po pa rnams kyis rig pa brjod cing brtan par byas la /
T02D2510-2:182a-14: phyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i las
T02D2510-2:182a-15: kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i de'i las kyi phyag
T02D2510-2:182a-16: rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te /
T02D2510-2:182a-17: las dang po pa rnams kyis ma rungs pa'i sems
T02D2510-2:182a-18: can la gnod pa la sogs pa de rnams kyis
T02D2510-2:182a-19: nam mkha'i khams thams cad bkang nas rang gi lha'am
T02D2510-2:182a-20: / dkyil 'khor pa snga ma bzhin mchod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:182a-21: de ltar 'dir yang mchod pa rnam pa bzhis las
T02D2510-2:182a-22: kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par mchod la
T02D2510-2:182a-24: rang gi khro bo'i lha'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:182a-25: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2510-2:182a-27: zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba la sogs pa'i rig
T02D2510-2:182a-28: pa'i 'jigs pas gzir ba rnams 'chi ba la sogs
T02D2510-2:182a-29: pa bsal te / dbugs 'byin par byed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:182a-30: ji bzhin par ni 'dul de bzhin //
T02D2510-2:182a-31: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs
T02D2510-2:182a-32: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gdul bya rnams de'i ngo
T02D2510-2:182a-33: bor bskyed pa ji bzhin pa'i 'dul ba'o //
T02D2510-2:182a-35: zhes bya ba ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la
T02D2510-2:182a-36: sogs pa gang yin pa des ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2510-2:182a-37: du 'dul bar byed pa 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi
T02D2510-2:182a-38: rnal 'byor pa'i las kyi bya ba yin no //
T02D2510-2:182a-39: 'dis las ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D2510-2:182a-40: sangs rgyas dngos grub rab sbyin bya'o //
T02D2510-2:182a-42: 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid ster bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:182a-43: de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs zhes gsungs pas so //
T02D2510-2:182b-0: @182b de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:182b-1: 'gro ba 'dul pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad
T02D2510-2:182b-2: pa'i rang nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor
T02D2510-2:182b-3: dang / de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02D2510-2:182b-4: padma'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad kyis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de //
T02D2510-2:182b-5: padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams sprul la /
T02D2510-2:182b-6: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2510-2:182b-7: rang gi mchod pa rnam pa bzhis rig pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:182b-8: de bzhin du gtsug phud sangs rgyas dang /
T02D2510-2:182b-10: padma don yod dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2510-2:182b-11: las kyi phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad
T02D2510-2:182b-12: pa'i rang gi rigs kyi lha mo rnam pa bzhi'i
T02D2510-2:182b-14: de nas de rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis rang gi lha'am /
T02D2510-2:182b-15: dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byas nas /
T02D2510-2:182b-16: mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pas sems can gyi khams tshim par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:182b-17: de ltar mchod pa rnam pa bcu drug gis yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2510-2:182b-19: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcings te /
T02D2510-2:182b-20: snga ma bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:182b-21: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no ;
T02D2510-2:182b-22: / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa sems can
T02D2510-2:182b-23: gyi khams thams cad nor bu'i rigs kyi gzugs su
T02D2510-2:182b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang sems can
T02D2510-2:182b-26: gyi khams thams cad snga ma bzhin du rin po
T02D2510-2:182b-28: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs
T02D2510-2:182b-29: pa'i nor ni sems can thams cad 'jig rten dang
T02D2510-2:182b-30: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i don
T02D2510-2:182b-31: thams cad dang / re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:182b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang sems can
T02D2510-2:182b-33: gyi khams rnams la dbang bskur ba la sogs pa
T02D2510-2:182b-35: sangs rgyas dbang bskur de bzhin du /
T02D2510-2:182b-37: 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las sa //
T02D2510-2:182b-38: des ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D2510-2:182b-39: las kyi don kun grub byed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:182b-41: don yang yin la kun yang yin pas na don kun te /
T02D2510-2:183a-2: de rdzogs shing grub par byed pa ni nor bu'i
T02D2510-2:183a-3: rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas nor bu'i rigs grub par
T02D2510-2:183a-4: byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-2:183a-5: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:183a-6: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las
T02D2510-2:183a-7: bshad pa'i don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2510-2:183a-9: de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02D2510-2:183a-10: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad
T02D2510-2:183a-11: kyis bdag nyid yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2510-2:183a-12: du mchod la / nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi
T02D2510-2:183a-13: dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i cho gas nor bu'i rigs
T02D2510-2:183a-14: kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams sprul bar
T02D2510-2:183a-15: du mchod la / bya'o // de nas don thams
T02D2510-2:183a-16: cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i
T02D2510-2:183a-17: don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings
T02D2510-2:183a-18: du mchod la / bya'o // te / las kyi
T02D2510-2:183a-19: dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha mo bzhi
T02D2510-2:183a-20: rigs rnam pa bzhi brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:183a-21: de ltar rin chen lta ba dang /
T02D2510-2:183a-23: rin chen char 'bebs kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2510-2:183a-24: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i lha mo bzhi'i rig pa rnams brjod cing /
T02D2510-2:183a-25: de rnams kyis de bzhin du dbang bskur ba byin
T02D2510-2:183a-26: pa las re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D2510-2:183a-27: las ni sangs rgyas ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:183a-28: sems can gyi khams thams cad la nam mkha'i khams
T02D2510-2:183a-29: thams cad khyab par bsgrubs nas las kyi phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:183a-30: de rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'am
T02D2510-2:183a-31: / dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mchod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:183a-32: de ltar mchod pa rnam pa bcu drug gis yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2510-2:183a-34: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcings te /
T02D2510-2:183a-35: snga ma bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:183a-36: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs
T02D2510-2:183a-37: thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga
T02D2510-2:183a-38: rgyas pa'i rgyud kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bstan
T02D2510-2:183a-39: nas / da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs
T02D2510-2:183a-40: pa'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po dang
T02D2510-2:183a-43: las kyi phyag rgya rnams thun mong du bsgrub pa
T02D2510-2:183a-44: dang dngos grub kyi khyad par du 'gyur ba bstan
T02D2510-2:183a-45: pa'i phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-2:183b-0: de nas zhes bya ba la @183b sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2510-2:183b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs te /
T02D2510-2:183b-2: de rnams kyi chos nyid bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa
T02D2510-2:183b-3: n+ya gro dha la sogs pa'i sa bon bzhin du
T02D2510-2:183b-5: der nges pa'i ye shes de'i dngos grub ni phyag
T02D2510-2:183b-6: rgya chen po la sogs pa'i sgrub pa ston par
T02D2510-2:183b-8: 'di gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02D2510-2:183b-9: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2510-2:183b-10: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02D2510-2:183b-12: rang gi snying ga'i sems dpa'i rdo rje la dmigs pa'i thugs rtse gcig pa'o //
T02D2510-2:183b-13: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste /
T02D2510-2:183b-14: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni //
T02D2510-2:183b-15: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dgongs //
T02D2510-2:183b-17: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas don yod
T02D2510-2:183b-18: grub pa'i mthar thug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-2:183b-19: bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur par bshad do //
T02D2510-2:183b-21: 'di ni sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D2510-2:183b-23: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni
T02D2510-2:183b-24: sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i
T02D2510-2:183b-25: tha tshig go // 'di nyid kyang gang las she na /
T02D2510-2:183b-26: gzhan las sangs rgyas 'gyur ba med //
T02D2510-2:183b-28: gang gi phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2510-2:183b-29: ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur gyi gzhan du mi 'gyur
T02D2510-2:183b-30: ba de'i phyir / rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni //
T02D2510-2:183b-31: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dgongs //
T02D2510-2:183b-33: kha cig na re rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ni /
T02D2510-2:183b-34: phyag rgya chen po'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa
T02D2510-2:183b-35: ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nyid de
T02D2510-2:183b-36: / sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu yin no zhe'o //
T02D2510-2:183b-37: gzhan dag ni 'di ma yin te /
T02D2510-2:183b-39: bdag nyid chen po gang gang gi / phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings pa'i //
T02D2510-2:183b-40: bzlas pa'i snying po'i don du ni //
T02D2510-2:183b-41: der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:183b-42: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:183b-43: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud las /
T02D2510-2:183b-44: de bzhin gshegs pa dran byed cing //
T02D2510-2:183b-45: sangs rgyas phyag rgya bcings nas ni //
T02D2510-2:183b-46: sangs rgyas byang chub bstan pa yang //
T02D2510-2:183b-47: bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:183b-48: zhes de ma thag 'chang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:184a-1: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rang gi lha'i
T02D2510-2:184a-2: phyag rgya bzhis rang gi lha'i nga rgyal nyid kyis
T02D2510-2:184a-3: bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:184a-4: phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni //
T02D2510-2:184a-5: bdag nyid de yi mdun du yang //
T02D2510-2:184a-6: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom //
T02D2510-2:184a-7: de nas de ma thag tu 'grub //
T02D2510-2:184a-8: ces 'chad par 'gyur ba de bas na rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2510-2:184a-9: rang gi lha'i gzugs nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:184a-10: des pa kho nar rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:184a-11: chen po'i rnam par sems rtse gcig par mi bya'o
T02D2510-2:184a-12: // de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bsgom pa rnams
T02D2510-2:184a-13: kyis rang gi snying ga'i sems dpa'i rdo rje la
T02D2510-2:184a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba sems dpa'i rdo
T02D2510-2:184a-15: rje rnam pa kho na yin par the tshom mi
T02D2510-2:184a-17: de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' che //
T02D2510-2:184a-18: thams cad sems de nyid bdag go //
T02D2510-2:184a-19: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje ni //
T02D2510-2:184a-20: sems dpa' brtan par rang byung gi //
T02D2510-2:184a-21: sems dpa' kun gyi mchog sems dpa' //
T02D2510-2:184a-22: rdo rje snying gar rab bsgoms nas //
T02D2510-2:184a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags te //
T02D2510-2:184a-24: 'di la rdo rje rab tu gnas //
T02D2510-2:184a-26: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:184a-27: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D2510-2:184a-28: sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po
T02D2510-2:184a-29: bcing ba'am dam tshig gi dang chos dang las kyi
T02D2510-2:184a-30: phyag rgya chen po bcings nas /
T02D2510-2:184a-31: rang gi snying ga'i zla bar h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsams te /
T02D2510-2:184a-32: de'i dbus su snying po bkod la /
T02D2510-2:184a-33: thugs ka'i sems dpa'i bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2510-2:184a-34: la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bsgom par bya'o
T02D2510-2:184a-35: // phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni //
T02D2510-2:184a-36: dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya //
T02D2510-2:184a-37: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2510-2:184a-38: pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa
T02D2510-2:184a-39: rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya chen
T02D2510-2:184a-42: las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas de bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:184a-43: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rang gi lha'i
T02D2510-2:184a-44: sku'i gsang ba bsgoms nas yang dang yang mngon du
T02D2510-2:184a-45: byas te / bzlas pa don du gnyer bas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:184a-48: 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi //
T02D2510-2:184b-1: ji skad du bshad pa de dag gi'o //
T02D2510-2:184b-2: chos nyid dngos grub dam pa thob //
T02D2510-2:184b-3: ces bya ba la yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02D2510-2:184b-4: rigs thams cad kyang gi chos nyid 'di yin no zhes bshad do //
T02D2510-2:184b-5: phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2510-2:184b-6: dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:184b-7: las rnams thams cad bsgrubs nas ni //
T02D2510-2:184b-9: rdo rje rigs su bshad pa'i dam tshig dang /
T02D2510-2:184b-12: phyag rgya chen po thams cad ni dam tshig gi
T02D2510-2:184b-13: phyag rgya'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad
T02D2510-2:184b-14: zin to // de rnams ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam tshig mchog ste /
T02D2510-2:184b-17: las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis /
T02D2510-2:184b-18: sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i las rnams thams cad bsgrub cing rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:184b-19: ji ltar bsgrub pa yin zhe na /
T02D2510-2:184b-20: phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2510-2:184b-22: phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i tshul lo //
T02D2510-2:184b-23: dngos grub kun sbyor sangs rgyas kyi //
T02D2510-2:184b-24: bkas ni sems can kun don du //
T02D2510-2:184b-25: phyag rgya chen po bsgrubs nas ni //
T02D2510-2:184b-27: ces sngar bstan zin pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i rgyur gyur pa des /
T02D2510-2:184b-29: rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:184b-31: rdo rje chen po'i rigs kyi sbyor bas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub dang /
T02D2510-2:184b-34: las kyi phyag rgya dngos grub gang dang gang bsgrub
T02D2510-2:184b-35: par 'dod pa de dang de nyid kyi phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:184b-36: chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2510-2:184b-37: phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa'i sbyor ba nyid kyis bsgom zhing bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:184b-38: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos ston pa ni /
T02D2510-2:184b-40: padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi'i phyag rgyar sbyor ba ni /
T02D2510-2:184b-41: chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul lo //

T02D2510-2:185b-8: dngos grub tu 'gyur ba yin no //

T02D2510-2:185b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad

T02D2510-2:185b-25: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2510-2:185b-26: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten pa'o //

T02D2510-2:186a-0: sdig pa'i man pa dang bral ba'i snang ba dang bcas @186a * //
T02D2510-2:186a-1: pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D2510-2:186a-19: sgra brnyan dang mtshungs pa bden pa gang yin pa

T02D2510-2:186a-27: gyis brlabs nas / cing / rang gi snying gar
T02D2510-2:186a-28: zla ba rdo rje bsgoms na des par thams cad

T02D2510-2:186b-13: khro bo'i rnal 'byor pas des khro bo de bdag
T02D2510-2:186b-14: nyid du gyur pa nam mkha' la sogs pa la

T02D2510-2:186b-16: te / khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus de

T02D2510-2:187a-28: lha bsgom pa des thams cad kyis mthong bar 'gyur

T02D2510-2:187b-26: / de'i cho ga rgyas ba ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:187b-27: pa la sogs pa tha dad pas bye brag rgyas
T02D2510-2:187b-28: pa'o // de ston par byed pa'i rgyud do //
T02D2510-2:187b-29: gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bshad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:187b-30: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2510-2:187b-31: sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs tshul gyis //
T02D2510-2:187b-32: zhes bya ba ni sems dpa'i rdo rje rab tu snang ba'o //
T02D2510-2:187b-33: des sems dpar byin gyis brlabs pa'i sbyor bas sangs
T02D2510-2:187b-34: rgyas dngos grub thob par zhes bya bar sbyar ro
T02D2510-2:187b-35: // gang las skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-2:187b-36: sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag bsgoms na //
T02D2510-2:187b-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-2:187b-38: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02D2510-2:187b-39: bdag nyid bsgoms pa'i rnam par snang mdzad gang yin pa de bdag yin no zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2510-2:187b-40: don yod grub pa gang yin pa de bdag yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:188a-0: sems dpar byin gyis brlabs pa'i sbyor ba bsgom pa gang yin pa de bskyed @188a * //
T02D2510-2:188a-2: / ye shes ni tshul de yis zhes bya ba
T02D2510-2:188a-3: ni sems dpar sbyor ba'i byin gyis rlob pa'i sbyor
T02D2510-2:188a-4: ba nyid / ye shes kyi ni tshul de yis //
T02D2510-2:188a-6: tshul ni ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul lo zhes bstan to //
T02D2510-2:188a-8: snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D2510-2:188a-9: bsgom pa'i bdag nyid kyi ya shes kyis gang gi
T02D2510-2:188a-10: tshe snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje nyin re bzhin
T02D2510-2:188a-11: thun bzhi'i mthong bar gyur ba de'i tshe /
T02D2510-2:188a-12: mtshan thog thag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid du
T02D2510-2:188a-13: bsgoms nas sangs rgyas nyid mngon sum du byed par
T02D2510-2:188a-15: sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:188a-17: nam mkha' ni grags par zad do //
T02D2510-2:188a-18: phyogs gzhan du bshad zin to //
T02D2510-2:188a-19: ser skya'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ser skyar mthong ba yin te /
T02D2510-2:188a-20: 'ba' zhig mthong ba ni ma yin /
T02D2510-2:188a-23: sems dpa' nyid kyi phyag rgya nyid //
T02D2510-2:188a-24: mngon sum nyid du mthong gyur na'o //
T02D2510-2:188a-25: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2510-2:188a-26: pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyag
T02D2510-2:188a-27: rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings te
T02D2510-2:188a-28: / rnal 'byor pa bsgom pa la sogs pa na /
T02D2510-2:188a-29: sems dpa' rang nyid kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2510-2:188a-30: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ji skad du
T02D2510-2:188a-31: bshad pa'i sems dpa' de nyid kyi phyag rgyas rdo
T02D2510-2:188a-32: rje sems dpa' nyid la sogs pa'i gzugs su rnal
T02D2510-2:188a-33: 'byor pa bdag nyid mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur
T02D2510-2:188a-34: ro // de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:188a-35: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2510-2:188a-36: ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje sems
T02D2510-2:188a-37: dpa' la sogs pa bsgoms nas nyin re zhing thun
T02D2510-2:188a-38: bzhi'i sbyor bas nam mkha'i phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2510-2:188a-39: 'khor ser skya'i gzugs su ngo bo ji srid bdag
T02D2510-2:188a-40: nyid mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe /
T02D2510-2:188a-41: ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan thog thag bzlas shing bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:188a-42: de lta bu yi dbyibs gyur pa /
T02D2510-2:188a-43: zhes bya ba ni ser skya'i 'od kyis dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:188a-44: du snang ba grub pas na dbus su sngo bsangs
T02D2510-2:188a-45: ni autpala sngon po lta bu'o //
T02D2510-2:188b-0: snang ba ni zhes bya ba ni mngon pa dang mthong ba zhes bya ba'i @188b tha tshig go //
T02D2510-2:188b-1: rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa 'di dngos grub kyi ye shes so //
T02D2510-2:188b-2: rdo rje rigs kyi mchog gi dngos grub ni dam tshig go //
T02D2510-2:188b-3: ci ste 'dod na myur du thob //
T02D2510-2:188b-4: ces bya ba ni gal te rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa sgrub par 'dod nas /
T02D2510-2:188b-5: de srid pa ni mkha' 'dra yi //
T02D2510-2:188b-6: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor
T02D2510-2:188b-7: pa bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i
T02D2510-2:188b-8: kha dog sngon po'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba gang yin
T02D2510-2:188b-9: pa de lta bu padma'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas
T02D2510-2:188b-10: gang gi tshe nam mkha' la padma sngon po'i kha
T02D2510-2:188b-11: dog can gyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis mthong
T02D2510-2:188b-12: ba de'i tshe / padma chen po'i rigs rig pa'i //
T02D2510-2:188b-13: dngos grub tu ni legs par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:188b-14: zhes bya ba de shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:188b-15: nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan na //
T02D2510-2:188b-16: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor
T02D2510-2:188b-17: pa'i bsgom pa'i ye shes kyis ser skya'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:188b-18: de nyid ston ka'i nam mkha' dri ma med pa
T02D2510-2:188b-19: las 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor 'phro zhing g-yo bar
T02D2510-2:188b-20: mthong ba na / mthong na myur du dngos grub thob //
T02D2510-2:188b-22: da ni ji skad du bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:188b-23: pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dngos
T02D2510-2:188b-24: grub kyi ye shes 'di 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi
T02D2510-2:188b-25: gzhan yang yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'o zhes
T02D2510-2:188b-26: / rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2510-2:188b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-2:188b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' dang por bya ba gang yin
T02D2510-2:188b-29: pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o
T02D2510-2:188b-31: rdo rje rgyal po nas brtsams nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i sems dpa'o //
T02D2510-2:188b-32: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T02D2510-2:188b-34: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2510-2:188b-35: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni sngar bstan zin to //
T02D2510-2:188b-36: nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du bdag nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2510-2:188b-37: mi brtan pa'i gzugs kyi snang ba tsam grub pa'i dus su mdun du mthong ba yin la /
T02D2510-2:188b-38: dngos grub kyi dus su ni dkyil 'khor grags pa'i
T02D2510-2:188b-39: kha dog dang dbyibs can gyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs
T02D2510-2:188b-40: byon nas sgrub pa po la bdag nyid ston par
T02D2510-2:188b-41: 'gyur ro // de nas skad cig ma de nyid
T02D2510-2:188b-42: la rnal 'byor pa 'di rdo rje 'chang chen po
T02D2510-2:188b-43: la sogs pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:188b-44: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
T02D2510-2:188b-45: kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud bstan nas
T02D2510-2:189a-0: / @189a * // da ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i bsgoms
T02D2510-2:189a-1: pa nas mtshan ma thob par gyur pa mngon par
T02D2510-2:189a-2: shes pa lnga bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-2:189a-3: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa mngon
T02D2510-2:189a-4: par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud
T02D2510-2:189a-5: / gsungs so // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rigs kyang yin pas na /
T02D2510-2:189a-6: de'i mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:189a-7: de'i ye shes de ston pa'i rgyud do //
T02D2510-2:189a-8: gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bshad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:189a-9: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2510-2:189a-10: zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i zla ba'i rdo rje'i
T02D2510-2:189a-11: rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ni rdo rje sems
T02D2510-2:189a-13: de la gnas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems
T02D2510-2:189a-14: dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas rnam par snang
T02D2510-2:189a-15: mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rnal
T02D2510-2:189a-16: 'byor pas spyi gtsug nas brtsams te /
T02D2510-2:189a-17: rkang mthil gyi bar du lus thams cad la rnam
T02D2510-2:189a-18: par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2510-2:189a-19: gzugs dang / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i
T02D2510-2:189a-20: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang blos bsgoms na mthong
T02D2510-2:189a-21: gzugs dang / ba yin no // de bzhin lus
T02D2510-2:189a-22: las zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus la byung
T02D2510-2:189a-23: gzugs dang / ba yin no // ba kho na'o // 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:189a-24: mtshan ma thob pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2510-2:189a-25: pas sems dpa'i rdo rje ting nge 'dzin mngon du
T02D2510-2:189a-26: byas nas / de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa mngon du byas te /
T02D2510-2:189a-27: de'i tshe rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bsgoms nas /
T02D2510-2:189a-28: yid kyis legs pa'i sbyor ba snga ma bzhin du
T02D2510-2:189a-29: bcug la ba spu'i khung bu re rer rdo rje
T02D2510-2:189a-30: sems dpa' la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D2510-2:189a-32: de nas brtan par gyur pa dang rang gi lus las sku rnams phyung nas /
T02D2510-2:189a-33: nam mkha' la sogs par spros pa de lta bus
T02D2510-2:189a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i mngon par shes
T02D2510-2:189a-35: pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D2510-2:189a-36: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che //
T02D2510-2:189a-38: rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams nas /
T02D2510-2:189a-39: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa de dag gi
T02D2510-2:189a-40: phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi'i phyag rgya de nyid ji
T02D2510-2:189a-41: skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis bcing ba'o //
T02D2510-2:189a-42: ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D2510-2:189b-0: rab mnyam @189b gzhag pas bcings nas ni //
T02D2510-2:189b-2: rab tu mnyam par gzhag pa ni mtshan ma thob pas sems g-yeng ba med pa'o //
T02D2510-2:189b-3: mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:189b-4: zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon shes te /
T02D2510-2:189b-5: lha'i mig la sogs pa'i ngo bor nges pa'i ye shes de thob pa ni rnyed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:189b-6: ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-2:189b-7: sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni //
T02D2510-2:189b-9: de ma thag tu 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pa sgrub pa po'i cho ga 'dis so //
T02D2510-2:189b-10: de la 'di ni 'phrul gyi spyan gyi ye shes
T02D2510-2:189b-11: bshad do zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pas
T02D2510-2:189b-12: na 'di'o // phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag ste ;
T02D2510-2:189b-13: / zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la
T02D2510-2:189b-14: sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:189b-15: ji skad du bshad pa bcings te brtan par byas
T02D2510-2:189b-16: ba'o // mig gi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:189b-17: zhes bya ba ni sgom pa pos so //
T02D2510-2:189b-19: yi ge aom gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-2:189b-20: kyi lha'i spyan bkug nas rang gi mig la bzhag
T02D2510-2:189b-21: ste / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan
T02D2510-2:189b-22: rang gi mig dang gcig tu gyur par bsam par
T02D2510-2:189b-23: ste / bya'o // de nas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-2:189b-24: gang yang rung ba de bsams na //
T02D2510-2:189b-26: gzugs gang ci yang rung ba 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D2510-2:189b-27: gzhan na gnas pa rnams shin tu ring ba dang
T02D2510-2:189b-28: / de las kyang ches shin tu ring ba rnams
T02D2510-2:189b-29: kyang snang ba dang bcas pa'i mdun phyogs na gnas
T02D2510-2:189b-30: pa bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:189b-31: phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag ste //
T02D2510-2:189b-32: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2510-2:189b-33: yi ge aas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2510-2:189b-34: lha'i snyan bkug nas rang gi rna ba dang lhan
T02D2510-2:189b-35: cig tu gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:189b-37: des ni dgos pa gang bsams pa //
T02D2510-2:189b-38: shin tu ring na gnas pa'ang thos //
T02D2510-2:189b-40: des 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na gnas pa'i sgra'i
T02D2510-2:189b-41: ngo bo ci yang rung ba yang rnal 'byor pa
T02D2510-2:189b-42: la dgos pas thos par 'dod na nye ba'i yul
T02D2510-2:189b-43: na gnas pa bzhin du bsams na des thos par
T02D2510-2:189b-44: 'gyur ro // phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag ste //
T02D2510-2:189b-45: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2510-2:189b-46: yid kyi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:189b-47: zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um gis de bzhin
T02D2510-2:189b-48: gshegs pa thams cad kyi yid kyi rnam par shes
T02D2510-2:190a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las sems dpa'i rdo rje'i gzugs can gyi yid bkug ste /
T02D2510-2:190a-3: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje
T02D2510-2:190a-4: la bcug nas gcig tu gyur par bsam par bya'o
T02D2510-2:190a-6: sems can gang la des brtags na //
T02D2510-2:190a-7: de yi sems ni des shes 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:190a-9: yid kyi rnam par shes pa de sems dpa' rdo
T02D2510-2:190a-10: rje'i gzugs su sems can gang gi sems shes par
T02D2510-2:190a-11: 'dod pa'i sems can de la bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:190a-12: de nas sems can de'i sems rnal 'byor pas shes par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:190a-14: ye shes kyi rdo rje rang gi snying gar rab tu bzhag la 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:190a-15: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i bden pa gang
T02D2510-2:190a-16: yin pa'i bden pa des bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2510-2:190a-17: sems dpa' dang mtshungs par sems can de'i sems kyang
T02D2510-2:190a-18: de dang 'dra ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes
T02D2510-2:190a-19: pa bdag la skye bar gyur cig ces bya'o //
T02D2510-2:190a-20: de nas de'i snying gar ye shes kyi rdo rje
T02D2510-2:190a-21: nyid rnam par bsgoms pa des gzhan gyi sems shes
T02D2510-2:190a-22: pa rnal 'byor pa la skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:190a-23: phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag ste //
T02D2510-2:190a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D2510-2:190a-25: bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung //
T02D2510-2:190a-26: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D2510-2:190a-27: yid kyis bltas nas gar skyes pa //
T02D2510-2:190a-28: zhes bya ba ni sems dpyad na bdag gang nas 'dir 'ongs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:190a-29: sems can gang nas 'dir 'ongs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:190a-30: gzhan gyi skye ba shes pa'o //
T02D2510-2:190a-32: gar skyes pa'i gzugs ni de'i shes par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:190a-34: gang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes par gyur pa
T02D2510-2:190a-35: de rnal 'byor pas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran
T02D2510-2:190a-36: pa'i shes pa bsgrubs pas rang dang gzhan gyi skye
T02D2510-2:190a-37: ba'i gnas gang nas 'ongs pa shes pa yin no
T02D2510-2:190a-38: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-2:190a-40: 'gro ba drug gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor snying gar
T02D2510-2:190a-41: yid kyis bris la bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad
T02D2510-2:190a-42: dang rmi lam mtshungs pa'i bden pa gang yin pa'i
T02D2510-2:190a-43: bden pa des skye ba gang nas bdag gam gzhan
T02D2510-2:190a-44: 'dir skyes pa'i sems can snang bar gyur cig ces
T02D2510-2:190a-45: smon lam btab nas rang gi lha bsgoms na de'i
T02D2510-2:190a-46: rjes la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes
T02D2510-2:190b-1: phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:190b-2: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2510-2:190b-4: zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul ni rnam par 'phrul lo //
T02D2510-2:190b-5: sems kyi rdzu 'phrul ni bdag nyid chen po'i mthu yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:190b-9: ring nas myur du 'ong ba la sogs pa de
T02D2510-2:190b-10: lta bu rnams kyi nang nas gang yang rung ba'i
T02D2510-2:190b-11: rdzu 'phrul zhig mngon du byas te ston par 'dod
T02D2510-2:190b-12: pa'am / yul gang dang gang du sgrib pa dang
T02D2510-2:190b-13: bcas pa dang sgrib pa med pa'i nam mkha' la
T02D2510-2:190b-14: sogs pa de dang der 'gro ba rnal 'byor pas
T02D2510-2:190b-17: sems rtse gcig pa'i stobs kyis so //
T02D2510-2:190b-19: ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:190b-20: pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i rang gi lha'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:190b-21: bcings te / rnal 'byor pas mtshan ma thob nas
T02D2510-2:190b-22: nam mkha'i phyogs kyi gnas su yi ge lam las
T02D2510-2:190b-23: zad par sa bsgoms la 'chags pa la sogs pa
T02D2510-2:190b-24: bcings te / bstan par bya'o // yi ge bam
T02D2510-2:190b-25: las ri bo la sogs pa'i phyogs su zad par
T02D2510-2:190b-26: chu bsgoms la 'og tu 'dzul ba dang gyen du
T02D2510-2:190b-27: bcings te / bstan par bya'o // 'byung bar bya'o
T02D2510-2:190b-28: // ram las phyogs bcur zad par me bsgoms la
T02D2510-2:190b-29: bcings te / bstan par bya'o // 'byung bar bya'o
T02D2510-2:190b-30: // 'bar bar bya'o // yi ge yam las rlung
T02D2510-2:190b-31: gi phung po bsgoms te nam mkha' la khyer bar
T02D2510-2:190b-32: bcings te / bstan par bya'o // 'byung bar bya'o
T02D2510-2:190b-33: // 'bar bar bya'o // bya'o // kham las zad
T02D2510-2:190b-34: par nam mkha' bsgoms la rtsig pa las kyang thal
T02D2510-2:190b-35: bcings te / bstan par bya'o // 'byung bar bya'o
T02D2510-2:190b-37: las kyang thal nas 'gro ba dang 'ong ba lus
T02D2510-2:190b-38: thogs pa med pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:190b-39: yi ge hri las gzugs thams cad bstan par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:190b-40: de la dang po las dang rjes su mthun pa'i
T02D2510-2:190b-41: yi ge dang bzlas pa'i sngags dang lhan cig sbyang
T02D2510-2:190b-42: bas rdzu 'phrul mtha' dag ston par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:190b-43: khams gsum rnam rgyal mchog tu ni //
T02D2510-2:190b-44: zhes bya ba rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya rnam
T02D2510-2:190b-45: pa bzhi yang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag
T02D2510-2:190b-47: rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya thams cad ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bshad pas /
T02D2510-2:190b-48: mnyam par gzhag pas bcings nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:190b-49: zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma thob pa g-yeng ba med pa'i sems so //
T02D2510-2:190b-50: mngon par shes pa lnga thob po //
T02D2510-2:190b-51: zhes bya ba ni ji skad bshad pa nyid do //
T02D2510-2:190b-53: cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa po //
T02D2510-2:191a-2: khros nas dgos pa thams cad ni //
T02D2510-2:191a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bshad pa'i mngon par
T02D2510-2:191a-5: shes pa lnga bskyed par byas nas zhes bya bas
T02D2510-2:191a-8: ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin bya //
T02D2510-2:191a-11: 'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis //
T02D2510-2:191a-14: mngon shes kun du skad cig 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:191a-16: 'gro ba sems can gyi khams so //
T02D2510-2:191a-17: de 'dis 'dul bas na 'gro ba 'dul ba ste padma'i rigs so //
T02D2510-2:191a-18: de'i phyag rgya ni 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs
T02D2510-2:191a-19: pa nas padma 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:191a-20: chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad do
T02D2510-2:191a-21: // de'i mchog ni dam par gyur pa ste /
T02D2510-2:191a-22: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya mchog de bcings nas zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2510-2:191a-24: rab mnyam bzhag pas zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2510-2:191a-25: de bcings pas ci zhig thob ce na /
T02D2510-2:191a-26: mngon par shes pa lnga thob po zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2510-2:191a-27: ji ltar bshad pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga thob po //
T02D2510-2:191a-29: cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa po //
T02D2510-2:191a-30: zhes bya ba ni de ma thag tu 'chad par 'gyur ba'i don gyis so //
T02D2510-2:191a-32: ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du //
T02D2510-2:191a-33: cho ga bzhin du 'dod pas chags //
T02D2510-2:191a-35: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos rtog pas
T02D2510-2:191a-36: sred pa'i 'dod pas de dang de la chags shing
T02D2510-2:191a-37: shin tu chags pas bsgoms pa de'i phyir 'dod pas
T02D2510-2:191a-38: chags pa ste / thabs dang shes rab kyi rang
T02D2510-2:191a-39: bzhin gyis 'jig rten dbang phyug gi chags pa yin
T02D2510-2:191a-40: no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:191a-41: cho ga bzhin du ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:191a-42: 'dod pas chags pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i sbyor ba des so //
T02D2510-2:191a-43: 'phrul gyi mig ni ye shes la sogs pa sngar
T02D2510-2:191a-44: bshad pa'i go rims gang dang gang yin pa de'i
T02D2510-2:191a-47: 'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis //
T02D2510-2:191a-50: mngon shes thams cad thob par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:191a-52: de'i don kun ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //
T02D2510-2:191b-0: @191b 'di yod pa las byung ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i nor bu'i rigs so //
T02D2510-2:191b-1: don thams cad grub par gyur pas mdzes pa 'di
T02D2510-2:191b-2: ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i don thams
T02D2510-2:191b-4: phyag rgya de rab tu mnyam par bzhag pas bcings pa ni mtshan ma thob pa'o //
T02D2510-2:191b-5: mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo //
T02D2510-2:191b-6: zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02D2510-2:191b-8: zhes bya ba ni de ma thag tu 'chang bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2510-2:191b-9: cho ga de gang yin zhe na /
T02D2510-2:191b-10: sangs rgyas rnams ni mchod byas nas //
T02D2510-2:191b-12: sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa ni sangs rgyas rnams la mchod ba ste /
T02D2510-2:191b-13: nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam par nor bu'i rigs gzugs
T02D2510-2:191b-14: brnyan tsam du bsgom pa 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams
T02D2510-2:191b-15: mchod pa'o // de byed pa ni shin tu mngon du byed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:191b-16: nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs
T02D2510-2:191b-17: pa'i go rims bzhin du bsgoms pa'i tshul gyis so
T02D2510-2:191b-18: // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bshad pa'i tshul
T02D2510-2:191b-19: des lha'i mig gis ye shes la sogs pa'i bskyed
T02D2510-2:191b-20: pa'i tshul gyis lha'i mig la sogs pa mngon par
T02D2510-2:191b-21: shes pa lnga'i rang bzhin nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal
T02D2510-2:191b-22: 'byor pas mthong zhing thos pas mngon du byed do
T02D2510-2:191b-24: de ltar mtshan ma thob bas mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:191b-25: da ni man 'dor ba'i brtul zhugs la rjes su
T02D2510-2:191b-26: 'jug pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa 'grub
T02D2510-2:191b-27: par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir
T02D2510-2:191b-28: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-2:191b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so ;
T02D2510-2:191b-30: / mna' dor nas bden pa yongs su skyong zhing
T02D2510-2:191b-31: bsrung ba phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos
T02D2510-2:191b-32: grub 'grub pa'o // de ston par byed pa'i rgyud de phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:191b-33: bden pa ni phyin ci ma log pa'o //
T02D2510-2:191b-34: rjes su bskor ba'i ngang tshul gang la mnga' ba de ni bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'o ;
T02D2510-2:191b-35: / des bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /
T02D2510-2:191b-36: tshig gis mna' ni 'dor byed cing //
T02D2510-2:191b-37: zhes bya ba'i mna' dor ba'o //
T02D2510-2:191b-38: bde ba chen po bsrungs na ni //
T02D2510-2:191b-39: zhes bya ba la sgrub cing nan tan du byed pas na bsrung ba'o //
T02D2510-2:191b-40: bden pa yang yin la chen po yang de yin
T02D2510-2:192a-0: pas na de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i @192a *
T02D2510-2:192a-3: myur du sangs rgyas nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid thob po zhes bya ba smos so //
T02D2510-2:192a-5: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:192a-6: pa lnga'i nang nas gang yang rung ba'i da bzhin
T02D2510-2:192a-7: gshegs pa bsgrub par 'dod na dkyil 'khor du 'jug
T02D2510-2:192a-8: par bya'o // deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2510-2:192a-9: cad kyi rigs su zhugs pa'i ngas khyod la ye
T02D2510-2:192a-10: shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du
T02D2510-2:192a-11: 'grub pa yang thob na dngos grub gzhan lta smos
T02D2510-2:192a-13: de lta bu'i rdo rje ye shes bskyed par byas kyis /
T02D2510-2:192a-14: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams
T02D2510-2:192a-15: lam smra shig / dam tshig nyams par gyur ta
T02D2510-2:192a-16: re // 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis /
T02D2510-2:192a-17: gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:192a-18: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D2510-2:192a-19: snying la yang dag zhugs par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:192a-20: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D2510-2:192a-21: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D2510-2:192a-22: aom badzra au da ka tha /
T02D2510-2:192a-23: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje
T02D2510-2:192a-24: nga yin gyis ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba
T02D2510-2:192a-25: gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
T02D2510-2:192a-26: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /
T02D2510-2:192a-27: mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas
T02D2510-2:192a-28: dmyal par ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la
T02D2510-2:192a-29: / slob dpon nam bcom ldan 'das las nges par mngon par 'dod pa'am dngos grub blangs la /
T02D2510-2:192a-30: de snga ma bzhin du nan tan byas na de
T02D2510-2:192a-31: lta bus dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du blangs pa
T02D2510-2:192a-32: de snga ma bzhin nan tan byas na de lta
T02D2510-2:192a-34: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i mna' bsgags pas ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D2510-2:192a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs byung ba //
T02D2510-2:192a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs ni rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams nas /
T02D2510-2:192a-38: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa 'byung zhing bskyed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:192a-39: snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor du zhugs te /
T02D2510-2:192a-40: mngon par 'dod pa'i don gyis dngos grub bcom ldan 'das sam /
T02D2510-2:192a-41: slob dpon gyi mdun du mna' dor la ji lta ba bzhin du nan tan du bya'o //
T02D2510-2:192a-42: rdo rje 'dzin gyis mna' dor zhing //
T02D2510-2:192a-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-2:192a-44: rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas rdo rje'i rigs
T02D2510-2:192b-0: las gsungs pa'i dngos grub sgrub par 'dod pas @192b
T02D2510-2:192b-1: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:192b-2: gyi rdo rje gzungs kyi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2510-2:192b-3: mna' 'dor la snga ma bzhin du mngon par 'dod
T02D2510-2:192b-4: pa'i dngos grub de lta bus rdo rje'i rigs las
T02D2510-2:192b-5: bshad pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:192b-6: dam pa'i chos la mna' dor zhing //
T02D2510-2:192b-7: zhes bya ba ni dam pa'i chos ni padma'i rigs te /
T02D2510-2:192b-8: de'i mna' dor ba bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:192b-10: padma'i rigs las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod pas padma rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs te /
T02D2510-2:192b-11: mna' dor nas snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2510-2:192b-12: nan tan du byas pa de lta bus padma'i rigs kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:192b-13: sangs rgyas mchod la mna' dor zhing //
T02D2510-2:192b-14: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas mchod pa ni nor bu'i rigs so //
T02D2510-2:192b-15: de'i mna' shin tu dor bas sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i mna' 'gyur bas de bsrung bar yang bya'o //
T02D2510-2:192b-16: yang snga ma bzhin du nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs te /
T02D2510-2:192b-17: de las bshad pa'i gzugs byas nas /
T02D2510-2:192b-18: snga ma bzhin bsgrub par byas pa de lta bus
T02D2510-2:192b-19: nor bu'i rigs las bshad pa'i dngos grub thob par
T02D2510-2:192b-21: dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:192b-22: zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mchod pas gsungs so //
T02D2510-2:192b-23: sangs rgyas mchod pa ni bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'o zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-2:192b-24: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mna'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:192b-25: da ni sa ma ya stvam zhes bya ba la
T02D2510-2:192b-26: sogs pas phyag rgya thams cad kyi dngos grub de
T02D2510-2:192b-27: kho na nyid bskul ba'i snying po zlos shing phyag
T02D2510-2:192b-28: rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad
T02D2510-2:192b-29: bcing bar bya ba'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:192b-30: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa de bzhin
T02D2510-2:192b-31: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi
T02D2510-2:192b-32: de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs
T02D2510-2:192b-33: pa yin no // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni ji skad du bshad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:192b-34: rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:192b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs de dag
T02D2510-2:192b-38: gi dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-2:192b-39: kyi rigs kyi dam tshig ste /
T02D2510-2:192b-40: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D2510-2:193a-3: de kho na nyid ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i ngo bo'am de kho na nyid de /
T02D2510-2:193a-4: de ston par byed pa'i snying po la yang dam tshig gi de kho na nyid ces bya'o //
T02D2510-2:193a-5: de'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgya bcings pa grub pa'o //
T02D2510-2:193a-6: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs shing bstan pa'o //
T02D2510-2:193a-7: sa ma ya stvam zhes bya ba ni brjod pas
T02D2510-2:193a-8: de kho na nyid bskul ba'i snying po gsungs ba
T02D2510-2:193a-9: zlos pa'o // phyag rgya kun ni dam tshig dang /
T02D2510-2:193a-11: phyag rgya chen po rnams so //
T02D2510-2:193a-12: rigs rnams la'ang zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ste /
T02D2510-2:193a-16: nor bu'i rigs la yang ngo //
T02D2510-2:193a-17: nyid kyis bcings nas brtan par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:193a-18: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid bskul bas
T02D2510-2:193a-19: mnyes par gyur pas phyag rgya chen po la sogs
T02D2510-2:193a-20: pa'i phyag rgya thams cad rang nyid kyis bcings pas
T02D2510-2:193a-21: na de kho na nyid bskul ba'i dus su ji
T02D2510-2:193a-22: ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa dbang
T02D2510-2:193a-24: de nas phyis bsgrub pa bya'o //
T02D2510-2:193a-25: de'i rjes la de kho na nyid bskul ba'i dus
T02D2510-2:193a-26: phyis de'i 'og tu ma bsgrubs par yang de kho
T02D2510-2:193a-27: na nyid bskul bar gyur to //
T02D2510-2:193a-29: sa ma ya stvam brjod cing /
T02D2510-2:193a-30: thog ma kho na phyag rgya chen po la sogs
T02D2510-2:193a-31: pa'i phyag rgya bcings la phyis sngags bzlas par bya'o
T02D2510-2:193a-32: // de skad du yang de kho na nyid bsdus
T02D2510-2:193a-33: pa'i rgyud chen po stong phrag brgya pa las sa
T02D2510-2:193a-34: ma ya stvam zhes brjod pas phyag rgya chen po
T02D2510-2:193a-35: la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad bcing par bya'o
T02D2510-2:193a-36: // zhes gsungs so // de ltar de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:193a-37: pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:193a-38: bcings pa'i spyi'i snying po bshad nas /
T02D2510-2:193a-39: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi
T02D2510-2:193a-40: bye brag gi snying po ni zhes bya ba la
T02D2510-2:193a-42: su ra ta stvam zhes brjod na zhes bya ba
T02D2510-2:193a-43: ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs
T02D2510-2:193a-44: pa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi
T02D2510-2:193a-45: dbyings las byung ba zag pa med pa'i bde ba
T02D2510-2:193a-46: yang yid bde ba'i rang bzhin rgyun mi 'chad pa'i
T02D2510-2:193a-47: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ye shes ni bdag yin
T02D2510-2:193a-48: no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:193a-50: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02D2510-2:193b-0: dbang phyug chen po @193b lhag pa'i lha //
T02D2510-2:193b-1: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02D2510-2:193b-2: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod //
T02D2510-2:193b-4: brjod na zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D2510-2:193b-5: phyag rgya kun ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad de /
T02D2510-2:193b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams so //
T02D2510-2:193b-7: ma bsgrubs par yang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:193b-8: su ra ta stvam zhes bya ba'i snying pos ma
T02D2510-2:193b-9: bsgrubs na yang nyid kyis bcing bas brtan par 'gyur
T02D2510-2:193b-10: zhes bya ste / ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2510-2:193b-11: de nyid bskul bas bdag nyid che'i //
T02D2510-2:193b-13: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i'o //
T02D2510-2:193b-14: dam tshig kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na dam tshig chen po ste /
T02D2510-2:193b-15: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje 'chang
T02D2510-2:193b-16: chen po ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po ste
T02D2510-2:193b-17: / de kho na nyid ni rab tu dga' ba nyid dang /
T02D2510-2:193b-18: kun tu bzang po nyid do //
T02D2510-2:193b-20: dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid smras pa /
T02D2510-2:193b-21: rab dga' kun du bzang po'o ;
T02D2510-2:193b-23: h'um zhes bya ba gcig tsam gyis //
T02D2510-2:193b-24: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi
T02D2510-2:193b-25: phyag rgya yi ge h'um brjod pas slob dpon rang
