T02D2510-2:199b-13: thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi
T02D2510-2:199b-14: rgyud ni / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-2:199b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rigs
T02D2510-2:199b-16: kyang de yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2510-2:199b-18: de dag gi ting nge 'dzin ni rang gi lha'i
T02D2510-2:199b-19: dngos grub sgrub pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa'o
T02D2510-2:199b-20: // de'i dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2510-2:199b-21: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:199b-22: rgyal ba kun gyi rnam pa ni //
T02D2510-2:199b-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'am /
T02D2510-2:199b-24: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D2510-2:199b-25: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni rnam pa ste /
T02D2510-2:199b-26: rnam pa de rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2510-2:199b-30: don yod par grub pa rnams ni rgyal ba kun no //
T02D2510-2:199b-31: phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2510-2:199b-35: mnyam par bzhag pas bcings zhes bya ba ni sems yid rtse gcig pas so //
T02D2510-2:199b-36: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur pa'o //
T02D2510-2:199b-38: sngags kyi rig pa bzlas nas ni //
T02D2510-2:199b-40: dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa dang /
T02D2510-2:199b-41: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa dang /
T02D2510-2:199b-42: gzungs dang las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sngags
T02D2510-2:199b-43: kyi nang nas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang du
T02D2510-2:199b-44: byas pa'i rig pa brjod pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:199b-46: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad
T02D2510-2:199b-47: pa'i cho gas rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal
T02D2510-2:200a-1: ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2510-2:200a-2: phyag rgya bzhi byas nas rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2510-2:200a-3: de'i ngo bor bdag nyid rnam par bsams te /
T02D2510-2:200a-4: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i snying po po'am /
T02D2510-2:200a-5: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags bzla par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:200a-6: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa'am /
T02D2510-2:200a-7: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig pa yang bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:200a-8: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:200a-9: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad
T02D2510-2:200a-10: pa'i cho gas rang la byin gyis brlabs pa la
T02D2510-2:200a-12: dum bu thams cad las bshad pa'i snying po dang /
T02D2510-2:200a-15: rig pa rnams zlos pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2510-2:200a-16: sprul par byed pa ni byin gyis brlab pa la
T02D2510-2:200a-17: sogs pa de dag so sor mi bya'o //
T02D2510-2:200a-18: ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo rje chos kyis kyang //
T02D2510-2:200a-19: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje yang yin la chos kyang de yin pas rdo rje chos te /
T02D2510-2:200a-20: rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i ting nge 'dzin des de
T02D2510-2:200a-21: la dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2510-2:200a-22: // sems dpar byin rlabs tshul gyis ni ;
T02D2510-2:200a-23: / zhes bya ba ni sems dpa' ni de bzhin
T02D2510-2:200a-24: gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i snying ga'i zla
T02D2510-2:200a-25: ba de la byin gyis brlabs pa pa ni dngos
T02D2510-2:200a-26: por 'dzin pa nye bar spangs pa mtshon pa rdo
T02D2510-2:200a-28: stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje yongs su gzung ngo //
T02D2510-2:200a-29: de bsgom pa'i tshul ni de bsgom pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2510-2:200a-30: sems dpar byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge
T02D2510-2:200a-31: 'dzin de ltar gyur pas des cir 'gyur zhe na
T02D2510-2:200a-32: / snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams //
T02D2510-2:200a-34: de la snying po ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i snying po'o //
T02D2510-2:200a-35: phyag rgya ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa rnams so //
T02D2510-2:200a-36: sngags ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:200a-37: rig pa ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa'o //
T02D2510-2:200a-39: ting nge 'dzin dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig sngags pa zlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:200b-0: sangs rgyas kyi ting @200b nge 'dzin rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid kyis gsungs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:200b-2: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas rdo rje
T02D2510-2:200b-3: 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
T02D2510-2:200b-4: kyi rnal 'byor pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:200b-5: chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas rang la byin
T02D2510-2:200b-6: gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2510-2:200b-7: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D2510-2:200b-8: du h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'greng ba
T02D2510-2:200b-9: bsams la / lte ba'i dbus su gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor ba byas te /
T02D2510-2:200b-10: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i snying po'am /
T02D2510-2:200b-11: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi rig pa'am /
T02D2510-2:200b-12: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sngags sam /
T02D2510-2:200b-13: yang na las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang
T02D2510-2:200b-14: gi rig pa'i yi ge'i phreng ba mgo gyen du
T02D2510-2:200b-16: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo
T02D2510-2:200b-17: rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rang gi phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:200b-18: bcings la ; sems dpa' rdo rje mngon sum lta bur bsgoms nas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2510-2:200b-19: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:200b-20: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad
T02D2510-2:200b-21: pa'i byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas
T02D2510-2:200b-22: / rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:200b-23: da ni rdo rje rigs kyi ting 'dzin ni //
T02D2510-2:200b-24: 'dod chags las ni khyod byung ste //
T02D2510-2:200b-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-2:200b-26: de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos
T02D2510-2:200b-27: kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid kyi thugs rje chen po
T02D2510-2:200b-29: de'i phyir de ltar gyur pa'i mi dmigs pa la
T02D2510-2:200b-30: thugs rje chen po'i 'dod chags las yang dag par
T02D2510-2:200b-32: 'dod chags las byung ba'i khro bo gang yin pa de bdag yin te /
T02D2510-2:200b-33: khyed gang yin pa de bdag yin no zhes de
T02D2510-2:200b-34: ltar chu dang 'o ma bzhin gcig tu gyur phar
T02D2510-2:200b-35: mos par bya'o // de ltar bsgoms par gyur pa des ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-2:200b-36: snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams //
T02D2510-2:200b-38: rdo rje'i rigs las bshad pa rnams so //
T02D2510-2:200b-39: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:200b-40: de bsgrubs na zhes bya ba tshig lhag ma'o //
T02D2510-2:200b-41: de ltar rdo rje rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:200b-42: da ni padma'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin ni /
T02D2510-2:200b-43: byams pa 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2510-2:201a-2: de la phyogs bcu'i sems can gyi khams thams cad padma'i rigs kyi ngo bos phan pa dang /
T02D2510-2:201a-3: bde ba bsdus pa'i phan pa'i rigs kyi ngo bor bsgrubs nas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:201a-4: byams pas 'gengs pa'i tshul can te /
T02D2510-2:201a-5: padma'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D2510-2:201a-6: de ltar byas pas 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-2:201a-7: snying po la sogs bsgrubs na yang //
T02D2510-2:201a-9: padma'i rigs las bshad pa'i snying po dang /
T02D2510-2:201a-13: bsgrub pa ni nan tan byed pa ste /
T02D2510-2:201a-14: sgrub pa po yi ting nge 'dzin 'di yis //
T02D2510-2:201a-15: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-2:201a-16: de ci'i phyir 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rigs ni padma'i rigs te /
T02D2510-2:201a-21: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po la dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:201a-22: da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin la
T02D2510-2:201a-23: nam mkha' kun gyi ting nge 'dzin ni zhes bya
T02D2510-2:201a-24: ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-2:201a-25: nam mkha' yang de yin la kun kyang de yin pas na nam mkha' kun te /
T02D2510-2:201a-26: nor bu'i rigs de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni nam mkha' kun gyi ting nge 'dzin te /
T02D2510-2:201a-27: yang dang yang mngon du byas nas bsgoms na yang ngo //
T02D2510-2:201a-29: rab mnyam gzhag ces bya ba smos te /
T02D2510-2:201a-30: g-yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis yid gzhan du ma gyur pa'o //
T02D2510-2:201a-31: nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas de ltar bsgoms na /
T02D2510-2:201a-32: snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:201a-34: kun 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba smos te ;
T02D2510-2:201a-36: snga ma bzhin du thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:201a-37: chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas nor bu'i rigs
T02D2510-2:201a-39: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02D2510-2:201a-40: rang gi snying ga'i zla bar rdo rje rin chen tram las bskyed nas /
T02D2510-2:201a-41: de la bzlas pa'i yi ge rnam par bkod de ;
T02D2510-2:201a-42: phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2510-2:201a-43: de nyid brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:201a-44: sems can gyi khams thams cad la nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la /
T02D2510-2:201a-45: nor bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du bsgrubs te bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:201b-0: de ltar rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma @201b rnams
T02D2510-2:201b-1: kyi rig pa'i yi ge bsgom pa ni thams cad
T02D2510-2:201b-3: de ltar rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:201b-4: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
T02D2510-2:201b-5: kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs
T02D2510-2:201b-6: pa ni / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-2:201b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rigs kyang yin pas na /
T02D2510-2:201b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs te /
T02D2510-2:201b-9: ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
T02D2510-2:201b-10: de dag mchod pa'i rnal 'byor gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur
T02D2510-2:201b-11: ba gang yin pa de ni mchod pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:201b-12: ste / de rnams grub pa ni mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub ste /
T02D2510-2:201b-13: phyag rgya chen po la sogs sgrub po //
T02D2510-2:201b-14: mnyam par gzhag pa dang por ni //
T02D2510-2:201b-15: bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la //
T02D2510-2:201b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2510-2:201b-17: la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor pa
T02D2510-2:201b-18: dpa' bo gcig pur bdag nyid byas nas phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:201b-20: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing /
T02D2510-2:201b-21: ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rang
T02D2510-2:201b-22: gi lus la bcug pa phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab
T02D2510-2:201b-23: nas byin gyis brlab pa dang dbang bskur la /
T02D2510-2:201b-24: de nas de dag gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams nas /
T02D2510-2:201b-25: gar las byung ba 'dug pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhis bdag la mchod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:201b-26: de nas snga ma bzhin du bdug pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang phyag bzhi bya'o //
T02D2510-2:201b-27: de nas yi ge aa las rgyal ba thams cad
T02D2510-2:201b-28: kyi phyag rgya bcings te mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom
T02D2510-2:201b-29: mo // bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:201b-30: zhes bya ba ni slob ma'i dbang du byas nas mchod pa'i cho ga shes par bya ba dang /
T02D2510-2:201b-31: bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor tsam dang /
T02D2510-2:201b-32: mdun gyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang du byas nas kyang mchod pa'i cho ga thams cad shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:201b-33: slob dpon rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan pa rnams
T02D2510-2:201b-34: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor las bshad pa'i mchod pa
T02D2510-2:201b-35: thams cad rigs thams cad la yang shes par bya
T02D2510-2:201b-36: ba yin no // gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam bzhi yis ;
T02D2510-2:201b-37: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam
T02D2510-2:201b-38: pa bzhi ni sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa
T02D2510-2:201b-39: rnam pa bzhi yin no zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2510-2:201b-40: // gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhi po 'di
T02D2510-2:201b-41: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:201b-42: pa'i gsang ba ste de brjod pa'o //
T02D2510-2:201b-43: aom rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas na //
T02D2510-2:202a-2: rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas //
T02D2510-2:202a-3: rdo rje las rnams byed par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:202a-5: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pas gar byed cing
T02D2510-2:202a-6: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i snying po 'di yang brjod
T02D2510-2:202a-7: par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:202a-8: de ltar sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod
T02D2510-2:202a-9: pa rnam pa bzhis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod
T02D2510-2:202a-10: nas las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i mchod pa
T02D2510-2:202a-11: rnam pa bcu drug gis bdag nyid mchod par byas
T02D2510-2:202a-12: nas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i
T02D2510-2:202a-13: phyir / bdag dbul ba'i zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2510-2:202a-14: 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bsdu ba'o //
T02D2510-2:202a-15: bdag dbul ba la sogs pa yang //
T02D2510-2:202a-17: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:202a-18: da ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchod pa ni //
T02D2510-2:202a-19: khro bo rdo rje mchod chen po //
T02D2510-2:202a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-2:202a-21: khro bo rdo rje ni rdo rje'i rigs so //
T02D2510-2:202a-22: de'i mchod pa chen po ni sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i gsang ba rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D2510-2:202a-23: khro bo'i gsang ba rjod byed cing //
T02D2510-2:202a-24: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du rdo rje'i
T02D2510-2:202a-25: glu brjod cing rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis su byas
T02D2510-2:202a-26: nas yang dang yang du gar byas te /
T02D2510-2:202a-27: khro bo'i rdo rje khu tshur gnyis su byas pa
T02D2510-2:202a-28: las rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i las kyi
T02D2510-2:202a-29: phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi bcings nas /
T02D2510-2:202a-30: aom badzra l'a sya r'a ga ya h'um phat ces
T02D2510-2:202a-31: bya ba la sogs sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang
T02D2510-2:202a-32: ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhi'i snying po brjod cing
T02D2510-2:202a-33: khro bo'i gsang ba yang brjod nas /
T02D2510-2:202a-34: khro bo'i khu tshur gyis gar byed cing brjod pas so //
T02D2510-2:202a-36: rdo rje khu tshur rab byas nas //
T02D2510-2:202a-38: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub tu byas te ;
T02D2510-2:202a-39: bskyed pa ni khro bo'i khu tshur ro //
T02D2510-2:202a-40: de byas nas mchod pa'i dngos grub myur du rnal 'byor pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:202a-42: myur du bdag gi rigs sgrub po //
T02D2510-2:202a-43: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
T02D2510-2:202a-44: da ni padma'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub ni /
T02D2510-2:202a-45: mdo sde zab mo rgya che ba'i //
T02D2510-2:202a-46: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-2:202a-47: de la zab pa ni chos thams cad rang bzhin
T02D2510-2:202a-48: gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro
T02D2510-2:202a-49: // rgya che ba ni nam mkha'i khams khyab pa'i gzugs du ma ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:202a-50: mdor bstan pas na mdo sde ste /
T02D2510-2:202b-0: de'i don mdor bstan pa brjod pa'i stobs kyis sems la nges pa bskyed @202b pa'o ;
T02D2510-2:202b-1: / padma'i sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod
T02D2510-2:202b-2: pa rnam pa bzhis mdor bsdus pa ston pa'i mdo
T02D2510-2:202b-4: padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i
T02D2510-2:202b-5: mchod pa rnam pa bcu drug gis kyang mdor bsdus
T02D2510-2:202b-6: pa brjod pa'o // zab pa yang yin la rgya
T02D2510-2:202b-7: che ba yang de yin pas na mdo sde ste
T02D2510-2:202b-8: pa brjod pa'o // / mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba'o //
T02D2510-2:202b-9: de dag gi rgyud 'bum pa la sogs pa rgya
T02D2510-2:202b-10: cher bstan pa de las mdor bsdus nas brjod cing
T02D2510-2:202b-11: / rab tu ston pa'i mchod pa de de bzhin
T02D2510-2:202b-12: gshegs pa la sogs pa padma'i rigs thams cad la
T02D2510-2:202b-13: dbul zhing rab tu mchod pa'o //
T02D2510-2:202b-14: dbul ba de gang yin zhe na /
T02D2510-2:202b-15: yid dang ngag gis phul nas ni ;
T02D2510-2:202b-17: yid kyi thabs dang shes rab kyi gzugs kyis nam
T02D2510-2:202b-18: mkha'i khams thams cad mtha' yas pa bkang ba'i glu
T02D2510-2:202b-19: dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa'i snying po phul bas //
T02D2510-2:202b-20: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:202b-23: snga ma bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:202b-24: chen po las bshad pa'i sbyor bas rang gi 'jig
T02D2510-2:202b-25: rten dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-2:202b-26: ye shes sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang gi lus la bcug la /
T02D2510-2:202b-27: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02D2510-2:202b-28: padma'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa
T02D2510-2:202b-29: gar las byung ba rnams kyis bdag nyid mchod la
T02D2510-2:202b-30: / padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad
T02D2510-2:202b-31: pa'i mchod pa bcu drug gis las kyi phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:202b-32: / de rnam dang / thams cad shes rab kyi
T02D2510-2:202b-33: rang bzhin gyis thams cad du khyab par bsam par
T02D2510-2:202b-34: / de rnam dang / bya'o // de ltar padma'i rigs kyi mchod pa bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:202b-35: da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa ni ;
T02D2510-2:202b-36: / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan rnams kyis //
T02D2510-2:202b-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-2:202b-42: 'phan de rnams kyis mchod na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:202b-43: gdugs la sogs pa ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02D2510-2:202b-47: rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa'i gzugs de
T02D2510-2:202b-48: rnams kyis mchod na rnal 'byor pas 'grub par 'gyur
T02D2510-2:202b-49: ro // mchod pa gang yin zhe na /
T02D2510-2:202b-50: sbyin pa thams cad sbyin na ni //
T02D2510-2:203a-1: kyis sbyin pa ma lus pa sbyin na 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2510-2:203a-3: nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-2:203a-4: ngon thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las
T02D2510-2:203a-5: bshad pa'i cho gas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul
T02D2510-2:203a-6: zhugs kyi mthar thug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes
T02D2510-2:203a-7: su spyad la rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa
T02D2510-2:203a-8: mchod pa rnam pa bzhi dang /
T02D2510-2:203a-9: nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu drug dang /
T02D2510-2:203a-10: nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa thams cad kyis bdag nyid mchod la /
T02D2510-2:203a-13: ba dang rnams kyis mchod pa re re zhing yang phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2510-2:203a-14: rgyal ba'i mchod pa rnams sbrul la de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:203a-15: pa la sogs pas sems can thams cad kyi khams
T02D2510-2:203a-16: thams cad la nor bu'i rigs su bskyed la /
T02D2510-2:203a-17: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa sbyin pas mchod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:203a-18: da ni rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i phan yon ni /
T02D2510-2:203a-19: rang la byin gyis brlab sogs ldan //
T02D2510-2:203a-20: rdo rje sems dpar mnyam par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:203a-22: rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas
T02D2510-2:203a-23: nas grub par ma gyur kyang rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2510-2:203a-24: la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nas /
T02D2510-2:203a-25: rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:203a-26: pa'i rigs thams cad dad 'dra bar rigs nges par
T02D2510-2:203a-28: rnal 'byor pa mngon par byang chub pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:203a-29: cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi yis ni //
T02D2510-2:203a-30: rdo rje sna tshogs 'grub byed cing //
T02D2510-2:203a-31: zhes bya ba ni cho 'phrul gyi phan yon bstan
T02D2510-2:203a-32: pas byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul
T02D2510-2:203a-33: rnam pa bzhis bshad pas phyag rgya chen po dang
T02D2510-2:203a-36: las kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gyi lha'i gzugs kyi
T02D2510-2:203a-37: rnal 'byor par bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa la
T02D2510-2:203a-38: sogs pas sna tshogs rdo rjer bsgrubs na 'grub par
T02D2510-2:203a-39: 'gyur ro // de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2510-2:203a-41: ting nge 'dzin dang mchod pa bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:203a-42: da ni sngar bshad pa'i tshum [*tshums?] gyis mngon par
T02D2510-2:203a-43: shes pa sgrub par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs
T02D2510-2:203a-44: par rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs
T02D2510-2:203b-0: pas / @203b mtshan thog thag yang bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:203b-1: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin
T02D2510-2:203b-2: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mngon par shes
T02D2510-2:203b-3: pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs pa
T02D2510-2:203b-4: yin no // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2510-2:203b-5: de dag gi mngon par shes pa ni lnga'o //
T02D2510-2:203b-6: de'i ye shes ni khong du chud pa'o //
T02D2510-2:203b-7: de'i dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa grub pa'o //
T02D2510-2:203b-8: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:203b-9: lus la sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ni //
T02D2510-2:203b-10: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa'o //
T02D2510-2:203b-11: na zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D2510-2:203b-12: sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa kho nar sems rtse gcig pa'o //
T02D2510-2:203b-13: mdzes par gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa ni bde gshegs nyid mngon par shes te /
T02D2510-2:203b-14: mdzes par gshegs pa 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:203b-15: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i sems rtse gcig pa'o //
T02D2510-2:203b-17: 'di la rab tu rtogs na ni //
T02D2510-2:203b-18: sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub thob //
T02D2510-2:203b-20: de'i sangs rgyas ni mngon par shes pa'o //
T02D2510-2:203b-21: rab tu rtogs par gyur pa de ni rab tu rtogs par gyur pa nyid de /
T02D2510-2:203b-22: de'i phyir rab tu rtogs pa nyid kyis de rnams
T02D2510-2:203b-23: kyi de kho na nyid do zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2510-2:203b-25: sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rtogs pa ni //
T02D2510-2:203b-26: mngon sum lta bur mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:203b-27: bdag nyid kyang ni mi shes shing //
T02D2510-2:203b-30: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:203b-31: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor bsgoms la /
T02D2510-2:203b-32: gang gi tshe mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de'i tshe mngon par shes pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:203b-33: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2510-2:203b-34: lus kun de bzhin gshegs rnams dang //
T02D2510-2:203b-35: byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsgoms la //
T02D2510-2:203b-36: de bzhin lus la byung mthong na //
T02D2510-2:203b-37: zhes bya ba ji srid du rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2510-2:203b-38: la sogs pa'i gzugs su mngon sum lta bur mthong
T02D2510-2:203b-39: bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par
T02D2510-2:203b-40: bya'o // de lta bus mngon par shes pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:204a-0: de nas snga ma bzhin du mtshan thog thag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag @204a * //
T02D2510-2:204a-1: nyid du bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur na phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:204a-2: chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur
T02D2510-2:204a-3: ro // de ltar de bzhin 'grub pa'i de bzhin
T02D2510-2:204a-4: gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa thob pa'i sgrub pa
T02D2510-2:204a-5: ro // bstan nas / da ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:204a-6: pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas sngar bshad pa'i tshul
T02D2510-2:204a-7: gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes
T02D2510-2:204a-8: ro // bstan nas / pa bskyed nas / rdo

T02D2510-2:204a-11: ro // bstan nas / pa bskyed nas / /
T02D2510-2:204a-12: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D2510-2:204a-13: ro // bstan nas / pa bskyed nas / / / 'phrul gyi mig sogs mngon shes ni //
T02D2510-2:204a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lha'i mig dang /
T02D2510-2:204a-16: gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang /

T02D2510-2:204a-18: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs

T02D2510-2:204a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:204a-27: de bzhin du rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas
T02D2510-2:204a-28: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis khro bo'i mngon par shes
T02D2510-2:204a-30: de nas mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa'i dkyil 'khor bris te /
T02D2510-2:204a-31: mtshan thog thag rang gi lha'i khro bo bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:204a-32: de'i rjes la rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:204a-34: mngon shes ldar ni bdag gyur nas //
T02D2510-2:204a-35: dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:204a-37: 'dod chags mngon shes bskyed nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:204a-38: zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags ni padma'i rigs te /
T02D2510-2:204a-39: de'i mngon par shes pa lnga ni snga ma bzhin no//

T02D2510-2:204a-42: dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:204a-43: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i shes
T02D2510-2:204a-44: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas
T02D2510-2:204a-45: mngon sum du byed pa'i mtshan nyid dngos grub thob
T02D2510-2:204b-0: par 'gyur te / 'jig rten @204b dpa' phyug nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:204b-2: mchod pa ni nor bu'i rigs so //
T02D2510-2:204b-3: de'i mngon shes ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2510-2:204b-4: de bskyed pa ni sngar bshad pa nyid kyi cho gas mngon sum du byas pa'o //
T02D2510-2:204b-5: mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms na ni //
T02D2510-2:204b-6: zhes bya ba la nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02D2510-2:204b-7: rang gi lha'i mtshan thog thag bsgom mo //
T02D2510-2:204b-8: mngon shes lngar yang bdag gyur nas //
T02D2510-2:204b-9: zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa lnga dang
T02D2510-2:204b-10: ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2510-2:204b-11: to // dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:204b-12: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin
T02D2510-2:204b-13: gyi don thams cad grub pa'i dngos grub thams cad
T02D2510-2:204b-14: kyi dam pa nyid du de 'gyur ro zhes bya
T02D2510-2:204b-15: ba'i don to // de ltar mngon par shes pa
T02D2510-2:204b-16: lnga bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2510-2:204b-17: rigs kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:204b-18: da ni sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i dus
T02D2510-2:204b-19: su yang byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi phyag
T02D2510-2:204b-20: rgya chen po la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-2:204b-21: thams cad kyi rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas bsgrub par
T02D2510-2:204b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi byang
T02D2510-2:204b-24: chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni
T02D2510-2:204b-25: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-2:204b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rigs kyang yin pas te /
T02D2510-2:204b-27: ji skad du bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rjes su

T02D2510-2:204b-32: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2510-2:204b-33: zhes bya ba ni zla ba rdo rje'i rnam par
T02D2510-2:204b-34: rtse gcig pas na rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge
T02D2510-2:204b-35: 'dzin to // de la gnas pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'o //
T02D2510-2:204b-36: sbyor ba gang gis rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas she na /
T02D2510-2:204b-37: bdag gis sangs rgyas dran byed cing //
T02D2510-2:204b-39: bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de
T02D2510-2:204b-40: bzhin gshegs pa'i sgom pa pos sangs rgyas rjes su

T02D2510-2:205a-3: ga'i zla ba'i rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa dran
T02D2510-2:205a-4: pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa 'di ni sangs
T02D2510-2:205a-6: de nyid kyi ye shes ni don nges pa ste /
T02D2510-2:205a-7: gang gis don shes pa 'dis cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-2:205a-8: ye shes 'di bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba smos so //

T02D2510-2:205a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgrub pa pos rgyud phyi ma
T02D2510-2:205a-11: la sogs pa'i dngos grub sgrub par 'dod na /

T02D2510-2:205a-13: rdo rje'i dbus su rig pa'i yi ge bkod la /
T02D2510-2:205a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs

T02D2510-2:205a-16: dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu yin no zhes

T02D2510-2:205a-27: de'i phyag rgya chen bo yang dang yang mngon du byed cing bsgom pa'o //
T02D2510-2:205a-28: byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di //
T02D2510-2:205a-29: zhes bya ba ni sems dpa'i rdo rje 'di dang
T02D2510-2:205a-30: bcas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgom
T02D2510-2:205a-31: pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub chen po
T02D2510-2:205a-32: 'di'o // de nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2510-2:205a-34: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:205a-35: pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas kyang rgyud phyi ma
T02D2510-2:205a-36: las bshad pa'i dngos grub sgrub par 'dod na rang
T02D2510-2:205a-37: gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2510-2:205a-39: chos dang las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bcings

T02D2510-2:205a-42: de / rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus su bzlas pa'i yi ge rnam par bsams la /
T02D2510-2:205a-43: de nyid brjod cing sems dpa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o //

T02D2510-2:205b-7: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgyal dam tshig mchog ces bshad do //

T02D2510-2:205b-9: ni sgrub pa po'i lag pas dam tshig mchog bcings

T02D2510-2:211b-27: // de'i phyir de ltar gyur pa'i khro ba med

T02D2510-2:211b-29: la khro ba mngon du byas zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2510-2:211b-30: // to // de bzhin sems can mi 'dul la //
T02D2510-2:211b-31: zhes bya ba ni sems can ni grags par zad do //
T02D2510-2:211b-32: de dag 'dul ba'i khro bas bsgrag par byas nas sdig pa dang bral te /
T02D2510-2:211b-33: lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid la sbyor ba'o //
T02D2510-2:211b-34: sems can mi 'dul ba ni gdul bya ma yin pa'i sems can gdul bar mi nus pa'o //
T02D2510-2:211b-35: bdag nyid 'dul la thob byed na //
T02D2510-2:211b-36: zhes bya ba ni nad la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal
T02D2510-2:211b-37: sgrub pa po la skyes pa ni de dag dngos
T02D2510-2:211b-38: grub mi thob pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:211b-39: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi bsgrub par bya ba'i lha'i
T02D2510-2:211b-40: steng du yi ge h'um las rdo rje 'bar ba
T02D2510-2:211b-41: lhung bas des bsad par gyur par bsam par bya'o
T02D2510-2:211b-42: // da ni padma'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi bsad pa ni /
T02D2510-2:212a-1: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-2:212a-2: snying rje med cing snying rje mi srid pa'o //
T02D2510-2:212a-4: sems can rnams bsgral bar mi 'dod pa'o //
T02D2510-2:212a-5: mdza' bo yod pa de bas na byams pa ste
T02D2510-2:212a-6: sems can la phan pa dang bde ba bsdus pa'o
T02D2510-2:212a-7: // byams pa med pa ni byams pa mi 'dogs pa ste /
T02D2510-2:212a-8: de bas na sems can ngan pa dmigs pa la spyod pa dang /
T02D2510-2:212a-10: ma sbyangs pa de dag gi rjes su 'dzin pa
T02D2510-2:212a-11: ma bsal bas yang dag pa'i lta ba la nges
T02D2510-2:212a-13: bdag nyid la ni bslus nas ni//
T02D2510-2:212a-15: log par lta ba bskyed pas na sngags dang /
T02D2510-2:212a-16: lha rnams dang sngags kyi dngos grub rnams don med
T02D2510-2:212a-17: pas 'jig rten pa la gnod par byed pa'o zhes
T02D2510-2:212a-19: de ltar dngos grub mi thob pa'i rgyur shes nas
T02D2510-2:212a-20: snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba'i lha spyan
T02D2510-2:212a-21: drangs te / mngon spyod kyi sbyor bas gsad par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:212a-22: da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub ni /
T02D2510-2:212a-23: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2510-2:212a-24: mi gtong bdag la nor med cing //
T02D2510-2:212a-25: zhes bya ba ni gtong ba ni phyi rol gyi
T02D2510-2:212a-26: rgyal srid la sogs pa chos thams cad mnyam pa
T02D2510-2:212a-27: nyid kyi ye shes kyis spangs pa ni btang ba'o
T02D2510-2:212a-28: // mi gtong ba ni gtong ba med pa ste //
T02D2510-2:212a-29: de'i phyir nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas nor
T02D2510-2:212a-30: bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa bdag nyid
T02D2510-2:212a-31: kyis mi gtong ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:212a-32: bdag la nor mi bdog pas na bdag la nor med cing ngo //
T02D2510-2:212a-33: nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i nor 'di bdag la med pa'o //
T02D2510-2:212a-34: nor ster ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa de las nyams pa'o //
T02D2510-2:212a-36: gnod byed la zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2510-2:212a-37: dam tshig nyams pas gnod pa de'i phyir na nor med pas gnod pa'o //
T02D2510-2:212a-38: sems can rnams ni dbul gyur na //
T02D2510-2:212a-39: zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams nor la sogs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:212a-40: 'byor pas dbul ba bsal bar mi nus pa'i dbul
T02D2510-2:212a-41: po de dag dngos grub mi thob pa'i rgyu nyid
T02D2510-2:212a-42: du shes nas nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas
T02D2510-2:212a-43: bsgrub par bya ba'i lha spyan drangs te /
T02D2510-2:212b-0: @212b mngon spyod kyi sbyor bas 'di gsad par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:212b-1: de ci'i phyir de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsad
T02D2510-2:212b-2: pa'i las gsungs zhes phyogs snga ma sems pas kha
T02D2510-2:212b-3: cig ni sangs rgyas kyi zhes bya ba smos te
T02D2510-2:212b-4: / kha cig ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs
T02D2510-2:212b-5: pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa rnams rnal 'byor pas ma
T02D2510-2:212b-6: thob na ji skad gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02D2510-2:212b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02D2510-2:212b-8: rigs thams cad dngos su gsod pa ni bdag tu
T02D2510-2:212b-9: 'dzin pa'i sems can de la gnod pa med do
T02D2510-2:212b-11: gsod pa'i sems de dag dang bral bar bya ba'i
T02D2510-2:212b-12: phyir gsod pa'i sems kyis bsad nas thabs kyis drang
T02D2510-2:212b-14: kho bo cag gis bstan pa'i bsad pa'i dngos grub
T02D2510-2:212b-15: kyi sbyor ba 'dis myur du 'di dngos grub sbyin
T02D2510-2:212b-16: par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du
T02D2510-2:212b-18: de ltar bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:212b-19: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor
T02D2510-2:212b-20: pa rnams kyis sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2510-2:212b-21: dus su rang dang gzhan dag bsrung bar bya'o zhes
T02D2510-2:212b-22: bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya
T02D2510-2:212b-23: ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-2:212b-24: kyi rigs kyi phyag rgyu'i bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi
T02D2510-2:212b-25: rgyud gsungs so // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-2:212b-26: dang rigs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-2:212b-27: rgyud gsungs so // de / de dag bsrung ba'i
T02D2510-2:212b-28: phyag rgya ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs
T02D2510-2:212b-29: pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang /
T02D2510-2:212b-30: rnal 'byor pa'i sems bral ba dang /
T02D2510-2:212b-31: rgyud gzhan la gnod pa sel ba'i phyag rgya gang
T02D2510-2:212b-32: dang gang byed pa de dang de la de skad
T02D2510-2:212b-33: ces bya'o // dngos grub des phyag rgya chen po
T02D2510-2:212b-34: la sogs pa grub pa de ston pa'i rgyud de
T02D2510-2:212b-35: ces bya'o // / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs shing bshad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:212b-36: sems can thams cad mi gtong zhing //
T02D2510-2:212b-37: zhes bya ba ni sems can yang yin la thams
T02D2510-2:212b-38: cad kyang de yin pas sems can thams cad de
T02D2510-2:212b-39: / ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i khams gsum
T02D2510-2:212b-40: pa na spyod pa'i lha la sogs pa'i sems can
T02D2510-2:212b-41: de dag yongs su mi gtong zhing /
T02D2510-2:213a-0: bdag gis 'di thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @213a * //
T02D2510-2:213a-1: pa'i byang chub la gzhag par bya'o zhes byang chub
T02D2510-2:213a-2: tu sems bskyed nas de dag sangs rgyas su bsgoms
T02D2510-2:213a-3: pas sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:213a-4: rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod bdag nyid //
T02D2510-2:213a-5: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa ste /
T02D2510-2:213a-6: las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i mchod pa bcu drug dang /
T02D2510-2:213a-7: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa de'i bdag nyid ni de'i rang bzhin te /
T02D2510-2:213a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i bdag
T02D2510-2:213a-9: nyid du rtag tu lhag par mos par bsam par
T02D2510-2:213a-10: bya'o // rtag par sangs rgyas yid la byed /
T02D2510-2:213a-11: ces bya ba ni spyod lam rnam pa bzhi las sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:213a-12: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bsrung ba'i dngos grub bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:213a-13: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bsrung ba ni /
T02D2510-2:213a-14: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-2:213a-15: rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan tsam zhig / lan cig tsam yang brjod gyur na //
T02D2510-2:213a-16: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2510-2:213a-17: pas rdo rje sems dpa' dang rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2510-2:213a-18: zhes bya ba drug pa dang bdun pa la khyad
T02D2510-2:213a-19: par med do // ming tsam brjod par gyur pa ni grags par zad do //
T02D2510-2:213a-20: byang chub kyi mthar thug pa nas rtag pa yin la /
T02D2510-2:213a-21: mchog tu gyur pas na chen po ste /
T02D2510-2:213a-22: bdag nyid bsrung bar gyur pa'o //
T02D2510-2:213a-23: skad cig gis ni dngos grub thob //
T02D2510-2:213a-24: ces bya ba ni gang dang gang gis dngos grub sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa de dang /
T02D2510-2:213a-25: de la skad cig gis dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:213a-26: da ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi bsrung ba ni /
T02D2510-2:213a-27: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-2:213a-28: rigs dang rgyud kyis chog mi shes //
T02D2510-2:213a-30: de la rig pa'i sgras snying po dang /
T02D2510-2:213a-34: de dag gi rgyud ni stong phrag brgya pa la sogs pa rgyas par bstan pa'o //
T02D2510-2:213a-35: de rnams chog mi shes pa ni rtag tu thos pa dang /
T02D2510-2:213a-38: 'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid kyis //
T02D2510-2:213a-39: zhes bya ba ni rang gi khro bo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa nyid do //
T02D2510-2:213a-40: rdo rje h'um la mos byed pa //
T02D2510-2:213b-0: @213b zhes bya ba ni shes par zad do //
T02D2510-2:213b-1: da ni padma'i rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni /
T02D2510-2:213b-2: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-2:213b-3: 'dod chags dag cing byams pa che //
T02D2510-2:213b-4: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D2510-2:213b-5: thams cad la ni mi 'jigs sbyin //
T02D2510-2:213b-6: zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la'o //
T02D2510-2:213b-7: padma'i rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can thams cad dang /
T02D2510-2:213b-8: phyi rol gyi nye bar 'tshe ba zhi ba dang /
T02D2510-2:213b-9: srog gcod pa la sogs spong pa ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o //
T02D2510-2:213b-10: bdag nyid 'jigs shing skrag pa las ci nus kyis bsrung ba'o //
T02D2510-2:213b-11: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mtshan zlos pa'o //
T02D2510-2:213b-12: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad zlos pa'o //
T02D2510-2:213b-13: de ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni /
T02D2510-2:213b-14: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-2:213b-15: nyi ma stong par mi bya la //
T02D2510-2:213b-17: stong pa ni 'bras bu med pa yin la /
T02D2510-2:213b-18: ma stong pa ni stong pa med pas 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2510-2:213b-19: ci nus par mi nus tshad las mi 'da'o //
T02D2510-2:213b-20: sbyor byed cing rab tu sbyor bas so //
T02D2510-2:213b-21: gang gis sbyor bar byed cing zhe na /
T02D2510-2:213b-22: gtong byed par zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2510-2:213b-23: sbyin par byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-2:213b-24: gang gi sbyor sbyin par byed pa yin zhe na /
T02D2510-2:213b-25: sangs rgyas sems can zhes bya ba smos te ;
T02D2510-2:213b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba thog mar byas nas /
T02D2510-2:213b-27: sems can rnams la ster bar byed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:213b-29: nyin re zhing dus drug tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:213b-30: sems can thams cad la nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas zang zing dang /
T02D2510-2:213b-32: chos dang byams pa'i sbyin par sbyin par byed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:213b-33: rdo rje bsrung bar zhes bya ba ni bsrung ba
T02D2510-2:213b-34: bstan pa'i dbang du byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba
T02D2510-2:213b-35: nyid kyis bsrung ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:213b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud kyi 'grel pa'o //
T02D2510-2:213b-37: de ltar rigs rnam pa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor chen por
T02D2510-2:213b-38: bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa sgrub
T02D2510-2:213b-39: pa po'i bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi mthar thug pa'i
T02D2510-2:214a-0: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams @214a * //
T02D2510-2:214a-1: cad kyis gsungs pa shes par bya ba mi spang
T02D2510-2:214a-2: ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2510-2:214a-3: pa nas / 'di bzhes par gsol zhes bya bas
T02D2510-2:214a-4: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la dbul ba
T02D2510-2:214a-5: pa nas / yin no // bcos ldan 'das rnam
T02D2510-2:214a-6: par snang mdzad kyis sangs rgyas kyi bka' nyid du
T02D2510-2:214a-7: pa nas / yin no // bsgrub pa'i phyir / legs so zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D2510-2:214a-8: rgyu de'i phyir ji skad du bshad pa'i de kho
T02D2510-2:214a-9: na nyid kyi rang bzhin de dag thams cad nged
T02D2510-2:214a-10: kyis blangs pa yin no zhes bya ste /
T02D2510-2:214a-11: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:214a-12: gdul bya rnams la khyed kyis rgyud phyi ma'i cho
T02D2510-2:214a-13: ga 'di ji ltar gsungs pa de bzhin du kho
T02D2510-2:214a-14: bo cag gi gzhung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid blo
T02D2510-2:214a-15: la bzhag nas phyi ma'i mthar thug gi bar du
T02D2510-2:214a-16: rgyun mi 'chad par gnas par bya ba'i phyir byin
T02D2510-2:214a-17: gyis brlabs so // de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad nas brtsams nas /
T02D2510-2:214a-18: rin chen 'bebs pa la mthar thug pa'i bar du
T02D2510-2:214a-19: rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs
T02D2510-2:214a-20: pa phyag rgya thams cad kyi rtogs pa de dag
T02D2510-2:214a-21: phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid
T02D2510-2:214a-22: kyi thams cad kyis ji skad bshad pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:214a-23: chen po la sogs pa thob pa'i rgyu yin no
T02D2510-2:214a-24: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-2:214a-25: de'i cho ga rgyas pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ji skad du bshad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:214a-26: rdzogs pa ni rgyud phyi ma'i ngo bo mthar thug pa'o //
T02D2510-2:214a-27: 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i 'grel ba
T02D2510-2:214a-28: de kho na nyid snang bar byed pa zhes bya
T02D2510-2:214a-29: ba las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po
T02D2510-2:214a-30: dang / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
T02D2510-2:214a-32: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyud phyi ma'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2510-2:214a-34: // / de ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-2:214a-35: po dang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D2510-2:214a-37: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang /
T02D2510-2:214a-38: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las
T02D2510-2:214a-39: bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rtog
T02D2510-2:214a-40: pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par
T02D2510-2:214a-41: bstan nas / da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la
T02D2510-2:214a-42: sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:214a-43: rnam pa bzhi sgom pa ni rang gi rigs kyi
T02D2510-2:214b-0: @214b dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:214b-1: bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du rang rang gi lha'i
T02D2510-2:214b-3: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcings te /
T02D2510-2:214b-4: rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga yang bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'dis bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:214b-5: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin
T02D2510-2:214b-6: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba dam
T02D2510-2:214b-7: pa dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs so //
T02D2510-2:214b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rigs
T02D2510-2:214b-9: kyang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-2:214b-10: kyi rigs te / ci skad du bshad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:214b-11: de dag gi dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba ni
T02D2510-2:214b-12: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2510-2:214b-13: po la sogs pa'i dngos grub bo //
T02D2510-2:214b-14: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs shing bshad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:214b-15: de la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dmigs kyis dgar ba'o //
T02D2510-2:214b-16: dang po nyid ni thams cad kyi thog ma nyid do //
T02D2510-2:214b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2510-2:214b-21: don yod grub pa rnams kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2510-2:214b-22: dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil
T02D2510-2:214b-23: 'khor las bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:214b-24: chen po mngon sum du ma byas pa de nyid
T02D2510-2:214b-25: kyis skye bo thams cad kyi lkog tu gyur pas
T02D2510-2:214b-27: de ston par byed pa ni rgyud do //
T02D2510-2:214b-28: sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub ni sangs rgyas byang chub ste /
T02D2510-2:214b-29: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:214b-30: pa'i ngo bo'i thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin
T02D2510-2:214b-31: no // de la sems rtse gcig tu dmigs pas na sangs rgyas byang chub ting nge 'dzin to //

T02D2510-2:224a-23: gyi dbus su rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-2:224a-24: po las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po gzungs kyi
T02D2510-2:224a-25: rig pa brjod cing gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:224a-26: lhag ma ni gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i gzugs nyid yin no //
T02D2510-2:224a-27: de nas snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:224a-28: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i 'jug pa'i cho
T02D2510-2:224a-29: gas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rigs kyi
T02D2510-2:224a-30: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te 'jug par bya'o
T02D2510-2:224a-31: // gsang ba der ni zhugs nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:224a-32: zhes bya ba ni gzungs kyi sgrub pa po dkyil 'khor der ro //
T02D2510-2:224a-33: sangs rgyas la ni nyid du smra //
T02D2510-2:224a-34: zhes bya ba 'dis gzhan rab tu bkag pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:224a-37: kun gtong ba ni bdag stsol cig / ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2510-2:224a-38: rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams nas rdo rje 'bebs
T02D2510-2:224a-39: pa la mthar thug pa'i gzungs 'di ni bcom ldan
T02D2510-2:224a-40: 'das thabs su song ba'i khyod kyi btsun mo lags
T02D2510-2:224a-41: te / sring mo 'di bdag la stsol cig /
T02D2510-2:224b-0: bdag la khyod kyi btsun @224b mo 'dir rab tu
T02D2510-2:224b-1: stsol cig / ci'i phyir bdag la stsol zhes smra
T02D2510-2:224b-2: te / zhe na / gang phyir khyod ni kun gtong ba //
T02D2510-2:224b-4: de skad du smos pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-2:224b-5: zhes ni rigs kun phyag rgya yi //
T02D2510-2:224b-6: tshul la yang ni de skad brjod //
T02D2510-2:224b-8: ji ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das bris te /
T02D2510-2:224b-9: rdo rje dbyings gzungs kyi rnal 'byor pas sangs rgyas kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:224b-10: de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs dang /
T02D2510-2:224b-12: nor bu'i rigs dang 'brel ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gzungs dang /

T02D2510-2:224b-15: 'khor gyi dbus su rnam par snang mdzad bris nas
T02D2510-2:224b-16: ji lta ba bzhin du gsang ba'i dngos grub thob
T02D2510-2:224b-17: par 'gyur ro // gsang pa'i gzungs rnams kyi dngos
T02D2510-2:224b-18: grub ni gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgya chen
T02D2510-2:224b-19: po'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:224b-20: sangs rgyas mnyam med 'od mnga' ba //
T02D2510-2:224b-21: zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa me dpa nyid thob ces bya'o //
T02D2510-2:224b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor pas gzungs bsgom pa'i
T02D2510-2:224b-24: mtshan ma thob nas des mngon par shes pa thob
T02D2510-2:224b-25: pas de'i rjes la sgrub pa ni snga ma bzhin
T02D2510-2:224b-26: du rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02D2510-2:224b-27: ji lta ba bzhin du gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las
T02D2510-2:224b-28: bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgoms la
T02D2510-2:224b-29: / de nas ji srid du rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid du rnam par bsgoms te /
T02D2510-2:224b-30: gsang ba'i rdo rje blangs te /
T02D2510-2:224b-32: dbus su rnam par snang mdzad bris la /
T02D2510-2:224b-33: rdo rje dbyings kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dang /

T02D2510-2:224b-35: rgyud phyi ma las bshad pa'i tshul gyis bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:224b-36: gang gi tshe mi bskyod pa dbus su bri ba
T02D2510-2:224b-37: de'i tshe rdo rje dbyings kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:224b-39: gang gi tshe rin chen 'byung ldan bri ba de'i
T02D2510-2:224b-40: tshe rdo rje dbyings kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du
T02D2510-2:224b-41: / de nyid la mi bskyod pa'i gnas su dbang
T02D2510-2:224b-42: bskur ba ma zhes bya ba rin chen 'byung ldan
T02D2510-2:225a-0: / gyi phyag rgya / rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su @225a * //

T02D2510-2:225a-4: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su thugs rdo rje ma zhes bya ba mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya /
T02D2510-2:225a-5: gang gi tshe don yod par grub pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dri ba de'i tshe /

T02D2510-2:225a-9: dbyings kyi gzungs sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni lngar 'gyur
T02D2510-2:225a-10: ro // yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje dang /

T02D2510-2:225a-13: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris la ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te /
T02D2510-2:225a-14: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:225a-15: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
T02D2510-2:225a-16: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02D2510-2:225a-17: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //

T02D2510-2:225a-25: dam tshig dang chos dang las yi phyag rgya rnams bsgrub par bya'o //

T02D2510-2:225a-34: rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i

T02D2510-2:230a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phan yon gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:230a-21: ji skad du bshad pa'i bskul ba'i dus su gnang
T02D2510-2:230a-22: ba nos ba'i dngos grub kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal
T02D2510-2:230a-23: 'byor pas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag
T02D2510-2:230a-24: rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya
T02D2510-2:230a-25: ba'i don to // ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
T02D2510-2:230a-26: yang dang yang du bsgom zhing /
T02D2510-2:230a-27: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rtag tu rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:230a-28: dus nam gyi tshe bskul bar bya zhe na /
T02D2510-2:230a-29: gang tshe myur du mi 'grub na gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa mtshan ma thob pa'am /
T02D2510-2:230a-30: mngon par shes pas mtshan thog thag bsgoms pa tsam
T02D2510-2:230a-31: gyis myur du dngos grub thob par ma gyur pa
T02D2510-2:230a-32: de'i tshe bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02D2510-2:230a-33: ji skad bshad pa'i de kho na nyid bskul ba'i tshul gyis yang dag par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:230a-34: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
T02D2510-2:230a-35: kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yongs su sbyangs pa'i
T02D2510-2:230a-36: gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:230a-37: da ni sgrub pa dang pos ma grub na sgrub
T02D2510-2:230a-38: pa gnyis pa la yang de kho na nyid bskul
T02D2510-2:230a-39: bas yang dag par bskul la /
T02D2510-2:230b-0: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don @230b bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:230b-1: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de de
T02D2510-2:230b-2: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:230b-3: thams cad gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs pa
T02D2510-2:230b-4: yin no // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2510-2:230b-5: rigs kyi phyag rgya thams cad ni gzungs kyi phyag
T02D2510-2:230b-8: de yi gsang ba'i lha mo che //
T02D2510-2:230b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sba bar bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:230b-10: de'i dngos grub ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad
T02D2510-2:230b-11: pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa thob pa'o
T02D2510-2:230b-12: // de ston par byed pa'i rgyud de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs shing bshad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:230b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha mo che //
T02D2510-2:230b-14: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
T02D2510-2:230b-15: snang mdzad la sogs pa de lha mo chen mo
T02D2510-2:230b-16: ste / rdo rje sems ma dang /
T02D2510-2:230b-17: rdo rje rin chen ma dang /
T02D2510-2:230b-19: las kyi rdo rje ma rnams so //
T02D2510-2:230b-20: de'i khyad par ci lta bu zhig ce na /
T02D2510-2:230b-21: sdug cing zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2510-2:230b-22: zag pa med pa'i bde ba dang /
T02D2510-2:230b-23: yid bde ba'i ngo bo rgyun mi 'chad par bde ba ster ba'o //
T02D2510-2:230b-25: bde ba kun sbyin pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2510-2:230b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba ste /
T02D2510-2:230b-27: yid bde ba rab tu ster ba'o //
T02D2510-2:230b-28: bde ba las byung ba'i tshogs bden pas zhes bya
T02D2510-2:230b-29: ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha mo gang yin
T02D2510-2:230b-30: pa 'di / sdug cing bde ba kun sbyin pa //
T02D2510-2:230b-31: zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i bden pa las
T02D2510-2:230b-32: byung ba'i tshig gis rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyings so
T02D2510-2:230b-33: // bden pa ni phyin ci ma log pa dang /
T02D2510-2:230b-34: mi brdzun pas na de las byung ba ni de'i rjes su 'jug pa ste /
T02D2510-2:230b-35: bden pa'i tshig nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-2:230b-36: bden pas ni mi mnga' ba'o //
T02D2510-2:230b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha mo chen mo sdug cing
T02D2510-2:230b-38: bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba rnam
T02D2510-2:230b-39: pa gsum gyi bden ba dang /
T02D2510-2:230b-40: gzungs kyi lha mo thams cad bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2510-2:230b-42: bsgrubs kyang des ni ma grub na'o //
T02D2510-2:230b-44: sgrub pa po gang gis de kho na nyid bskul
T02D2510-2:230b-45: ba med na 'grub par mi 'gyur ba des na
T02D2510-2:230b-46: ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam pa gsum gyi bden
T02D2510-2:231a-2: ji skad bshad pa'i gzungs de rnams bsgrub par bya'o zhes shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:231a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzungs kyi sgrub pa po'i rnal 'byor pas sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02D2510-2:231a-5: gang gi tshe gzungs bsgrub par 'dod pa na grub par ma gyur pa de'i tshe /
T02D2510-2:231a-6: de kho na nyid bskul bas yang dag par bskul te nges bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:231a-7: phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni //
T02D2510-2:231a-8: zhes bya ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad
T02D2510-2:231a-9: pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
T02D2510-2:231a-10: kyi gzungs rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs
T02D2510-2:231a-11: pa phyag rgya thams cad ni phyag rgya chen po
T02D2510-2:231a-13: ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du //
T02D2510-2:231a-14: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:231a-15: chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal
T02D2510-2:231a-16: 'byor byas la / cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-2:231a-17: sngon du bsnyen pa byas te /
T02D2510-2:231a-18: snga ma bzhin du mngon par shes pa bskyed la /
T02D2510-2:231a-19: yang rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
T02D2510-2:231a-20: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas te /
T02D2510-2:231a-21: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2510-2:231a-22: rnam pa gsum ji lta pa bzhin du bsgoms la
T02D2510-2:231a-24: sngar bshad pa'i sgrub pa'i cho gas thams cad byas
T02D2510-2:231a-25: nas gang gi tshe 'grub par ma gyur pa de'i
T02D2510-2:231a-26: tshe slar la gzungs kyi phyag rgya chen po dang
T02D2510-2:231a-29: las kyi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya ba 'di ni /
T02D2510-2:231a-30: ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du //
T02D2510-2:231a-31: zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don yin no //
T02D2510-2:231a-32: phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ci byed ce na /
T02D2510-2:231a-33: 'di ni de nyid gsang ba yi //
T02D2510-2:231a-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-2:231a-35: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa'i rdo
T02D2510-2:231a-36: rje sems dpa' ni bdag rang yin no zhes bya
T02D2510-2:231a-38: de nyid ni phyin ci ma log pa'i rab tu dga' ba nyid dang /
T02D2510-2:231a-39: kun du bzang po nyid do //
T02D2510-2:231a-40: gsang ba'i zhes bya ba ni gsang bar gyur pas na gsang ba ste /
T02D2510-2:231a-41: rang gi lha dang lhan cig tu mnyam par sbyor ba gang yin pa des /
T02D2510-2:231a-42: bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
T02D2510-2:231b-0: ces bya ba thabs dang shes rab kyi @231b rang bzhin gyi sems dpa' ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2510-2:231b-1: de bdag rang yin pa ni rnal 'byor pas nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:231b-2: khyod kyi chung ma snying la gnas //
T02D2510-2:231b-3: zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa'i sems des
T02D2510-2:231b-4: bdag nyid kyi blo la gnas pa'i rdo rje snying
T02D2510-2:231b-5: po'i gzugs so // lus kun las ni 'khyud nas kyang //
T02D2510-2:231b-6: zhes bya ba ni kye'i rdo rje 'gying ba las 'khyud pas /
T02D2510-2:231b-7: bsgyings pa dang bcas nam mkha' la zhugs shig pa'o //
T02D2510-2:231b-8: rdo rje 'gying ba lha mo che //
T02D2510-2:231b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2510-2:231b-10: lus kun la ni brten gyur na //
T02D2510-2:231b-11: zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po'i lus dang chu
T02D2510-2:231b-12: dang 'o ma bzhin du gcig tu 'dres par gyur
T02D2510-2:231b-13: pas ci zhig myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya'o
T02D2510-2:231b-14: // de nyid bskul ba ni yang dag par bskul ba'o //
T02D2510-2:231b-18: las kyi phyag rgya rnams bcings nas phyag rgya'i rig
T02D2510-2:231b-19: pa zlos shing bsgoms pa 'di ni ji bzhin zhes
T02D2510-2:231b-20: bya ba'i sgra ni don yin no //
T02D2510-2:231b-22: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnal 'byor
T02D2510-2:231b-23: pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2510-2:231b-24: byas la phyag bzhi byas te /
T02D2510-2:231b-25: gzungs kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcings te /
T02D2510-2:231b-26: ji srid du mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o //

T02D2510-2:231b-28: sems dpa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas nas bsgrub pa'i
T02D2510-2:231b-29: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bris te /
T02D2510-2:231b-30: 'jug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:231b-31: snga ma bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:231b-32: gal te ma grub par shes na gzungs kyi lha
T02D2510-2:231b-33: mo mdun du rnam par bsams la de'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:231b-34: chen po la sogs pa bcings te /
T02D2510-2:231b-35: bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
T02D2510-2:231b-36: khyod nga'i chung ma snying la gnas //
T02D2510-2:231b-37: lus kun la ni 'khyud pa dang //
T02D2510-2:231b-40: de nas de'i rig pa zlos shing de dang bdag
T02D2510-2:231b-41: nyid 'khyud pas bud med kyi longs spyod dang ldan
T02D2510-2:231b-42: par bsams te bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:231b-43: de nas de'i rjes la mngon sum du 'ongs nas sgrub pa po dang /
T02D2510-2:231b-44: lhan cig tu mnyam par sbyor ba byas te /
T02D2510-2:231b-45: sgrub pa po'i lus la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:232a-1: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:232a-2: siddhya siddhya sa ma ye zhes bya ba ni gzungs
T02D2510-2:232a-3: kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po
T02D2510-2:232a-4: la sogs pa rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya thams
T02D2510-2:232a-5: cad do // dam tshig de 'ching ba'i dang por /
T02D2510-2:232a-6: siddhya siddhya sa ma ye sa ma yo& ham /
T02D2510-2:232a-7: tram pram ya mam zhes brjod cing /
T02D2510-2:232a-8: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi sku dang /
T02D2510-2:232a-10: thugs rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so //
T02D2510-2:232a-11: de'i rang bzhin bdag yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed la /
T02D2510-2:232a-12: khyod sdug bdag gi chung ma'o //
T02D2510-2:232a-14: de ltar gzungs kyi rnal 'byor ba de kho na nyid brjod cing /
T02D2510-2:232a-15: bskul bar gyur pas myur du rjes su chags pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:232a-16: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:232a-17: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:232a-18: chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad la
T02D2510-2:232a-20: phyag bzhi byas pa'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:232a-21: rang gi rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcings te /
T02D2510-2:232a-22: ji srid mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:232a-23: de nas mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed de /
T02D2510-2:232a-24: snga ma bzhin du gzungs sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bris te /
T02D2510-2:232a-25: 'jug pa la sogs pa cho ga rjes su spyad de bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:232a-26: gang gi tshe bsgrubs kyang dngos grub kyi mtshan ma
T02D2510-2:232a-27: mthong bde'i tshe mdun du rang gi gzungs kyi lha
T02D2510-2:232a-29: de kho na nyid bskul bas bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:232a-30: zhes siddhya siddhya sa ma yo& ham tram pram ya mam /
T02D2510-2:232a-31: de'i rjes la des rjes su chags pa'i sgrub pa pos lhan cig mnyam par spyor bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:232a-32: des bud med la longs spyod pa bzhin du yan
T02D2510-2:232a-33: lag thams cad kyis 'khyud pa'i bde ba bsgom par
T02D2510-2:232a-34: bya'o // de nas mngon sum du 'ongs nas sgrub
T02D2510-2:232a-35: pa po dang lhan cig mnyam par spyor par byas
T02D2510-2:232a-36: pas sgrub pa po'i lus la zhugs par 'gyur ro
T02D2510-2:232a-37: bya'o // // de nas 'di rdo rje h'um mdzad
T02D2510-2:232a-38: la sogs pa rdo rje rigs kyi rang bzhin du
T02D2510-2:232a-39: bya'o // // 'gyur ro // buddha buddha ma h'a
T02D2510-2:232a-40: sa ti zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang
T02D2510-2:232a-41: bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes khong du chud
T02D2510-2:232a-42: bya'o // // 'gyur ro // nas / nga yi chung ma khyod sdug pa //

T02D2510-2:232b-3: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:232b-4: rang gi gzungs kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcings te /
T02D2510-2:232b-5: ji srid mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:232b-6: de nas mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed de /
T02D2510-2:232b-7: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis gzungs sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02D2510-2:232b-8: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:232b-9: gang gi tshe dngos grub kyi mtshan ma thob par
T02D2510-2:232b-10: ma gyur pa de'i tshe mdun du rang lha mo
T02D2510-2:232b-11: bud med kyi rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:232b-12: buddha buddha ma h'a sad ti bha rya tva me aa ti pri ya /
T02D2510-2:232b-13: de nas sgrub pa po dang lhan cig tu mnyam par sbyor bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:232b-14: de'i rjes la de 'ongs nas sgrub pa po'i lus la zhugs par gyur te /
T02D2510-2:232b-15: de nas skad cig de nyid la sgrub pa po 'jig rten dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:232b-16: sarbba karmm'a ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs rnams kyi
T02D2510-2:232b-17: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i las de rnams
T02D2510-2:232b-19: ka ri ni las byed pa'i gzungs kyi rig pa'i lha mo'i gzugs can ni bharya'o //
T02D2510-2:232b-20: rtag tu skye ba'am de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skye
T02D2510-2:232b-21: ba med par zhugs pas na aa dhe badzra ni
T02D2510-2:232b-22: bcad du med cing dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //

T02D2510-2:233a-0: mdun du rang gi gzungs bud med kyi rnam par bsams la sarbba @233a * //

T02D2510-2:233a-7: rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud

T02D2510-2:233a-9: mu stegs rnams la phan btags phyir //
T02D2510-2:233a-10: ri mo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du ni //
T02D2510-2:233a-11: sangs rgyas btsun mo rab sbas par //
T02D2510-2:233a-12: zhes bya ba la sogs par gsang ba'i ye shes
T02D2510-2:233a-13: kyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya bskyed de bsgom par bya'o
T02D2510-2:233a-14: zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:233a-15: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin
T02D2510-2:233a-16: gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i
T02D2510-2:233a-17: dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs so //
T02D2510-2:233a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs rnams kyi dam tshig gi gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:233a-19: de'i gsang ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa lha'i gzungs dang /
T02D2510-2:233a-20: byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mchod rten gyi nang du chud pa'o //
T02D2510-2:233a-21: de'i dngos grub ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad
T02D2510-2:233a-22: pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa mngon sum
T02D2510-2:233a-23: du byed pa'o // de ston par byed pa'i rgyud de /
T02D2510-2:233a-24: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs shing bshad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:233a-25: mu stegs can ni nyan thos dang /
T02D2510-2:233a-27: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa mdo sde pa dang /
T02D2510-2:233a-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa
T02D2510-2:233a-29: tsam la zhugs pa ni gzhan mu stegs can te
T02D2510-2:233a-30: / rdo rje theg pa'i mu la mi bsten pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:233a-31: de dag la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ni dam pa'i
T02D2510-2:233a-32: chos spangs pas dmyal bar ltung bar ma gyur cig
T02D2510-2:233a-34: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa la btsun mo mnga'
T02D2510-2:233a-35: ba de lta na ni de bzhin gshegs pa la
T02D2510-2:233a-36: 'dod chags mnga' bar gyur pas so //
T02D2510-2:233a-37: des na 'di ni bdud kyis gsungs pa yin no
T02D2510-2:233a-38: zhes pas rab tu spangs na dmyal bar ltung bar
T02D2510-2:233a-39: 'gyur bas / de lta'i nyes par ma gyur cig snyam pas /
T02D2510-2:233b-0: de bzhin @233b gshegs pa'i rig ba'i lha mos 'dul
T02D2510-2:233b-1: ba'i sems can gyi khams 'dul bar byed pa la
T02D2510-2:233b-2: / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa lha mo'i gzungs rnams sbas te /
T02D2510-2:233b-3: mchod rten la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:233b-4: de'i phyir ri mo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du ni mchod rten la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor ram /
T02D2510-2:233b-6: rtsig pa la sogs pa la bri ba'am /
T02D2510-2:233b-7: skal ba dang ldan pa la rig pa'i lha mo'i gzungs su bya'o //
T02D2510-2:233b-8: de ltar shes pa ni nges pa bskyed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:233b-9: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa de bsgoms na
T02D2510-2:233b-10: myur du 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin
T02D2510-2:233b-11: no // de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'am gzungs kyi
T02D2510-2:233b-12: sgrub pa pos phyag rgya rig pa'i lha mos nges
T02D2510-2:233b-13: no // par byas nas / da ni de bzhin
T02D2510-2:233b-14: gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams
T02D2510-2:233b-15: kyis kyang phyag rgya rnams rig pa'i lha mor nges
T02D2510-2:233b-16: no // par byas nas / par bskyed nas / don 'di bsgom par bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:233b-17: sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa //
T02D2510-2:233b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-2:233b-19: de la 'khor ba'i sems ni sems can kun gyi
T02D2510-2:233b-20: yid ces brjod pa de des khyab pa'i dang tshul
T02D2510-2:233b-21: mnga' ba 'di ni sems can kun gyi yid la
T02D2510-2:233b-22: khyab pa ste / rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po
T02D2510-2:233b-23: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings
T02D2510-2:233b-25: ji ltar sems can kun gyi yid la khyab pa yin zhe na /
T02D2510-2:233b-26: gang gi phyir de dag sems can kun gyi sems
T02D2510-2:233b-27: dang yid la sogs pa thog ma dang tha ma
T02D2510-2:233b-28: med pa'i chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D2510-2:233b-29: sems can kun la bde sbyin pa //
T02D2510-2:233b-30: zhes bya ba ni des na chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin thos ba dang /
T02D2510-2:233b-32: bsgom pa'i shes pa goms pa'i yid kyis 'jig rten
T02D2510-2:233b-33: dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba sems can
T02D2510-2:233b-34: thams cad la nye bar bskyed pa de ni 'dir
T02D2510-2:233b-35: / sems can kun la bde sbyin zhing //
T02D2510-2:233b-36: sems can kun gyi yab nyid de //
T02D2510-2:233b-37: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi sems sam /
T02D2510-2:233b-38: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems rnams bskyed pa de'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:233b-39: sems can kun gyi yab nyid do //
T02D2510-2:233b-40: dam tshig mchog gi 'dod pa mchog / ces bya
T02D2510-2:233b-41: ba ni 'dod par bya ba yin pas na 'dod
T02D2510-2:234a-0: pa ste / smon pa dang 'jug pa'i byang @234a * //
T02D2510-2:234a-1: chub sems kyi mtshan nyid ngo //
T02D2510-2:234a-2: de nyid kyi mchog yin pa de'i phyir bar chad
T02D2510-2:234a-3: med pa'i lam gyi ngo bos chags pa dang bcas
T02D2510-2:234a-4: pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa ni rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2510-2:234a-5: pa chen po'i rang bzhin byang chub chen po'i mtshan
T02D2510-2:234a-6: nyid can gyi sems gang yin pa de ni mchog
T02D2510-2:234a-7: tu gyur pas na dam pa'o //
T02D2510-2:234a-8: de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2510-2:234a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan ma yin pas na dam tshig mchog go //
T02D2510-2:234a-11: rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i gzugs gang yin pa de dang /
T02D2510-2:234a-12: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa rig pa'i lha mo'i gzugs gang yin pa dang /
T02D2510-2:234a-13: gzhan yang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs
T02D2510-2:234a-14: gang yin pa de dag rang bzhin gyis gdod ma
T02D2510-2:234a-16: sgyu ma lta bur shes nas mnyam par sbyor ba
T02D2510-2:234a-17: la sogs pa sgom par byed pa de lta bus
T02D2510-2:234a-18: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'jug pa'i byang chub
T02D2510-2:234a-19: sems dpa'i lam la bzhon par bsgom par bya'i /
T02D2510-2:234a-20: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D2510-2:234a-21: 'dod chags ni sems can smin cing grol bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2510-2:234a-22: de'i dag pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bos dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'o //
T02D2510-2:234a-23: de dag pa ni dag pa'i don te /
T02D2510-2:234a-24: mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje chen po mngon sum du byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:234a-26: rang rgyal ba chags pa dang bral ba de dag ci'i phyir gzhan zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-2:234a-27: mu stegs lta bar byas bdag la //
T02D2510-2:234a-32: chad pa la sogs pa das mu stegs can gyi lta ba des byas te /
T02D2510-2:234a-34: bdag la ni mu stegs can gyi lta ba can
T02D2510-2:234a-35: gyis byas pa'i bdag nyid kho na bden pa yin
T02D2510-2:234a-36: gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes nges par sems
T02D2510-2:234a-37: pa ni / rmongs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-2:234a-38: de ltar gyur pa de rnams sbyangs nas mi dmigs
T02D2510-2:234a-39: pa'i thugs rje chen pos bla na med pa yang
T02D2510-2:234a-40: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jog pa ni
T02D2510-2:234a-41: gsod pa'i dam tshig mchog yin no //
T02D2510-2:234a-42: de ltar gyur pa de sgrub pa pos shes pas ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-2:234b-2: thugs rje chen pos gzhan gyi dbang gis de ltar
T02D2510-2:234b-3: nges pa bskyed nas zhe sdang med pa'i khro bos
T02D2510-2:234b-4: sems can gyi khams thams cad thal bar byas te
T02D2510-2:234b-5: / rdo rje rigs kyi rang bzhin du bskyed nas
T02D2510-2:234b-6: gang gi tshe gzungs kyi phyag rgyas bsgrub pa de'i
T02D2510-2:234b-8: 'byung ba yang yin la chen po yang de yin pas na 'byung ba chen po ste /
T02D2510-2:234b-9: khams gsum pa'i rnam par dag pa gang yin pa'i
T02D2510-2:234b-10: kun du rtog pa de las byung ba ni 'byung
T02D2510-2:234b-11: ba chen po las byung ba'o //
T02D2510-2:234b-12: thams cad ni khams gsum pa'o //
T02D2510-2:234b-13: mi gtsang zhes ni ci'i phyir brjod //
T02D2510-2:234b-15: ci'i phyir zhes bya ba ni spong ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:234b-17: khams gsum pa'i rnam pa ni yang dag pa ma
T02D2510-2:234b-18: yin pa'i kun du rtog pa ni don dam par
T02D2510-2:234b-20: de las byung bas na khams gsum pa'o //
T02D2510-2:234b-21: gdon mi za bar ma skyes pa de'i phyir chos
T02D2510-2:234b-22: can med pas chos mi gtsang ba'i mtshan nyid dang
T02D2510-2:234b-23: / gtsang ba'i dngos po yang med pa de'i phyir

T02D2510-2:234b-27: dngos po mngon par zhen pa med pas 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:234b-28: mu stegs can rnams gzhom pa'i phyir //
T02D2510-2:234b-29: zhes bya ba ni mu stegs can dngos por 'dzin pa'i mngon par zhen pa'o //
T02D2510-2:234b-30: rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud du rtogs pa'i sems dang
T02D2510-2:234b-31: sems las byung ba de dag gzhom pa ni dngos
T02D2510-2:234b-33: de'i don brjod pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i don
T02D2510-2:234b-34: brjod pas nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o
T02D2510-2:234b-35: // bud med ni nor bu chen po'i rigs de'i gzungs rnams so //
T02D2510-2:234b-36: chags nga ni phul du byung ba'i chags pa'o //
T02D2510-2:234b-40: sems can gyi rnal 'byor bsgom pa de rnams so //
T02D2510-2:234b-41: bud med la chags pa de'i phyir lhan cig tu gyur pa'i rgyus so //
T02D2510-2:234b-42: rin chen rnams ni nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi rang bzhin rnams so //
T02D2510-2:235a-2: zhes bya ba ni nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi
T02D2510-2:235a-3: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2510-2:235a-4: po'i dngos grub kyi rin po che rnams bsags pa
T02D2510-2:235a-5: ni rtogs pa'o // byams pa ni bskyed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:235a-7: bud med bla med rin chen rnams //
T02D2510-2:235a-8: zhes bya ba yin pa de'i phyir bsam pa ni nges pa bskyed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:235a-9: nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnal 'byor bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02D2510-2:235a-10: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:235a-11: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
T02D2510-2:235a-12: tshig gi rigs kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
T02D2510-2:235a-13: bstan nas / da ni gzungs kyi mnyam par sbyor
T02D2510-2:235a-14: ba'i bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bde ba phul ba'i
T02D2510-2:235a-15: yang dag par sbyor ba bsgom par bya'o zhes bstan
T02D2510-2:235a-16: bstan nas / pa'i phyir / de nas zhes bya
T02D2510-2:235a-17: ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-2:235a-18: kyi rigs kyi mchod pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi

T02D2510-2:235a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs ni lha
T02D2510-2:235a-21: mo dang mnyam par spyor ba bsgoms pa las byung
T02D2510-2:235a-22: ba'i bde bas mchod par bya ste /

T02D2510-2:235a-25: phul bas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos

T02D2510-2:235a-28: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2510-2:235a-29: pa'i gzungs kyi bud med de rnams kyis yongs su
T02D2510-2:235a-31: kun nas brtse ba'i bde ba yis //
T02D2510-2:235a-32: zhes bya ba ni gzungs kyi lha mo dang mnyam
T02D2510-2:235a-33: par sbyor ba'i bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bde ba
T02D2510-2:235a-34: ni kun nas brtse ba'i bde ba'o //
T02D2510-2:235a-35: sangs rgyas mchod phyir phul na yang //
T02D2510-2:235a-36: zhes bya ba ni gzungs kyi lha mo dang mnyam
T02D2510-2:235a-37: par sbyor ba'i bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bde ba

T02D2510-2:235a-40: // rgyur 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:235a-41: de ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-2:235a-42: mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:235b-1: mchod par gyur pa ni mchod pa'i dngos grub ste /

T02D2510-2:235b-24: phyag bzhi po yis mchod pa'i phyir nges par phul nas /

T02D2510-2:235b-30: rang gi gzungs kyi phyag rgya bcings nas rang gi
T02D2510-2:235b-31: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa thams cad dang lhan
T02D2510-2:235b-32: cig mnyam par sbyor bar bsgoms la /
T02D2510-2:235b-33: ji srid du skyo zhing ngal bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bya'o //
T02D2510-2:235b-34: skyo bar gyur na phyag bzhi byas la de nas ngal bso bar bya'o //
