T02D2510-2:258a-23: zhes bya ba ni dbyig ni dong tshe la sogs pa'i zong ste de dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D2510-2:258a-24: gang gi tshe ni dus gang gi tshe'o //
T02D2510-2:258a-25: nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas nam mkha' la
T02D2510-2:258a-26: nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor mthong bar
T02D2510-2:258a-27: 'gyur ro // de'i tshe mkha' mig 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:258a-28: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D2510-2:258a-29: mig ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ste /
T02D2510-2:258a-30: rnal 'byor pa gang la nam mkha'i mig yod pa des 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02D2510-2:258a-31: nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur zhing nor
T02D2510-2:258a-32: bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thun mtshams thams cad kyi
T02D2510-2:258a-33: tshe lan cig ma yin par mthong bar 'gyur ro
T02D2510-2:258a-34: // 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i 'grel
T02D2510-2:258a-35: pa de kho na nyid snang bar byed pa la
T02D2510-2:258a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i rigs
T02D2510-2:258a-37: thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud phyi
T02D2510-2:258b-0: // / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs @258b
T02D2510-2:258b-1: pa'i rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2510-2:258b-3: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs
T02D2510-2:258b-4: thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i
T02D2510-2:258b-5: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa ni rang gi
T02D2510-2:258b-6: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po gsungs pa'i rang gi
T02D2510-2:258b-8: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02D2510-2:258b-9: phyis rang gi rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las
T02D2510-2:258b-10: bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcing
T02D2510-2:258b-11: ba ni rgyud phyi ma bsgrub pa'i tshe yang bya'o
T02D2510-2:258b-12: zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:258b-13: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-2:258b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi las kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs so //
T02D2510-2:258b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rigs
T02D2510-2:258b-16: kyang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-2:258b-17: kyi rigs so // de dag gi las ni las kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2510-2:258b-18: dam pa'i dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo //
T02D2510-2:258b-19: de ston par byed pa ni rgyud de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs shing bshad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:258b-20: chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni //
T02D2510-2:258b-21: 'dod chags bde ba rnam smin phyir //
T02D2510-2:258b-22: gtso bo thams cad mchod byas nas ;
T02D2510-2:258b-23: / zhes bya ba ni las kyi dkyil 'khor la sbrul la /
T02D2510-2:258b-24: las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnal 'byor pas des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod na /
T02D2510-2:258b-25: sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:258b-27: don gang gi phyir zhe na /
T02D2510-2:258b-28: 'dod chags bde ba rnam smin phyir //
T02D2510-2:258b-30: chos bdag med pa'i chags pas 'dod chags bde ba'o //
T02D2510-2:258b-31: de'i rnam par smin pa ni rang gi rigs 'byung ba'o //
T02D2510-2:258b-32: de'i phyir ni rnal 'byor pas gtso bo thams cad mchod pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:258b-33: sangs rgyas dngos grub ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i
T02D2510-2:258b-34: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2510-2:258b-35: po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob pa'o //
T02D2510-2:258b-37: rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po
T02D2510-2:258b-38: las bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2510-2:258b-40: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-2:259a-1: las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i snying po brjod cing spros la /
T02D2510-2:259a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab
T02D2510-2:259a-3: dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa
T02D2510-2:259a-4: sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub tu sems
T02D2510-2:259a-5: bskyed pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang
T02D2510-2:259a-7: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis bdag nyid yongs su bskor nas yid kyis gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:259a-8: de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag
T02D2510-2:259a-9: rgya rnam pa bcu drug gis bdag nyid yang dag
T02D2510-2:259a-10: par mchod la / de'i rjes la phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2510-2:259a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:259a-12: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sgeg mo la
T02D2510-2:259a-13: sogs pa las kyi phyag rgya bzhis gsang ba'i mchod
T02D2510-2:259a-14: pa rab tu mchod par bya ste /
T02D2510-2:259a-15: 'dod chags bdag ces sgom byed cing //
T02D2510-2:259a-16: chos bdag med pa'i chags pa'i rang bzhin du gzugs
T02D2510-2:259a-17: brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2510-2:259a-18: pa phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid yin no zhes
T02D2510-2:259a-19: bsgom par bya'o // dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:259a-20: zhes bya ba ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad
T02D2510-2:259a-21: pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub
T02D2510-2:259a-22: po // ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-2:259a-25: rdo rje 'dod pa ni chos bdag med pa'i 'dod chags so //
T02D2510-2:259a-26: gzi can mnyam zhes bya ba ni 'od can de dang mnyam pa ste /
T02D2510-2:259a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs so //
T02D2510-2:259a-29: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02D2510-2:259a-30: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su
T02D2510-2:259a-31: spyad nas phyis las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i
T02D2510-2:259a-32: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag
T02D2510-2:259a-34: rang gi snying ga las sgeg mo la sogs pa'i
T02D2510-2:259a-35: gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi sprul la bdag nyid mchod
T02D2510-2:259a-36: de / yang de'i rjes la phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:259a-37: gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas na //
T02D2510-2:259a-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2510-2:259a-39: khro bo bdag ces sgom byed cing //
T02D2510-2:259b-0: zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje @259b h'um
T02D2510-2:259b-1: mdzad nas khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi
T02D2510-2:259b-2: khro bo ni bdag yin no zhes yang dang yang
T02D2510-2:259b-5: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:259b-6: chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad la
T02D2510-2:259b-8: cho ga thams cad snga ma bzhin du rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-2:259b-9: phyis las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje
T02D2510-2:259b-10: h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings
T02D2510-2:259b-11: te / rang gi snying ga nas sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi sprul la /
T02D2510-2:259b-12: bdag nyid mchod par byas nas de'i rjes la bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:259b-13: nang du song ba'i yid kyis ni //
T02D2510-2:259b-14: 'dod pa dag par sgom byed cing //
T02D2510-2:259b-15: zhes bya ba ni shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i
T02D2510-2:259b-16: sems kyis rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor rang bzhin gyis
T02D2510-2:259b-17: dag pa'i gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par bsgom par bya'o
T02D2510-2:259b-18: // dbyangs ldan thig le sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D2510-2:259b-19: mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:259b-20: zhes bya ba ni de'i 'dod pa rnam par dag
T02D2510-2:259b-21: pa ni rang gi lha dang mnyam par sbyor bas
T02D2510-2:259b-22: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa sems kyis bsgom
T02D2510-2:259b-23: mo // de dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i rtsa'i thig le byung nas nam mkha'i khams bkang ste /
T02D2510-2:259b-24: sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi 'jig rten dbang
T02D2510-2:259b-25: phyug gi rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya chen po rdzas
T02D2510-2:259b-26: kyi thig le'i nang du tshud par byas la /
T02D2510-2:259b-27: thig le des reg par gyur pa de'i tshe 'jig rten dbang phyug tu gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:259b-28: de ltar sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pas /
T02D2510-2:259b-29: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi 'jig
T02D2510-2:259b-30: rten gsum dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po'i dngos
T02D2510-2:259b-33: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad
T02D2510-2:259b-34: pa'i rang gi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor
T02D2510-2:259b-36: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02D2510-2:259b-37: phyis las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2510-2:259b-38: rang gi snying ga'i padma'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi sprul la /
T02D2510-2:259b-39: bdag nyid mchod nas rang gi lha dang mnyam par
T02D2510-2:259b-40: sbyor zhing rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i gzugs
T02D2510-2:260a-1: bsgoms na rdzas kyi thig le phyung ste /
T02D2510-2:260a-2: sems can gyi khams thams cad la reg pas 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su bskyed nas /
T02D2510-2:260a-3: rang gi lha mo dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i 'jig
T02D2510-2:260a-4: rten dbang phyug gi bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o
T02D2510-2:260a-5: // bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud nas ni //
T02D2510-2:260a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don thams cad
T02D2510-2:260a-7: grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i don
T02D2510-2:260a-8: thams cad grub pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor byas
T02D2510-2:260a-9: la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02D2510-2:260a-10: phyis nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las
T02D2510-2:260a-11: bshad pa'i nor bu'i rigs kyi rang gi lha'i phyag
T02D2510-2:260a-13: rang gi snying ga las rin chen sgeg mo la
T02D2510-2:260a-14: sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhi sprul
T02D2510-2:260a-15: la bdag nyid yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:260a-16: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad
T02D2510-2:260a-17: pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:260a-19: don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin
T02D2510-2:260a-20: gshegs pa thams cad la dad pa khyad par phul
T02D2510-2:260a-22: de ltar rdo rje snying por mnyam bzhag la /
T02D2510-2:260a-23: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par byas la /
T02D2510-2:260a-24: phyis las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2510-2:260a-25: mchog tu phyag 'tshal bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:260a-26: de ltar byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-2:260a-27: dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:260a-29: nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad
T02D2510-2:260a-30: pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur
T02D2510-2:260a-31: ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:260a-32: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs
T02D2510-2:260a-33: thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga
T02D2510-2:260a-35: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2510-2:260a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam
T02D2510-2:260a-37: tshig gi gsang ba'i rgyud gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:260a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rigs rnams so //
T02D2510-2:260a-39: las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi rgyud ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:260a-41: 'dod la sogs pa'i bde ba kun //
T02D2510-2:260a-42: rtag tu bdag ni snying la gnas //
T02D2510-2:260a-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bsgoms pa des 'grub pa'o //
T02D2510-2:260b-0: las @260b kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya mngon sum du byed pa ni /
T02D2510-2:260b-1: de'i ston par byed pa'i rgyud de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:260b-2: 'dod la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni de la
T02D2510-2:260b-3: 'dod pa ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi mtshan
T02D2510-2:260b-4: nyid kyi rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2510-2:260b-5: de nyid dang por byas pa'i 'dod pa la sogs
T02D2510-2:260b-6: pa gang yin pa ni rdo rje rgyal po la
T02D2510-2:260b-7: sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'o
T02D2510-2:260b-9: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ni 'dod pa yin zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2510-2:260b-10: de nyid bde ba kun te /
T02D2510-2:260b-11: rtag tu bdag gi snying la gnas //
T02D2510-2:260b-12: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad sku dang /
T02D2510-2:260b-13: gsung dang thugs rdo rjes rtag tu bzhugs pa'i rnam
T02D2510-2:260b-14: par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin gyis de bzhin
T02D2510-2:260b-15: gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la 'khor ba ji
T02D2510-2:260b-16: srid kyi bar du bzhugs pa ni de nyid kyi
T02D2510-2:260b-18: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02D2510-2:260b-19: sems can gyi don gyi snying po ni sems can gyi don te /
T02D2510-2:260b-20: nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i theg par mos pa'i sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir nyan thos dang /
T02D2510-2:260b-21: rang rgyal ba'i theg pa ston pa dang /
T02D2510-2:260b-22: sems can gyi don byed pa zhes gang yin pa'o //
T02D2510-2:260b-23: de la 'dir do mtshar ba ci zhig yod ce na /
T02D2510-2:260b-24: skyo bar gyur pas gang 'dod smad //
T02D2510-2:260b-26: byang chub kyi sems chen po la sogs pa mngar
T02D2510-2:260b-27: zin yang sbas nas byang chub kyi sems chen po
T02D2510-2:260b-28: la sogs pa chags pa dang bral ba mi mnga'
T02D2510-2:260b-29: ba'i ngo bo la yongs su brtags nas /
T02D2510-2:260b-30: nyan thos dang rang rgyal gyi rigs can ni sems can gyi khams la nyan thos dang /
T02D2510-2:260b-31: rang rgyal ba'i lam gyi rang bzhin chags pa dang
T02D2510-2:260b-32: bral bar ston pa de ni ngo mtshar gang yin
T02D2510-2:260b-33: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems la
T02D2510-2:260b-35: ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir gyi don
T02D2510-2:260b-36: te las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig ni las
T02D2510-2:260b-38: mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:260b-39: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:260b-40: gang gi phyir byang chub sems la sogs pa'i rang
T02D2510-2:260b-41: gi rang bzhin 'di ni las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2510-2:260b-42: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya sgrub
T02D2510-2:260b-43: par byed pa las mi 'da' ba yin pa de'i
T02D2510-2:261a-2: bsgom par bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang yin zhe na /
T02D2510-2:261a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2510-2:261a-4: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:261a-5: pa lnga'i rnal 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting
T02D2510-2:261a-6: nge 'dzin te / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de 'dir bsgoms pa'o //
T02D2510-2:261a-7: bsgoms nas sangs rgyas mchod pa ni //
T02D2510-2:261a-8: zhes bya ba ni las kyi dam tshig de bsgom
T02D2510-2:261a-9: pa'i rnal 'byor pas mchod pa ni rtogs pa'i sangs
T02D2510-2:261a-11: dngos grub dam tshig thob par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:261a-12: zhes bya ba ni mchod pa 'dis sangs rgyas la
T02D2510-2:261a-13: mchod na las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i de
T02D2510-2:261a-14: bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dngos grub
T02D2510-2:261a-16: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:261a-17: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad
T02D2510-2:261a-18: pa'i rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor byas
T02D2510-2:261a-19: la / cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02D2510-2:261a-20: phyis las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2510-2:261a-21: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa thams
T02D2510-2:261a-22: cad kyis snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid yang dag
T02D2510-2:261a-23: par mchod la / yang de nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2510-2:261a-24: rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje la rang gi rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bkod nas /
T02D2510-2:261a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi
T02D2510-2:261a-26: rdo rje snying gar rnam par bsams te bsgom par
T02D2510-2:261a-27: bya'o // kun du bzang po bdag yin te //
T02D2510-2:261a-28: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D2510-2:261a-29: de nyid 'dod pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //
T02D2510-2:261a-30: sems can kun la bde sbyin pa //
T02D2510-2:261a-31: zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med
T02D2510-2:261a-32: pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi kun du
T02D2510-2:261a-33: bzang po 'dod pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa'i rnal
T02D2510-2:261a-34: 'byor pa la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
T02D2510-2:261a-35: pa'i bde ba de bskyed pa'i phyir /

T02D2510-2:267b-8: kun zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi khams dang sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin ni //
T02D2510-2:267b-9: bdag gi lus la gnas pa ste //
T02D2510-2:267b-10: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyang bdag nyid kyis
T02D2510-2:267b-11: de'i bdag nyid du rab tu zhugs pa'i sbyor bas
T02D2510-2:267b-14: sems dpa' bdag ces byin brlabs pas //
T02D2510-2:267b-15: zhes bya ba ni mngon du byas pa'o //
T02D2510-2:267b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag yin no //
T02D2510-2:267b-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid du bsgoms na 'grub
T02D2510-2:267b-19: par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas dngos
T02D2510-2:267b-20: grub 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2510-2:267b-22: snga ma bzhin mnyam pa'i thal mo dang /
T02D2510-2:267b-23: rdo rje thal mo dang rdo rje bsdams pa bcings pa dang /
T02D2510-2:267b-24: rdo rje bsdams pa dral ba dang /
T02D2510-2:267b-25: de nas dbab pa bskyed pa dang /
T02D2510-2:267b-26: rdo rje khu tshur gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:267b-27: bcings pa dang sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya bcings
T02D2510-2:267b-28: pa dang / rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje la rang gi lha'i snying po yid kyis bris la /
T02D2510-2:267b-29: de nyid brjod cing chos bdag med par bsgoms te /
T02D2510-2:267b-30: de nas rang gi lha'i snying po de nyid dang
T02D2510-2:267b-31: dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug las snying gar zla
T02D2510-2:267b-32: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsam par bya ste
T02D2510-2:267b-33: / de nas de'i steng du snying po de nyid dang /
T02D2510-2:267b-34: yi ge ka la sogs pa dang bcas pa la
T02D2510-2:267b-35: snga ma bzhin du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa
T02D2510-2:267b-36: bsam mo // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de
T02D2510-2:267b-37: nyid rang gi lha'i snying po dang bcas pa la
T02D2510-2:267b-38: rdo rje rtse lnga pa nyid rang gi lha'i mtshan
T02D2510-2:267b-39: ma'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:267b-40: de nas rang gi lha'i mtshan ma'i dbus su rang gi lha'i snying po rnam par bsams te /
T02D2510-2:267b-41: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya'i nga rgyal ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:267b-42: de nyid badzra satva aa ham zhes brjod pas rdo
T02D2510-2:267b-43: re sems dpa'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o
T02D2510-2:268a-1: bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor zhing /
T02D2510-2:268a-2: yang badzra satva aa ham zhes bsgoms la /
T02D2510-2:268a-3: de nas de nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i lha'i ngo
T02D2510-2:268a-4: bor bdag nyid snga ma bzhin du bsgom par bya'o
T02D2510-2:268a-5: // rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa'i bsgoms pa
T02D2510-2:268a-6: ni sngar de kho na nyid ston pa'i rgyud du
T02D2510-2:268a-7: // bshad zin to // sems dpa' ji bzhin rgya de bzhin //
T02D2510-2:268a-8: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rdo rje h'um mdzad
T02D2510-2:268a-9: la sogs pa nas rdo rje sems dpar gyur pa
T02D2510-2:268a-10: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i
T02D2510-2:268a-11: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang bya'o //
T02D2510-2:268a-12: ji ltar phyag rgya de bzhin bdag //
T02D2510-2:268a-13: ces bya ba ni ji ltar rdo rje h'um mdzad
T02D2510-2:268a-14: la sogs pa dang rdo rje 'bar ba la sogs
T02D2510-2:268a-15: pa'i phyag rgya rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i
T02D2510-2:268a-16: rang bzhin du bdag yin zhes gzugs dang tha mi
T02D2510-2:268a-17: dad par nga rgyal bskyed cing bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:268a-18: bsgom pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni //
T02D2510-2:268a-19: rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D2510-2:268a-20: de'i cho ga 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:268a-21: snga ma bzhin du sdig pa dral ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:268a-22: snying ga'i rdo rje 'bar ba la rang gi khro bo'i lha'i snying po rnam par bsams te /
T02D2510-2:268a-23: de nyid brjod cing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:268a-24: snga ma bzhin du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs
T02D2510-2:268a-25: pa'i rim pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D2510-2:268a-26: rang gi lha'i mtshan ma bskyod la /
T02D2510-2:268a-27: de'i dbus sus nying po bkod nas /
T02D2510-2:268a-28: sems dpa' ji bzhin rgya de bzhin //
T02D2510-2:268a-29: phyag rgya ji bzhin de bzhin bdag / ces bya
T02D2510-2:268a-30: bas phyag rgya dang lhan cig tu tha mi dad
T02D2510-2:268a-31: pa'i bdag nyid du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs
T02D2510-2:268a-32: pa bsgoms te / de'i rigs thams cad phyag rgya de las sprul la /
T02D2510-2:268a-33: gdug pa thams cad btul nas de thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gzugs de las bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:268a-34: chos kyi phyag rgya ni padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D2510-2:268a-35: de'i tshul ni rang gi lha'i mtshan ma'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:268a-37: rdo rje phra mo bsgom byas la /
T02D2510-2:268a-39: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje phra mo zla ba gsum bsgoms la /
T02D2510-2:268a-40: phyis chos kyi phyag rgya'i spyor pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:268a-41: gang gi phyag rgya de dag kun //
T02D2510-2:268a-42: sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02D2510-2:268a-43: zhes bya ba ni snying po'i phyag rgya'i sngags kyi
T02D2510-2:268b-0: rig pa @268b thams cad kyis rang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:268b-1: chen po las bshad pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor bsgom par
T02D2510-2:268b-2: bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:268b-4: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad
T02D2510-2:268b-5: pa'i rang gi lha'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgoms la
T02D2510-2:268b-6: snying ga'i phyag rgya la sngags kyi rig pa bzla
T02D2510-2:268b-7: bar bya'o // sangs rgyas kun la dbang bskur dang //
T02D2510-2:268b-9: rin po che'i cod pan gyis //
T02D2510-2:268b-10: sangs rgyas kun la dbang bskur ro //
T02D2510-2:268b-14: rin po che sna bdun po de dag nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa'o //
T02D2510-2:268b-15: dam tshig gi dngos grub rnams ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub bo //
T02D2510-2:268b-16: rdo re las rnams 'grub par byed //
T02D2510-2:268b-17: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kun la dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2510-2:268b-18: mchod pa'i dam tshig gi las rnams tha mi dad par bsgrubs pas /
T02D2510-2:268b-19: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i bdag yin no zhes nges par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:268b-20: de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi lha mo'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:268b-22: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:268b-23: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du lha'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma rnam par bsams la /
T02D2510-2:268b-24: phyag rgya'i dbus su bzlas pa'i yi ge bkod nas snying po brjod cing /
T02D2510-2:268b-25: bdag gi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su bsgoms la /
T02D2510-2:268b-26: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya de las nor bu'i rigs thams cad sprul te /
T02D2510-2:268b-27: des de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa sems can
T02D2510-2:268b-28: gyi khams thams cad dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te
T02D2510-2:268b-29: / mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod dang /
T02D2510-2:268b-30: nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du byas nas /
T02D2510-2:268b-31: phyag rgya de la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:268b-32: de nas phyag rgya'i gzugs de sems dpar byin gyis
T02D2510-2:268b-33: brlabs ba'i sbyor bas rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms la
T02D2510-2:268b-34: / gang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su
T02D2510-2:268b-35: yang bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni de
T02D2510-2:268b-36: kho na nyid ma yin pa la mos pa'i rnal
T02D2510-2:268b-38: gang zhig shin tu de kho na nyid la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni /
T02D2510-2:269a-2: sems dpa' byin gyis brlab pa'i sbyor ba tsam sngon du byas la /
T02D2510-2:269a-3: rang gi lha'i nga rgyal bskyed cing bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:269a-4: de la de kho na nyid la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
T02D2510-2:269a-5: gang gi tshe las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor bas
T02D2510-2:269a-6: rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i cho
T02D2510-2:269a-7: ga rgyas pa nas brtsam par bya ba'i tshogs thams
T02D2510-2:269a-8: cad thun bzhi'i sbyor bas nyin re zhing mtshan ma
T02D2510-2:269a-10: skye ba gzhan las goms pa'i mthus skyes bu'am 'ga'
T02D2510-2:269a-11: zhig dge ba'i bshes gnyen las thob pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2510-2:269a-13: thog ma brtsams pa nas bzung nas rgyun mi 'chad
T02D2510-2:269a-14: pa nyid du mtshan ma nye bar skye bar 'gyur
T02D2510-2:269a-15: ro // de dag gi stobs kyis phyag rgya bcings
T02D2510-2:269a-16: pa la sogs pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa
T02D2510-2:269a-17: med par bsgoms pas 'gyur ba 'di ni de kho
T02D2510-2:269a-18: na nyid la goms pa'i rnal 'byor pa yin te
T02D2510-2:269a-19: ro // / dang por lhag par mos pa tsam gyis ni ma yin no //
T02D2510-2:269a-21: de nyid dman pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2510-2:269a-22: lha la dmigs par 'gyur bas na //
T02D2510-2:269a-23: lugs ma la sogs dag pa la //
T02D2510-2:269a-24: gzugs brnyan rnal 'byor nye bar bskyed //
T02D2510-2:269a-25: sku'am ras ris mchod rten rnams //
T02D2510-2:269a-26: shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2510-2:269a-27: mngon sum du ni mthong ba na //
T02D2510-2:269a-28: de ni rdzogs pa yin par bshad //
T02D2510-2:269a-29: dkar dang ser po'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2510-2:269a-31: ngo mtshar bar ni 'gyur ba de //
T02D2510-2:269a-32: blo ldan gyis ni mkha' la mthong //
T02D2510-2:269a-33: blo ldan kha dog sna tshogs des //
T02D2510-2:269a-34: gang gis yid ni mtshon par bya//
T02D2510-2:269a-35: dkar po dge bar shes par bya //
T02D2510-2:269a-36: mi shes pa la nag por snang //
T02D2510-2:269a-37: chags can shin tu dman par bshad //
T02D2510-2:269a-38: shin tu dga' la de bzhin ser //
T02D2510-2:269a-39: sprin gyis non pa lta bu ni //
T02D2510-2:269a-40: mkhas pas rmongs par shes par bya //
T02D2510-2:269a-41: bdag nyid yongs su ngag pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2510-2:269a-43: / sems ni brtan par shes par bya //
T02D2510-2:269a-44: de ltar mtshan ma nyid rnams ni //
T02D2510-2:269a-45: sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i bde mchog gi //
T02D2510-2:269a-46: rdo rje rin chen chu skyes dang //
T02D2510-2:269a-47: sna tshogs lcags kyu nyi ma dang //
T02D2510-2:269a-48: ral gri go cha mda' gzhu dang //
T02D2510-2:269a-49: rin chen rgyal mtshan rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D2510-2:269a-50: 'khor lo mche ba de bzhin mgu //
T02D2510-2:269b-0: @269b bzhad pas gsungs pa khu tshur bcangs //
T02D2510-2:269b-1: sgeg mo de bzhin phreng ba mo //
T02D2510-2:269b-2: glu ma dang ni gar ma bdag / me tog bdug pa mar me dang //
T02D2510-2:269b-3: de bzhin dri chab la sogs tshogs //
T02D2510-2:269b-4: me tog kun dga' dri gtsang khang //
T02D2510-2:269b-5: dge slong de bzhin dge slong ma //
T02D2510-2:269b-6: dngos grub drang srong gnyen rnams dang //
T02D2510-2:269b-7: rgyal rigs skye bos bsngags pa dang //
T02D2510-2:269b-8: bu mo gzhon nus brgyan pa dang //
T02D2510-2:269b-9: chu bo rgya mtsho ne'u sing dang //
T02D2510-2:269b-10: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //
T02D2510-2:269b-11: rol mo sna tshogs brdung ba dang //
T02D2510-2:269b-12: shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs //
T02D2510-2:269b-13: shes pa'i sgra ni dri ma med //
T02D2510-2:269b-14: nyi zla'i dbyibs dang 'dra ba ni //
T02D2510-2:269b-16: nam mkha'i glog ni sna tshogs mtshungs //
T02D2510-2:269b-17: rnal 'byor pa la rtag tu skye //
T02D2510-2:269b-18: de dag thams cad rnam spangs pas //
T02D2510-2:269b-19: mtshan ma med cing 'grib pa med //
T02D2510-2:269b-20: rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs nas //
T02D2510-2:269b-21: rnal 'byor rtog pa med la gnas //
T02D2510-2:269b-22: de nas rnal 'byor pa de la //
T02D2510-2:269b-23: dga' ba rnam pa lnga bskyed de //
T02D2510-2:269b-24: skad cig thang cig rgyun dag la //
T02D2510-2:269b-25: de bzhin mthar thug 'gyur ba dang //
T02D2510-2:269b-26: chos rnams thams cad nges pas ni //
T02D2510-2:269b-27: sangs rgyas kun zhes rab tu grags //
T02D2510-2:269b-28: de la skad cig ma'i dga' ba ni //
T02D2510-2:269b-29: gang tshe skad cig re re sems //
T02D2510-2:269b-30: dmigs pa la ni gnas pa na //
T02D2510-2:269b-31: g-yeng ba 'gog ba med pas na //
T02D2510-2:269b-32: de phyir skad cig ces grags so //
T02D2510-2:269b-33: de la thang cig ces bya ba'i bar du dga' ba ni //
T02D2510-2:269b-34: gang tshe sbrang ma'i kha dag nas //
T02D2510-2:269b-35: sbrang rtsi 'byung ba myangs pa yis //
T02D2510-2:269b-36: rkang pa spyi bo'i mthar thug pa'i //
T02D2510-2:269b-37: lus la khyab par mnyam gzhag par //
T02D2510-2:269b-38: bkres dang nang 'byung bsal nas ni //
T02D2510-2:269b-39: de bzhin lus ni las rung dang //
T02D2510-2:269b-40: sems ni dmigs pa la chags nas //
T02D2510-2:269b-41: rtag tu brtan par gnas par 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:269b-42: de la rgyun du dga' ba ni //
T02D2510-2:269b-43: dga' bas mchi ma 'byung ba dag //
T02D2510-2:269b-45: mgu ba yi ni ting nge 'dzin //
T02D2510-2:269b-46: de ni rgyun zhes bya bar bshad //
T02D2510-2:269b-47: de nas mthar thug pa'i dga' ba ni /
T02D2510-2:269b-48: gang tshe dmigs pa la chags pa'i //
T02D2510-2:269b-50: de tshe dga' ba'i khyad par ni //
T02D2510-2:269b-51: don gzhan nye bar skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:269b-52: gang tshe lus la skyes pa'i rlung //
T02D2510-2:269b-53: lhag par rab tu zhugs gyur na //
T02D2510-2:270a-2: g-yeng ba skye bar mi 'gyur ba //
T02D2510-2:270a-3: de tshe rnal 'byor sems rig pas //
T02D2510-2:270a-4: srang mda'i tshul du sbyang bar bya //
T02D2510-2:270a-5: dge ba srung ba'i tshul du ni //
T02D2510-2:270a-6: ji lta ba bzhin nges par sbyar //
T02D2510-2:270a-7: de la chos thams cad du nges pa'i dga' ba ni /
T02D2510-2:270a-8: sos ka'i tsha bas gdungs pa yi //
T02D2510-2:270a-9: ji ltar lam du 'jug pa'i mi //
T02D2510-2:270a-10: gangs kyi chu ni len pa'i tshe //
T02D2510-2:270a-11: tsha ba'i dus kyis sdug bsngal te //
T02D2510-2:270a-12: gang zhig 'gog par byed pa ni //
T02D2510-2:270a-14: dga' zhing bde ba'i khyad par ni //
T02D2510-2:270a-15: yang dang yang du 'phel bar gzhag / rnam pa thams cad des pa na //
T02D2510-2:270a-16: chos rnams bla na med pa 'thob //
T02D2510-2:270a-17: lus ni shin tu spangs pa dang //
T02D2510-2:270a-18: nyon mongs gsum ni rnam dag pas //
T02D2510-2:270a-19: sam gtan dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02D2510-2:270a-20: gzugs rnams kyang ni bsags pa dang //
T02D2510-2:270a-21: sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang //
T02D2510-2:270a-22: mngon shes rnams ni 'byung ba dang //
T02D2510-2:270a-23: 'dod chags la sogs nyes pa che //
T02D2510-2:270a-25: dang po'i spyod pa la zhugs pas //
T02D2510-2:270a-26: 'grub 'gyur 'di ni the cho ma med / nyon mongs dgra rnams zhi phyir dang //
T02D2510-2:270a-28: rang lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas nas //
T02D2510-2:270a-29: de nas sbyin sreg brtsam par bya //
T02D2510-2:270a-30: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D2510-2:270a-31: bdag nyid rtag tu bsam par bya //
T02D2510-2:270a-32: de yi lus kyi snying ga las //
T02D2510-2:270a-35: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba dang //
T02D2510-2:270a-36: stong gsum rdul dang mtshungs pa yi ;
T02D2510-2:270a-37: / kha dog dkar po la sogs pa //
T02D2510-2:270a-38: bsdus nas lus la gzhug par bya //
T02D2510-2:270a-39: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ces su bshad //
T02D2510-2:270a-40: rgyas pa'i cho ga sems can rnams //
T02D2510-2:270a-41: mgu ba'i gzugs su bsam par bya //
T02D2510-2:270a-42: shin tu nyon mongs zhi ba'i phyir //
T02D2510-2:270a-43: khro bo'i gzugs kyi khyad par bya //
T02D2510-2:270a-44: rjes su chags pa bud med ni //
T02D2510-2:270a-45: sna tshogs gzugs can bsam par bya //
T02D2510-2:270a-46: las dang po pa'i sbyin sreg 'di //
T02D2510-2:270a-47: gtso bos sngar ni bstan pa yin //
T02D2510-2:270a-48: de ltar brtan par byas nas ni //
T02D2510-2:270a-51: de nyid bsams pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2510-2:270b-0: lha la dmigs par @270b 'gyur ba na //
T02D2510-2:270b-1: rnal 'byor rang gi dam tshig bdag / dam pa'i yi ge 'grub par 'gyur //

T02D2510-2:273b-30: lan bzhi brjod pas ga phur dang /

T02D2510-2:273b-39: mi dge ba'i rmi lam thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:273b-40: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po shes par 'dod na /

T02D2510-2:274a-2: stong phrag brgya bzlas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //

T02D2510-2:274a-6: stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //

T02D2510-2:274a-9: dkyil 'khor dkar po rnam par bsams na dug zhi

T02D2510-2:274a-21: // tsha ba'i rims sel bar byed do //

T02D2510-2:274a-34: skyes pa dang bud med kyi snying gar padma dmar
T02D2510-2:274a-35: po'i steng du padma bsgoms na dbang du byed do

T02D2510-2:275b-22: sbyor ba byas pa'i ras ris de la bzhugs su

T02D2510-2:276a-18: po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas

T02D2510-2:279b-35: bya'o // de nas ji lta ba bzhin du ras la bris te /
T02D2510-2:279b-36: zla ba gcig thun bzhi'i sbyor bas rang gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:279b-37: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:279b-38: de nas zla ba nya la ting nge 'dzin nyid
T02D2510-2:279b-39: kyis mtshan thog thag bzlas pa byas na mngon par
T02D2510-2:279b-40: shes pa lnga skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:279b-41: de ltar chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad kyi cho ga bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:280a-1: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yo byad kyi cho ga ni /
T02D2510-2:280a-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-2:280a-3: snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
T02D2510-2:280a-4: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang
T02D2510-2:280a-6: snga ma bzhin du bsdu ba la sogs pa phyag
T02D2510-2:280a-7: bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas
T02D2510-2:280a-8: / g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis khro bo'i rdo rje blangs te /
T02D2510-2:280a-9: lag pa g-yas pas snga ma bzhin du bzlas pa'i
T02D2510-2:280a-10: phreng ba bzung la sngar bshad pa'i cho ga las
T02D2510-2:280a-11: bshad pa'i yi ge 'bum bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:280a-12: de nas sngar bshad pa'i ras ris kyi mdun du
T02D2510-2:280a-13: rdo rje'i tshig gis rang gi rig pa stong rtsa
T02D2510-2:280a-15: nyin re bzhin du thun bzhi sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2510-2:280a-16: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas
T02D2510-2:280a-17: pa byas nas las thams cad la rig pa'i yi
T02D2510-2:280a-18: ge lan cig brjod pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:280a-19: de ltar rdo rje rigs kyi yo byad kyi rgyud bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:280a-20: da ni padma'i rigs kyi yo byad ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-2:280a-21: de nas dang po 'bum bzlas pa byas nas zhes
T02D2510-2:280a-22: bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-2:280a-23: po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas
T02D2510-2:280a-24: la / bsdu ba la sogs pa'i phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-2:280a-25: g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje padma blangs te /
T02D2510-2:280a-26: lag pa g-yas pas bzlas pa'i phreng pa bzung nas /
T02D2510-2:280a-27: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad
T02D2510-2:280a-28: pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas na sngon du
T02D2510-2:280a-30: de nas padma'i dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa'i thig btab la /
T02D2510-2:280a-31: ras kyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba /
T02D2510-2:280a-32: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su sangs rgyas padma /
T02D2510-2:280a-33: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su padma'i rgyal po /
T02D2510-2:280a-34: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su padma'i chags pa /
T02D2510-2:280a-35: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su padma'i legs pa /
T02D2510-2:280a-36: mtshams kyi char padma'i sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod
T02D2510-2:280a-37: pa'i lha mo rnam pa brgyad sngar bshad pa'i cho
T02D2510-2:280a-39: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02D2510-2:280a-40: ras kyi dbus su thur tshugs sangs rgyas bri ba
T02D2510-2:280b-0: de nyid kyi tshe mi bskyod pa'i @280b gnas su
T02D2510-2:280b-1: padma'i khro gnyer / rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su padma'i nyi ma /
T02D2510-2:280b-2: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su padma'i dpal /
T02D2510-2:280b-3: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su padma'i bzhad pa /
T02D2510-2:280b-4: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D2510-2:280b-5: ting nge 'dzin gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02D2510-2:280b-6: ting nge 'dzin padma'i dbus su 'dri ba'i tshe mi bskyod pa'i gnas su padma sgrol ma /
T02D2510-2:280b-7: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su padma rnon po /
T02D2510-2:280b-8: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su padma rgyu /
T02D2510-2:280b-9: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su padma'i gzungs bris la /
T02D2510-2:280b-10: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin du byas te /
T02D2510-2:280b-11: ting nge 'dzin padma'i ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02D2510-2:280b-12: dbus su bcom ldan 'das padma nges pa'i dbang phyug
T02D2510-2:280b-13: 'dri ba'i tshe mi bskyod pa'i gnas su padma gar
T02D2510-2:280b-14: gyi dbang phyug rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su
T02D2510-2:280b-15: padma bsrung ba / don yod par grub pa'i gnas su padma gnod sbyin /
T02D2510-2:280b-16: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su padma'i khu tshur bris la lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D2510-2:280b-17: padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02D2510-2:280b-18: de ltar ras la bris nas snga ma bzhin du
T02D2510-2:280b-19: rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas
T02D2510-2:280b-20: la / bsdu ba la sogs pa cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-2:280b-21: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2510-2:280b-22: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa brgyad dang /
T02D2510-2:280b-23: padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i
T02D2510-2:280b-24: mchod pa rnam pa bcu drug gis ras ris kyi
T02D2510-2:280b-25: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la yang dag
T02D2510-2:280b-26: par mchod la phyag bzhi byas te /
T02D2510-2:280b-27: zla ba gcig nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:280b-28: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:280b-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul
T02D2510-2:280b-30: ba byon nas ci 'dod pa'i mchog gi skabs 'byed
T02D2510-2:280b-31: par 'gyur ro // de ltar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i
T02D2510-2:280b-32: dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub
T02D2510-2:280b-33: pa'i yo byad kyi cho ga bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:280b-34: da ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:280b-35: las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yo byad kyi
T02D2510-2:280b-36: cho ga ni / ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang //
T02D2510-2:280b-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:280b-38: snga ma bzhin 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-2:280b-39: po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas
T02D2510-2:281a-1: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-2:281a-2: g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje padma blangs te /
T02D2510-2:281a-3: g-yas pas bgrang phreng snying gar bzung nas /
T02D2510-2:281a-4: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rig pa 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:281a-5: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i ras ris la
T02D2510-2:281a-6: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes
T02D2510-2:281a-7: su spyad nas / rdo rje chos ma bcings te
T02D2510-2:281a-8: rig pa stong rtsa brgyad du brjod cing nyin re
T02D2510-2:281a-9: zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig snga ma
T02D2510-2:281a-11: de nas zla ba nya la mthar mtshan thog thag chos kyi rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2510-2:281a-12: bzlas pa byas la nam langs pa na phyag rgya'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:281a-13: de nas phyag rgya bcings la ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul bar byed do //
T02D2510-2:281a-14: de ltar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:281a-15: las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yo byad kyi
T02D2510-2:281a-17: da ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:281a-18: las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod na yang
T02D2510-2:281a-20: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga
T02D2510-2:281a-21: ma bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-2:281a-22: po las bshad pa'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i rang gi
T02D2510-2:281a-23: lha'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-2:281a-24: g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje padma blangs te /
T02D2510-2:281a-25: lag pa g-yas pas bgrang phreng bzung nas /
T02D2510-2:281a-26: snga ma bzhin du chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i sngags 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:281a-27: de nas ji skad bshad pa'i ras ris kyi mdun
T02D2510-2:281a-28: du chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi
T02D2510-2:281a-30: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas chos kyi dkyil
T02D2510-2:281a-31: 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i sngags zla ba
T02D2510-2:281a-33: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D2510-2:281a-34: nam langs pa dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon
T02D2510-2:281a-35: du byed par 'gyur ro zhes rdo rje chos kyis
T02D2510-2:281a-36: gsungs so // de ltar chos kyi dkyil 'khor las
T02D2510-2:281a-37: bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i sngags dngos grub bsgrub pa'i
T02D2510-2:281a-38: yo byad kyi cho ga bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:281a-39: da ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:281a-40: las bshad pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i yo byad kyi
T02D2510-2:281a-42: ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na yang zhes bya ba gsungs so//
T02D2510-2:281b-0: @281b de bzhin du bzlas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
T02D2510-2:281b-1: snga ma bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:281b-2: chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor
T02D2510-2:281b-3: byas la / phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga
T02D2510-2:281b-4: rjes su spyad nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i las kyi
T02D2510-2:281b-5: dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi rig pa sngar
T02D2510-2:281b-6: bshad pa'i cho ga stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas
T02D2510-2:281b-7: na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:281b-8: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du chos kyi rdo rje ma bcings te /
T02D2510-2:281b-9: thun bzhi'i sbyor bas sbyor bas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la zla ba gcig tu bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:281b-10: mthar mtshan thog thag bzlas la de'i rjes la nam
T02D2510-2:281b-11: langs pa na las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro
T02D2510-2:281b-12: // de ltar padma'i rigs kyi yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:281b-13: da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho
T02D2510-2:281b-14: ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te zhes bya ba
T02D2510-2:281b-15: gsungs so // de la dang po kho nar zhes
T02D2510-2:281b-16: bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du don thams cad
T02D2510-2:281b-17: grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i rang gi
T02D2510-2:281b-18: lha'i rnal 'byor byas la phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i
T02D2510-2:281b-19: cho ga bsdu ba la sogs pa'i rjes su spyad
T02D2510-2:281b-20: gsungs so // nas / g-yon pa'i rin po che'i
T02D2510-2:281b-21: khu tshur gyis rdo rje rin po che blangs la
T02D2510-2:281b-22: gsungs so // nas / / lag pa g-yas pas bzlas pa'i bgrang phreng snying gar bzung ste /
T02D2510-2:281b-23: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las
T02D2510-2:281b-24: bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i sngags snga ma bzhin du
T02D2510-2:281b-26: de nas rin po che zur bzhi pa'i thig btab la /
T02D2510-2:281b-27: ras ris kyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa /
T02D2510-2:281b-28: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su nor bu'i mtshan ma /
T02D2510-2:281b-29: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rin chen rgyal po /
T02D2510-2:281b-30: don yod grub pa'i gnas su rin chen chags pa /
T02D2510-2:281b-31: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su rin chen legs pa /
T02D2510-2:281b-32: mtshams kyi cha rnams su sgeg mo la sogs pa'i
T02D2510-2:281b-33: mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad sngar bshad pa'i cho gas
T02D2510-2:281b-34: bri bar bya'o ; / don thams cad grub pa'i ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02D2510-2:281b-35: ras kyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das rin chen lta
T02D2510-2:281b-36: ba bri ba de'i tshe mi bskyod pa'i gnas su
T02D2510-2:281b-38: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rin chen nyi ma /
T02D2510-2:281b-39: don yod grub pa'i gnas su rin chen dpal /
T02D2510-2:282a-1: med pa'i gnas su rin chen bzhad pa bris la lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2510-2:282a-2: rin chen lta ba'i ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02D2510-2:282a-3: bcom ldan 'das rin chen padma dbus su 'dri ba de'i tshe /
T02D2510-2:282a-4: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po /
T02D2510-2:282a-5: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rin chen rnon po'o //
T02D2510-2:282a-6: don yod grub pa'i gnas su rin chen 'khor lo /
T02D2510-2:282a-7: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su nor bu gsung pa bris la /
T02D2510-2:282a-8: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te rin chen padma'i ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02D2510-2:282a-9: dbus su bcom ldan 'das rin chen char 'bebs 'dri
T02D2510-2:282a-10: ba'i tshe mi bskyod pa'i gnas su nor bu mchod
T02D2510-2:282a-11: pa / rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su nor bu bsrung ba /
T02D2510-2:282a-12: don yod grub pa'i gnas su nor bu gnod sbyin /
T02D2510-2:282a-13: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su nor bu khu
T02D2510-2:282a-14: tshur bris la lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te
T02D2510-2:282a-15: / rin chen char 'bebs kyi ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02D2510-2:282a-16: de ltar ras ris bris nas de nas bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho ga byas la /
T02D2510-2:282a-17: ras ris bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2510-2:282a-18: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad dang /
T02D2510-2:282a-19: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig ma bcu
T02D2510-2:282a-20: drug gis yang dag par mchod la phyag bzhi byas
T02D2510-2:282a-21: nas / nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor gyis stong rtsa brgyad zla ba gcig bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:282a-22: de nas bzla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas la /
T02D2510-2:282a-23: nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:282a-24: pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i
T02D2510-2:282a-25: byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byon nas
T02D2510-2:282a-26: dbang bskur ba byin par mdzad do //
T02D2510-2:282a-27: dbang bskur ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
T02D2510-2:282a-28: 'jig rten gyi khams der rig 'dzin gyi 'khor los
T02D2510-2:282a-30: de ltar don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-2:282a-31: po las bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi yo byad kyi
T02D2510-2:282a-32: cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:282a-33: da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni /
T02D2510-2:282a-34: ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang //
T02D2510-2:282a-36: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-2:282b-0: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po @282b
T02D2510-2:282b-1: las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la
T02D2510-2:282b-2: / phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su
T02D2510-2:282b-3: spyad nas g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje rin
T02D2510-2:282b-5: lag pa g-yas pas bzlas pa'i phreng ba snying gar bzung ste /
T02D2510-2:282b-6: nor bu'i rigs su bshad pa'i gzungs kyi rig pa snga ma bzhin du 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:282b-7: de nas bshad ma thag pa'i ras la bsdu ba
T02D2510-2:282b-8: la sogs pa'i cho ga byas la mchod pa rnam
T02D2510-2:282b-9: pa lnga dang / rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D2510-2:282b-10: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa rnam
T02D2510-2:282b-11: pa bcu drug gi phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod la
T02D2510-2:282b-12: phyag bzhi bya'o // de nas rdo rje dbyings las
T02D2510-2:282b-13: bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi
T02D2510-2:282b-15: rang gi gzungs kyi rig pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas shing /
T02D2510-2:282b-16: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig gi bar du bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:282b-17: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas
T02D2510-2:282b-18: pas de'i rjes la gang bsam pa thams cad kyi
T02D2510-2:282b-20: de ltar nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs bsgrub pa'i yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:282b-21: da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:282b-22: las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yo byad kyi
T02D2510-2:282b-24: ci ste nor bu'i ye shes bsgrub par 'dod na yang //
T02D2510-2:282b-26: nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad
T02D2510-2:282b-27: pa'i sngags kyi dngos grub ni nor bu ye shes
T02D2510-2:282b-28: so // gal te bsgrub par 'dod na yang sgrub
T02D2510-2:282b-29: pa po des de bzhin du rdo rje rin po
T02D2510-2:282b-30: che las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin ji lta bar
T02D2510-2:282b-31: rim bzhin du bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2510-2:282b-32: padma'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa po rnal
T02D2510-2:282b-33: 'byor pas snga ma bzhin du 'phags pa nam mkha'i
T02D2510-2:282b-34: snying po'i thugs ka'i rdo rje rin po che las
T02D2510-2:282b-35: 'byung ba'o // ting nge 'dzin ni don thams cad
T02D2510-2:282b-36: grub pa la sogs pa'i nor bu rin chen 'bebs
T02D2510-2:282b-37: pa'i mthar thug pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad
T02D2510-2:282b-38: pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs kyis go rims ji
T02D2510-2:282b-39: lta ba bzhin du pa ni yang nas yang du
T02D2510-2:282b-41: ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na /
T02D2510-2:282b-42: dngos po med pa'i nam mkha' las //
T02D2510-2:283a-1: ji ltar rin po che 'byung zhe na /
T02D2510-2:283a-2: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las so //
T02D2510-2:283a-3: nam mkha' de yang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam
T02D2510-2:283a-4: par rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'o
T02D2510-2:283a-5: // de bas na dngos po med pa'i nam mkha'
T02D2510-2:283a-6: rtog pa thams cad spangs pa las rin po che
T02D2510-2:283a-9: rnam par rtog pa las 'byung ba med par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:283a-10: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes de yang bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs shing /
T02D2510-2:283a-11: shin tu rnam par rtog pa med pa de'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:283a-12: rdo rje rin po che de las skyes pa don
T02D2510-2:283a-13: dam par yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan to
T02D2510-2:283a-14: // rin po che las byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:283a-15: gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir na rin po
T02D2510-2:283a-16: che'i rgyu las byung ba'i don thams cad grub pa
T02D2510-2:283a-17: la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar
T02D2510-2:283a-18: 'byung zhing skye ba yin zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2510-2:283a-19: // mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:283a-20: rdo rje rin po che ni don dam par ma
T02D2510-2:283a-21: skyes shing de yang med pa'i phyir de'i rigs kyang
T02D2510-2:283a-22: don dam par ma skyes pa de'i phyir nor bu'i
T02D2510-2:283a-23: rigs rnams sgyu ma dang mtshungs par bsgom zhing bzlas
T02D2510-2:283a-24: par bya'o // ji lta ba'i rim pa bzhin du
T02D2510-2:283a-25: zhes bya ba'i don bshad pa ni 'di nyid kyis
T02D2510-2:283a-27: ting nge 'dzin 'di'i dus bzhir bsgoms la /
T02D2510-2:283a-28: ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin du zhes bya
T02D2510-2:283a-29: ba ni phyag bzhi byas la stong phrag brgya bzlas
T02D2510-2:283a-30: par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to ;
T02D2510-2:283a-31: / gong du smos pa bzhin du zhes bya ba
T02D2510-2:283a-32: ni snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don yin
T02D2510-2:283a-33: no // de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2510-2:283a-34: stong phrag brgya bzlas pa byas pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D2510-2:283a-35: mdun gyi ras ris la snga ma bzhin du zla ba gcig tsam bzlas pa byas la /
T02D2510-2:283a-36: de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:283a-37: de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dbang bskur par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:283a-39: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
T02D2510-2:283b-0: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i @283b cho ga rjes su spyad de /
T02D2510-2:283b-1: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas /
T02D2510-2:283b-2: de'i sngags brjod cing 'di ltar bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2510-2:283b-3: dngos po med pa'i nam mkha' las rin po che ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur /
T02D2510-2:283b-4: rin po che las byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung zhes de ltar bsgoms nas /
T02D2510-2:283b-5: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis nor bu'i rigs kyi chos
T02D2510-2:283b-6: kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i sngags
T02D2510-2:283b-7: stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:283b-8: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du sngar bshad pa'i
T02D2510-2:283b-9: tshul gyis rang gi lha'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms te
T02D2510-2:283b-10: / nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:283b-11: de nas zla ba nya la mthar mtshan thog thag bzlas na nam langs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:283b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas /
T02D2510-2:283b-13: ci dga' ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes
T02D2510-2:283b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so
T02D2510-2:283b-15: ; / de ltar nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi
T02D2510-2:283b-16: dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yo
T02D2510-2:283b-17: byad kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:283b-18: da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:283b-19: las bshad pa ni de nas las kyi bsgrub pa
T02D2510-2:283b-20: bshad de zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2510-2:283b-21: de bzhin du bzlas la zhes bya ba ni snga
T02D2510-2:283b-22: ma bzhin du nor bu'i rigs su bshad pa'i phyag
T02D2510-2:283b-23: bzhi'i mthar thug pa kho na rjes su spyad la
T02D2510-2:283b-24: / g-yon pa'i rin po che'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje rin po che blangs la /
T02D2510-2:283b-25: lag pa g-yas pas bzlas pa'i phreng ba snying gar bzung la /
T02D2510-2:283b-26: nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i rig pa 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:283b-27: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:283b-28: thun bzhi'i sbyor bas nyin re zhing stong rtsa brgyad zla ba gcig bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:283b-30: zla ba nya la mthar mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:283b-31: de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das nam
T02D2510-2:283b-32: mkha'i snying po don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te
T02D2510-2:283b-33: / de'i rjes la rig pa rnams lan cig brjod pas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:284a-1: gshegs pa la sogs pa rigs thams cad kyi yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:284a-2: da ni snying po thams cad bsgrub par 'dod na yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
T02D2510-2:284a-3: rigs thams cad kyi zlos pa pos zhes pa'i sgra brjod la /
T02D2510-2:284a-7: rig pa bzlas par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:284a-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rigs thams
T02D2510-2:284a-9: cad kyi thun mong du 'gyur ba'i yo byad kyi
T02D2510-2:284a-10: cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-2:284a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs rnams kyi thun mong ni spyir ro //
T02D2510-2:284a-12: yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni shis pa'i sgra la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2510-2:284a-13: grub par gyur cig ces brjod la /
T02D2510-2:284a-14: snying po ci dgar zlos shing zhes bya ba ni snying po ni sems so //
T02D2510-2:284a-15: de ci dga' ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //
T02D2510-2:284a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni
T02D2510-2:284a-17: yang snying po bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:284a-18: pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur cig ces brjod la
T02D2510-2:284a-19: / snying po ci dgar zlos shing bsgrub pa'i cho ga bya'o //
T02D2510-2:284a-20: 'di skad du ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:284a-21: rigs su yang dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod na /
T02D2510-2:284a-22: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:284a-23: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang /
T02D2510-2:284a-24: byang chub sems dpa' nyid du gyur nas bsam pa
T02D2510-2:284a-25: thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i las kyi
T02D2510-2:284a-26: tshim zhing snying po 'dod pas da bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-2:284a-27: thams cad 'grub par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o
T02D2510-2:284a-28: // de nas rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i sngags bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:284a-29: de ltar spyi'i snying po'i yo byad bshad nas /
T02D2510-2:284a-30: rigs thams cad kyi thun mong ba nyid kyi phyag rgya'i yo byad gsungs pa ni /
T02D2510-2:284a-31: de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i yo byad cho ga ste zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-2:284a-33: snga ma bzhin du rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:284a-34: chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor
T02D2510-2:284a-36: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:284b-0: rang gi rigs kyi @284b gzungs kyi phyag rgya bcing ste 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:284b-1: phyag rgya thams cad bdag la dga' bar gyur cig ces smras la /
T02D2510-2:284b-2: de nas rang gi rigs kyi gzungs kyi rig pa bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:284b-3: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:284b-4: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs
T02D2510-2:284b-5: thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i yo byad
T02D2510-2:284b-6: gsungs pa ni / spros pa med pa'i tshig grub par gyur cig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:284b-7: rang gi rigs kyi de la spros pa ni rnam
T02D2510-2:284b-8: par rtog pa las byung bas na spros pa ste
T02D2510-2:284b-9: / ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa med ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:284b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2510-2:284b-11: gyis chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par rtog
T02D2510-2:284b-14: rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la ;
T02D2510-2:284b-15: snga ma bzhin du phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:284b-16: rang gi rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor la bshad
T02D2510-2:284b-17: pa'i rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te
T02D2510-2:284b-18: / spros pa med pa'i tshig 'grub par gyur cig ces brjod cing /
T02D2510-2:284b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bdag la bskyed par gyur cig ces smras la /
T02D2510-2:284b-20: de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor las smras pa'i rang
T02D2510-2:284b-21: gi lha'i sngags sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis bzlas par
T02D2510-2:284b-22: bya'o // de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams
T02D2510-2:284b-23: cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sngags
T02D2510-2:284b-24: kyi spyi'i yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan
T02D2510-2:284b-25: bya'o // nas / da ni de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-2:284b-26: la sogs pa la rigs thams cad kyi las kyi
T02D2510-2:284b-27: dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rigs gsungs pa ni /
T02D2510-2:284b-28: de la 'di ni rig pa'i yo byad kyi cho ga ste zhes bya'o //
T02D2510-2:284b-29: de la ma rig pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid ni mngon par zhen pa des mdongs par 'gyur ba'o ;
T02D2510-2:284b-30: / kye ma zhes bya ba ni snying brtse ba'o //
T02D2510-2:284b-31: khams gsum pa ni gnas pa'i sems can de dag blo la bzhag nas /
T02D2510-2:284b-32: kye ma sems can 'di dag ces bya ba smos so //
T02D2510-2:284b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang
T02D2510-2:284b-34: de yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-2:285a-1: 'od gsal ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'o //
T02D2510-2:285a-2: de ni rigs pa thugs su chud cing sdom par gyur to zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:285a-3: de la rig pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo
T02D2510-2:285a-4: sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor las
T02D2510-2:285a-5: bshad pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rnam par
T02D2510-2:285a-6: thar pa'i sgo'i rang bzhin de las 'byung ba'i rig
T02D2510-2:285a-7: pas dkyil 'khor yang dag par thugs su chud cing
T02D2510-2:285a-9: de sngo par gyur pa ni mngon sum du byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02D2510-2:285a-10: de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:285a-11: snga ma bzhin du rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:285a-12: chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor
T02D2510-2:285a-13: byas la / phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga
T02D2510-2:285a-14: rjes su spyad nas phyag rgya chen po bcings te
T02D2510-2:285a-15: byas la / / thugs rje chen po dang byams
T02D2510-2:285a-16: pa'i spyad kyis sems can gyi khams thams cad la
T02D2510-2:285a-17: byas la / / gzigs nas / sems can mgon
T02D2510-2:285a-18: med pa 'di dag thams cad ma rig pas mdongs
T02D2510-2:285a-19: par gyur pa'i khams gsum zo chun gyi rgyun ma
T02D2510-2:285a-20: lta bur 'khor ba des ji lta ba bzhin gyi
T02D2510-2:285a-21: 'od gsal ba de bzhin du rang bzhin gyis 'od
T02D2510-2:285a-22: gsal ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
T02D2510-2:285a-23: kyi sku'i lam gyi rig pa khong du chud cing
T02D2510-2:285a-24: sdom par 'gyur ba ma mthong ba rnams la bdag
T02D2510-2:285a-25: gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa
T02D2510-2:285a-26: khong du chud cing sdom par gyur par bya'o zhes
T02D2510-2:285a-27: bsams nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:285a-28: sems can 'di dag thams cad ma rig pas mdongs par 'gyur pa la /
T02D2510-2:285a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa thugs
T02D2510-2:285a-30: su chud cing sdom par 'gyur ba la bya'o zhes
T02D2510-2:285a-31: smras la / de nas rang gi rigs kyi las
T02D2510-2:285a-32: kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi snying pos
T02D2510-2:285a-33: lha mo'i tshogs rnams sprul la /
T02D2510-2:285a-34: sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-2:285a-35: la sogs pa'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du bskyed la
T02D2510-2:285a-36: / sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rig pa bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:285a-37: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi snying po dang /
T02D2510-2:285a-40: rig pa thams cad kyi spyi'i yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:285a-41: da ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sgra brjod cing /
T02D2510-2:285b-0: @285b de'i don gyis bdag nyid rang gi lha'i skur bsgom pa'am mdun du bsgoms la snying po dang /
T02D2510-2:285b-3: rig pa bzlas par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:285b-4: de nas zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi snying po dang /
T02D2510-2:285b-7: rig pa rnams kyi thun mong du rdo rje bzlas pa'o //
T02D2510-2:285b-8: rgyas par gsungs pa ni ci dga' ba nyid du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:285b-9: sbrid pa dang skyigs bu dang sgregs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:285b-10: skyil krung tha dad ci dga' ba nyid du bya'o //
T02D2510-2:285b-11: sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang /
T02D2510-2:285b-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D2510-2:285b-13: bzlas pa'i don du bsgrub par bya ba de ni
T02D2510-2:285b-14: bdag gam zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2510-2:285b-15: la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug
T02D2510-2:285b-20: rig pa rnams rang nyid zlos shing /
T02D2510-2:285b-21: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-2:285b-22: badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba'i don la sogs pas
T02D2510-2:285b-23: bzlas pa'i don shas nas bsgrubs la mngon par bya
T02D2510-2:285b-24: ba 'am / mdun du bsgom par bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:285b-25: de ltar byas na cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-2:285b-31: rig sngags rnams kyis bsgrub pa'i bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:285b-32: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs
T02D2510-2:285b-33: thams cad kyi thun mong gi bzlas pa'i cho ga
T02D2510-2:285b-35: de ni zlos pa po rnams spro ba bskyed par
T02D2510-2:285b-36: bya ba'i phyir bzlas brjod kyi 'bras bu brjod par
T02D2510-2:285b-37: bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i
T02D2510-2:285b-38: phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2510-2:285b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad
T02D2510-2:285b-40: kyi thun mong gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas
T02D2510-2:285b-41: phyir / par gsungs so // de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2510-2:285b-42: gang na gter yod pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2510-2:285b-43: pa snga ma bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil
T02D2510-2:285b-44: 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal
T02D2510-2:285b-45: 'byor byas la / phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-2:285b-46: rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma
T02D2510-2:285b-47: las bshad pa'i tshul gyis zla ba bzhir sngon du
T02D2510-2:286a-1: thag bzlas pa byas nas rdo rje gter la sogs pa'i sbyor bas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:286a-2: shing skyes de lta bur mthong na de na gter yod par shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:286a-3: gter dang gter gyi lha dang zhing skyod dang phyogs skyong rnams bcings la gnas der song ste /
T02D2510-2:286a-4: bdag nyid gnas der bcas pa bsrung bar byas nas /
T02D2510-2:286a-5: ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi lha de la
T02D2510-2:286a-6: phyi'i mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod
T02D2510-2:286a-7: de / phyag bzhi byas nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:286a-8: rdo rje gter yod pas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2510-2:286a-9: pa ni bsgrub pa'i snying po brjod cing gter gyi
T02D2510-2:286a-10: gnas der rdo rje lta bas bltas la /
T02D2510-2:286a-11: rdo rje 'bar ba lta bu mthong na de na gter yod par shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:286a-12: de nas langs la blang bar bya ba'o //
T02D2510-2:286a-13: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2510-2:286a-14: rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2510-2:286a-15: yang rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-2:286a-16: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-2:286a-17: rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod na chu'i
T02D2510-2:286a-18: steng nas phar 'gro ba la sogs pa yid kyis
T02D2510-2:286a-19: byas pas / de ltar na rdo rje dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:286a-20: de la rdo rje chu zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2510-2:286a-21: pa ni thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba bzhir de
T02D2510-2:286a-22: bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yo byad cho ga bzhin
T02D2510-2:286a-23: du bzlas la / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i

T02D2510-2:286a-31: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa

T02D2510-2:286a-33: no // phyag rgya bsgrubs na zhes bya ba snga
T02D2510-2:286a-34: ma bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-2:286a-35: po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas
T02D2510-2:286a-36: la phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su
T02D2510-2:286a-37: no // spyad nas / rdo rje 'dzin pa la
T02D2510-2:286a-38: sogs pa'i rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i gzugs su
T02D2510-2:286b-0: badzra bi dha ra zhes de skad du @286b lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:286b-1: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rig
T02D2510-2:286b-2: pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub kyi snying po 'di de
T02D2510-2:286b-3: bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yo byad kyi cho gas
T02D2510-2:286b-4: zla ba bzhir bzlas pa byas la de nas de
T02D2510-2:286b-5: bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ras ris kyi mdun du
T02D2510-2:286b-6: slar yang zla ba bzhir snga ma bzhin du bzlas
T02D2510-2:286b-7: pa bya'o // de nas zla ba nya la mtshan
T02D2510-2:286b-8: thog thag bzlas na de'i rjes la rdo rje rig
T02D2510-2:286b-9: 'dzin gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos grub tu 'gyur
T02D2510-2:286b-10: pa bya'o // ro // lhag ma ni go sla'o //
T02D2510-2:286b-11: de ni dngos grub chen po bsgrub pa ni /

T02D2510-2:286b-13: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:286b-14: chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor
T02D2510-2:286b-15: byas la / phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-2:286b-16: badzra satva zhes bya ba la sogs pa rang gi lha'i phyag rgya'i snying po lan gsum brjod cing /
T02D2510-2:286b-17: badzra badzra zhes kyang brjod la thams cad rdo rje
T02D2510-2:286b-18: la sogs pa'i gzugs su ting nge 'dzin gyi bdag
T02D2510-2:286b-20: badzra badzra zhes brjod cing dngos grub sgrub pa'i snying po dang /
T02D2510-2:286b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yo byad kyi cho gas zla ba bzhir bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:286b-22: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ras ris kyi mdun du yang zla ba bzhir zlos shing /
T02D2510-2:286b-23: de'i rjes la zla ba nyal mtshan thog thag bzlas
T02D2510-2:286b-24: na nam langs pa dang sems can phyag rgya'i gzugs
T02D2510-2:286b-25: su 'gyur ro // lhag ma ni go sla'o //
T02D2510-2:286b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:286b-27: da ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsungs pa ni /
T02D2510-2:286b-28: de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub ste zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-2:286b-29: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:286b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin

T02D2510-2:286b-32: 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal
T02D2510-2:286b-33: 'byor byas la / phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-2:286b-34: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-2:286b-35: chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi sngags kyi yi
T02D2510-2:286b-37: de nas dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs brnyan bzo bo mkhas pas byed du bcug la /
T02D2510-2:286b-38: de'i lto bar sngags de bcug ste /
T02D2510-2:287a-1: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-2:287a-2: de nas 'dod pa'i rgyal bos lha chen ji lta ba bzhin du bkug ste /
T02D2510-2:287a-3: khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams
T02D2510-2:287a-4: kyis kyang gzugs brnyan la ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2510-2:287a-5: dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang ;
T02D2510-2:287a-8: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2510-2:287a-9: ras ris kyi mdun du thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla
T02D2510-2:287a-10: ba gcig tsam gyi bar du stong rtsa brgyad zlos
T02D2510-2:287a-11: shing / rkang pa g-yon pas mnan par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:287a-12: de nas ji srid du zla ba nya la gzugs
T02D2510-2:287a-13: brnyan de skad 'byin par 'gyur ba de srid kyi
T02D2510-2:287a-16: phyag rgya bsgrub pa na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-2:287a-17: snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
T02D2510-2:287a-18: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang
T02D2510-2:287a-20: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyod de /
T02D2510-2:287a-21: rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02D2510-2:287a-22: snga ma bzhin du yi ge 'bru 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:287a-23: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du 'jig rten gsum
T02D2510-2:287a-24: las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcings
T02D2510-2:287a-25: te / nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas /
T02D2510-2:287a-26: stong rtsa brgyad zlos shing zla ba gcig gi bar du bya'o //
T02D2510-2:287a-27: de'i rjes la zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur te //
T02D2510-2:287a-28: de nas grub pa dang dbang bzhir gyur te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2510-2:287a-29: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-2:287a-30: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:287a-32: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du sgeg mo la
T02D2510-2:287a-33: sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-2:287a-34: pa thams cad la thun bzhi'i sbyor bas /
T02D2510-2:287a-35: ji srid du rtag tu mchod pa zla ba gcig gam gsum gyi bar du byas la /
T02D2510-2:287a-36: de nas mtshan thog thag mchod na bde ba dang
T02D2510-2:287a-37: yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par
T02D2510-2:287a-39: 'di ni dngos grub dam pa ste //
T02D2510-2:287a-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-2:287a-41: snga ma bzhin du rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2510-2:287b-1: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du stong rtsa brgyad zlos shing /
T02D2510-2:287b-2: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2510-2:287b-3: thun bzhi'i sbyor bas snga ma bzhin du zla ba gcig bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:287b-4: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag byas na /
T02D2510-2:287b-6: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:287b-7: de ltar rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:287b-8: da ni padma'i rigs kyi de la 'di dag ni
T02D2510-2:287b-9: padma'i dngos grub ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2510-2:287b-10: gsungs te / snga ma bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul
T02D2510-2:287b-11: ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas
T02D2510-2:287b-12: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-2:287b-13: phyag bzhi pa'i mthar thug pa'i rjes su spyad nas
T02D2510-2:287b-14: nang gi sngags snga ma bzhin du stong rtsa brgyad
T02D2510-2:287b-15: bzlas par bya'o // de nas ras ris kyi mdun
T02D2510-2:287b-16: du rang gi lha'i ting nge 'dzin gyis g-yon pa'i
T02D2510-2:287b-17: bsnyems pa dang bcas pas padma blangs la lag pa
T02D2510-2:287b-19: padma 'byed cing padma rab tu dmar ba bsgoms nas
T02D2510-2:287b-20: nyin re bzhin thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig
T02D2510-2:287b-21: tsam gyi bar du stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o
T02D2510-2:287b-22: // de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag
T02D2510-2:287b-23: bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang
T02D2510-2:287b-24: // / sems can mnyes par byed nus par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:287b-25: snga ma bzhin du dbang byed pas padma 'dod pa
T02D2510-2:287b-26: bsgoms shing zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bsgoms
T02D2510-2:287b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa sems can gyi
T02D2510-2:287b-29: khams thams cad bdag nyid kyis nor dang bcas pa

T02D2510-2:287b-32: sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs pa dang bsgrub pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:287b-33: de nas mtshan thog thag bzlas nas /
T02D2510-2:287b-35: thams cad bsrung ba nus par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:287b-36: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la ;
T02D2510-2:287b-37: padma'i 'dab ma 'byed pa'i tshul gyis bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu bsgoms la /

T02D2510-2:287b-39: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur
T02D2510-2:287b-40: ro // de ltar padma'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:288a-1: rigs kyi rnal 'byor de la 'di dag ni nor
T02D2510-2:288a-2: bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te zhes bya ba
T02D2510-2:288a-4: de la zhes bya ba la /
T02D2510-2:288a-5: snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil
T02D2510-2:288a-6: 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal
T02D2510-2:288a-7: 'byor byas la / phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho
T02D2510-2:288a-8: ga rjes su spyad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2510-2:288a-9: cad kyis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba ste /
T02D2510-2:288a-10: rang rang gis bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:288a-11: de nas thun bzhi'i sbyor bas bzlas pa 'bum byas la /
T02D2510-2:288a-12: ras ris kyi mdun du yang zla ba gcig bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2510-2:288a-13: zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas na dbang bskur ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:288a-14: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad spyad nas
T02D2510-2:288a-15: thun bzhi'i sbyor bas mar me'i snang ba de bzhin
T02D2510-2:288a-16: gshegs pa la phul nas bzlas pa 'bum bya'o //
T02D2510-2:288a-17: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du snga ma bzhin
T02D2510-2:288a-18: du thun bzhi'i sbyor bas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te
T02D2510-2:288a-19: / ji srid du zla ba gcig brtsam pa de srid kyi bar du bya'o //
T02D2510-2:288a-20: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas
T02D2510-2:288a-21: pas nam langs pa dang rin chen nyi ma dang
T02D2510-2:288a-23: snga ma bzhin du phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-2:288a-24: thun bzhir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyi rol gyi mchod pa dang /
T02D2510-2:288a-25: nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor chen po
T02D2510-2:288a-26: las bshad pa'i mchod pa bcu drug gis nam mkha'i
T02D2510-2:288a-27: khams bkang la / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:288a-28: sems can gyi khams thams cad la de rnams kyi
T02D2510-2:288a-29: nor bu'i rigs kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su
T02D2510-2:288a-31: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas ji srid 'bum
T02D2510-2:288a-32: yongs su rdzogs pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas
T02D2510-2:288a-33: par bya'o // de nas ras ris kyi mdun du snga ma bzhin du zla ba gcig bzlas la /
T02D2510-2:288a-34: mthar mtshan thog thag bzlas na bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:288a-35: snga ma bzhin du phyag bzhi bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-2:288a-36: rdo rje rin po che blangs te /
T02D2510-2:288a-37: rang gi lha'i sbyor bas 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-2:288a-38: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du snga ma bzhin zla ba gcig tsam byas la /
T02D2510-2:288b-0: mthar @288b mtshan thog thag bzlas na tho rangs kha rdo rje snying po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:288b-1: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs
T02D2510-2:288b-2: thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i
T02D2510-2:288b-3: rgyud bstan nas / da ni thabs med par snying po dang /
T02D2510-2:288b-6: rig pa rnams bsgrub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:288b-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin
T02D2510-2:288b-8: gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi rtog
T02D2510-2:288b-9: pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thabs kyi rgyud gsungs
T02D2510-2:288b-10: pa yin no // rtog pa yang yin la thams
T02D2510-2:288b-11: cad kyang yin pas na rtog pa thams cad ces
T02D2510-2:288b-12: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02D2510-2:288b-13: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni de dag gi thabs te /
T02D2510-2:288b-14: mngon sum du byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:288b-15: de'i dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa mngon sum du byed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:288b-16: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud de bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas bshad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:288b-18: zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang dang gang gis
T02D2510-2:288b-19: 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi khams kyi 'jig
T02D2510-2:288b-20: rten gyi khams de dang de 'dra ba'i don grub
T02D2510-2:288b-21: pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa'o //
T02D2510-2:288b-24: de'i dngos grub thob pa'i thabs so //
T02D2510-2:288b-26: de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste //
T02D2510-2:288b-28: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-2:288b-29: de'i dngos grub chen po kun gyi rgyur gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:288b-30: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs
T02D2510-2:288b-31: thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i
T02D2510-2:288b-32: dngos grub kyi thabs bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:288b-33: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs
T02D2510-2:288b-34: thams cad kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i
T02D2510-2:288b-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te ;
T02D2510-2:288b-38: de la gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor la chags pa dang bral ba ni sems phyir phyogs pa ste /
T02D2510-2:288b-40: rang sangs rgyas la mos pa dang /
T02D2510-2:288b-41: theg pa chen po la mos pa mdo sde spyod pa la sogs pa 'jig rten no //
T02D2510-2:289a-0: de ltar gyur ba'i 'jig rten chags pa dang bral ba de ni 'dul @289a * //
T02D2510-2:289a-2: / nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i lam bsgom pa dang /
T02D2510-2:289a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
T02D2510-2:289a-4: rnams kyang de'i mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'grub par
T02D2510-2:289a-5: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:289a-6: gzungs kyis 'dul ba'i 'jig rten rnams gzungs rnams la
T02D2510-2:289a-7: chags shing 'dod pa de las skyes pa'i phyag rgya'i
T02D2510-2:289a-8: dngos grub ni chags pa las skyes pa'o //
T02D2510-2:289a-9: chags pa las skyes pa'i dngos grub de'i thabs gang yin zhe na /
T02D2510-2:289a-10: de yi thabs ni bsgom pa de //
T02D2510-2:289a-12: gzungs kyi dngos grub thob pa ni gzungs sgom pa po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:289a-13: de ltar gzungs kyi dngos grub kyi thabs bstan nas /
T02D2510-2:289a-14: da ni rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub kyi thabs gsungs pa ni /
T02D2510-2:289a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-2:289a-17: 'jig rten gsum na spyod pa'i sems can gyi khams 'di dag bden pa las nyams pa'o //
T02D2510-2:289a-18: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i
T02D2510-2:289a-19: don dam pa'i bden pa de lta bur gyur pa
T02D2510-2:289a-20: las dngos por 'dzin pa'i mngon par zhen pa'i 'jig
T02D2510-2:289a-21: rten sngags kyi dngos grub kyi mi 'dod do //
T02D2510-2:289a-22: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o
T02D2510-2:289a-23: zhes bya ba'i bden pas bsgom pa ni rig pas
T02D2510-2:289a-24: 'dod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:289a-26: spros pa med pa'i thabs kyis ni //
T02D2510-2:289a-27: dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D2510-2:289a-29: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rigs thams cad
T02D2510-2:289a-30: kyi dngos grub kyi thabs ni gnyis su med pa

T02D2510-2:292b-14: / de dag brtags shing bris pa'i phyir tshogs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o //
T02D2510-2:292b-15: de ltar gyur bas na cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-2:292b-16: tshogs ni rdzogs par bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2510-2:292b-17: tshogs thams cad rdzogs pas na phyag rgya rnams kyi dngos grub chen po sangs rgyas nyid dang /
T02D2510-2:292b-18: byang chub sems dpa' nyid thob pa'i rgyu rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-2:292b-19: da ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rigs
T02D2510-2:292b-20: thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba la sogs
T02D2510-2:292b-21: pa'i tshul du zhes bya ba gsungs pa ni sangs
