T02D2510-2:292b-25: yang dag par zhugs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:292b-26: sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du lus dang ngag dang /
T02D2510-2:292b-27: yid las byung ba'i bsod nams gang ci yang rung
T02D2510-2:292b-28: ba de thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar
T02D2510-2:292b-29: bgyid do zhes ngag tu brjod cing rjes su yi
T02D2510-2:292b-30: rang ba de dang por byas pa'i lhag ma ni
T02D2510-2:292b-31: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba 'debs pa
T02D2510-2:292b-32: yin pas rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2510-2:292b-33: sgra brjod do // de'i tshul ni de bzhin du brjod do //
T02D2510-2:292b-34: de bzhin du dam pa'i chos bklag pa dang zhes
T02D2510-2:292b-35: bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

T02D2510-2:293a-6: de'i dngos po ni de kho na nyid de /

T02D2510-2:293a-15: thabs so // de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul las /

T02D2510-2:293a-17: zhes bya ba ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad
T02D2510-2:293a-18: pa'i rig pa rnams bzlas pas dngos grub thob po

T02D2510-2:293a-20: sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad
T02D2510-2:293a-21: kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad nas /

T02D2510-2:293a-23: ye shes kyi dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2510-2:293a-24: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin
T02D2510-2:293a-25: gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi mtshan
T02D2510-2:293a-26: ma 'byung ba ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud
T02D2510-2:293a-27: gsungs pa ni / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs rnams dang /
T02D2510-2:293a-31: sna tshogs rdo rje la sogs pa de dag ye
T02D2510-2:293a-32: shes gang las 'byung ba de ni rigs thams cad
T02D2510-2:293a-33: kyi mtshan ma 'byung ba'i ye shes so //
T02D2510-2:293a-34: de'i dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa mngon sum du byed pa'o //
T02D2510-2:293a-35: de ji ltar rdo rje 'byung zhe na zhes bya
T02D2510-2:293a-36: ba ni ye shes gang gis rdo rje la sogs
T02D2510-2:293a-37: pa bskyed pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:293a-38: de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste //
T02D2510-2:293a-39: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po ste /

T02D2510-2:293b-27: ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rnam par sgom
T02D2510-2:293b-29: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags so //
T02D2510-2:293b-30: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du grags pa la phyi rol
T02D2510-2:293b-31: du ni skyes bu'i gzugs su yin no zhes sems
T02D2510-2:293b-32: ni 'di la rdo rje rab tu gnas zhes bya

T02D2510-2:293b-38: gnas pa ston par byed pa yin no //

T02D2510-2:294a-8: de nyid kyi ni rgyal ba yin //

T02D2510-2:294a-19: mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan gcig tu 'gyur ba

T02D2510-2:294a-22: dpa' thams cad kyi sku'i ngo bo bskyed pa yin

T02D2510-2:294a-32: rdo rje sems dpa' kun 'byung ltar //
T02D2510-2:294a-33: rdo rje'i mtshan ma la sogs las //
T02D2510-2:294a-36: mtshan ma las ni sems dpa' che //

T02D2510-2:294b-27: rtag tu dga' ba bsgoms nas ni //

T02D2510-2:294b-31: yang dang yang mngon du byed cing /
T02D2510-2:294b-32: rtag tu dga' ba dang yid mgu bar sbyor bas na /

T02D2510-2:301b-29: / rdo rje bdag nyid ces bya ba ni sku dang /
T02D2510-2:301b-31: thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid gang yin
T02D2510-2:301b-32: pa de ni rdo rje bdag nyid de mtshan bdun
T02D2510-2:301b-33: yin no // sems dpa' 'byung ba zhes pa ni
T02D2510-2:301b-34: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de las skye
T02D2510-2:301b-35: yin no // ba'o // de'i don zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob dang ;
T02D2510-2:301b-36: don dam pa'i de kho na nyid kyi yin no //
T02D2510-2:301b-37: sems can rgyu zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:301b-38: khams gsum pa ni skyod pa'i sems can bskyed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:301b-39: tshul chen po zhes bya ba ni tshul yang yin
T02D2510-2:301b-40: la chen po yang yin pas na tshul chen po
T02D2510-2:302a-1: thob pa'i lam yin pas so //
T02D2510-2:302a-2: sems can don chen zhes bya ba ni rin po
T02D2510-2:302a-3: che'i rigs kyi rang bzhin gyi sems can gyi don
T02D2510-2:302a-4: 'di la mnga' bas na don chen no //
T02D2510-2:302a-5: dgos pa'i don 'di las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mchod
T02D2510-2:302a-6: pa'i ngo bo'i dgos pa las bya ba zhes bya
T02D2510-2:302a-7: ba ste / de nyid kyi don 'di la mnga' bas na dgos pa'o //
T02D2510-2:302a-8: sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sems dpa' ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin la /
T02D2510-2:302a-9: de'i steng gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la
T02D2510-2:302a-10: sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes brjod de mtshan bdun yin
T02D2510-2:302a-11: no // sangs rgyas chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ni sangs rgyas chos te /
T02D2510-2:302a-12: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D2510-2:302a-13: chos chen po zhes bya ba ni shes rab ye
T02D2510-2:302a-14: shes kyi ngo bos thams cad du song bas na
T02D2510-2:302a-15: chos chen po'o // chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya
T02D2510-2:302a-16: ba ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi ngo bo yin
T02D2510-2:302a-18: rab bskor ba zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems
T02D2510-2:302a-19: dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu rab tu
T02D2510-2:302a-20: bskor bas na rab bskor ba'o //
T02D2510-2:302a-21: smra ba che zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gsung
T02D2510-2:302a-22: ba'i ngo bos thams cad song bas na smra ba
T02D2510-2:302a-23: che'o / rang rig mchog ces bya ba ni rdo
T02D2510-2:302a-24: rje gsung ba'i ngo bos de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2510-2:302a-25: cad spros pa med pa'i chos la nges par sbyor
T02D2510-2:302a-26: zhing mchog yin pa'i phyir rang rig mchog go //
T02D2510-2:302a-27: sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni ngag gi
T02D2510-2:302a-28: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes kyis
T02D2510-2:302a-29: thams cad song ba'i phyir rdo rje gsungs ba'i ngo
T02D2510-2:302a-30: bo nyid ni sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02D2510-2:302a-32: / las chen zhes bya ba ni rdo rje las
T02D2510-2:302a-33: kyi ngo bos sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i las dang
T02D2510-2:302a-34: / sems can gyi don gyi las kyis thams cad du song bas na las chen po'o //
T02D2510-2:302a-35: bsrung ba che zhes bya ba ni phyir mi ldog
T02D2510-2:302a-36: pa'i ngo bo'i rdo rje bsrung bas phyir mi ldog
T02D2510-2:302a-37: pa'i brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo rdo rje bsrung ba
T02D2510-2:302a-38: yin pas na bsrung ba che'o //
T02D2510-2:302a-39: las rnams thams cad ces bya ba ni so sor
T02D2510-2:302a-40: rtog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo thams cad bsrung
T02D2510-2:302a-41: zhing skyong bar byed pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin
T02D2510-2:302a-42: no // las rnams thams cad rab sgrub byed //
T02D2510-2:302a-43: ces bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs
T02D2510-2:302b-0: kyis sems can @302b gdug pa can thams 'du la
T02D2510-2:302b-1: bar byed pas na rab bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2510-2:302b-2: bdag nyid chen po zhes bya ba ni 'khor gsum
T02D2510-2:302b-3: rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid can ni brtson 'grus
T02D2510-2:302b-4: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid rang bzhin
T02D2510-2:302b-5: 'di la mnga' bas na bdag nyid chen po'o //
T02D2510-2:302b-6: 'gro ba spod mchog ces bya ba ni 'gro ba
T02D2510-2:302b-7: rnams kyi spyod pa ni sems dpa'i spyod pa ste
T02D2510-2:302b-8: / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-2:302b-9: chen po la spyod pa de rnams las mchog tu
T02D2510-2:302b-10: gyur pas 'gro ba spyod mchog ste /
T02D2510-2:302b-11: sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing ba'i brtson 'grus kyi spyod
T02D2510-2:302b-12: pa de rnams las mchog tu gyur pas ni rdo
T02D2510-2:302b-14: sems dpa'i rgyu khyod ces bya ba ni rdo rje
T02D2510-2:302b-15: sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems dpa' de dag gi
T02D2510-2:302b-16: rgyu ni rdo rje khu tshur te /
T02D2510-2:302b-17: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba'i dngos grub bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:302b-18: pha rol phyin pa kun brnyes pa //
T02D2510-2:302b-19: zhes bya ba la pha rol tu phyin pa kun ni bcu drug go //
T02D2510-2:302b-20: thob pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa'o //
T02D2510-2:302b-21: thams cad mkhyen pa kun mkhyen to //
T02D2510-2:302b-22: dus gsum gyi don thams cad yongs su mkhyen pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:302b-23: sems so sor rtog pa las rtog pa'i phyir na ye shes so //
T02D2510-2:302b-24: mkhyen pa ni don thams cad yang dag par mkhyen pas na kun mkhyen pa'o //
T02D2510-2:302b-25: sems dpa' kun zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa
T02D2510-2:302b-26: na spyod pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin
T02D2510-2:302b-27: no // yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:302b-28: chos lugs su sprul pa mdzad pa'i phyir ni sems can kun no //
T02D2510-2:302b-29: thabs chen po 'di la mnga' bas na thabs chen po'o //
T02D2510-2:302b-30: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i ngo bos tha dad du song ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:302b-31: shes rab chen po khyod ces bya ba ni shes
T02D2510-2:302b-32: rab kyi chen po 'di la mnga' bas na shes
T02D2510-2:302b-34: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos mngon sum
T02D2510-2:302b-35: du mdzad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2510-2:302b-36: pa'i ngo bos tha dad du song ba'i phyir thugs
T02D2510-2:302b-37: rje chen po zhes bya ba ni chen po yang
T02D2510-2:302b-38: yin la thugs rje yang yin pas na thugs rje
T02D2510-2:302b-39: chen po ste / dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:302b-40: mchog gi mchog ces bya ba ni mchog rnams kyi mchog go //
T02D2510-2:303a-1: ldan pa rnams kyi nang na thugs rje chen po mchog yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-2:303a-2: thugs rjes zhes bya ba ni snying rje'i yon tan gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir thugs rje'o //
T02D2510-2:303a-3: thugs rje'i rang bzhin bdag nyid 'di la mnga' bas na thugs rje'i bdag nyid can yin no ;
T02D2510-2:303a-4: / thams cad gtong ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:303a-5: phyi dang nang gi dngos po yongs su gtong bas na thams cad gtong ba'o //
T02D2510-2:303a-6: byams pa chen zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-2:303a-7: dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa chen po 'di la mnga' bas na byams pa chen po'o //
T02D2510-2:303a-8: kun mdzad ces bya ba ni sems can gyi don kun mdzad pas na kun mdzad do //
T02D2510-2:303a-9: sh'akya seng ge zhes bya ba ni mi 'jigs pa
T02D2510-2:303a-10: bzhi dang ldan pas na seng ges 'jigs pa lta
T02D2510-2:303a-11: bu mi mnga' bas na seng ge'o //
T02D2510-2:303a-12: sh'akya che zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i rigs kyi skye ba yongs su bzung bas na sh'akya'o //
T02D2510-2:303a-13: sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba ni sh'akya rnams thub pas na sh'akya thub pa ste ;
T02D2510-2:303a-14: lus dang ngag dang yid thub pa dang ldan pas na thub pa che'o //
T02D2510-2:303a-15: 'dul chen po zhes bya ba ni 'dis sems can 'dul byed pas na 'dul ba ste /
T02D2510-2:303a-16: 'dul ba yang yin la chen po yin pas na 'dul ba che'o //
T02D2510-2:303a-17: sems can 'dul bar byed pas na tham cad du khyab pa yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-2:303a-18: khyab pa po zhes bya ba ni brtan pa dang
T02D2510-2:303a-19: g-yo ba'i dngos po bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir
T02D2510-2:303a-20: khyab bdag go // 'gro don zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-2:303a-21: drang ba'i don du gsungs pas na 'gro don no
T02D2510-2:303a-22: khyab bdag go // // 'dul byed du nges pa
T02D2510-2:303a-23: de rnams la mchog tu gyur pas na 'dul mchog
T02D2510-2:303a-24: khyab bdag go // // go // brgyad chos dbyings
T02D2510-2:303a-25: zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs
T02D2510-2:303a-26: pa'i sems ni chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D2510-2:303a-27: mnyam brnyes zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa ste /
T02D2510-2:303a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum ste /
T02D2510-2:303a-29: byed pa ni mnyam par brnyes pa'o //
T02D2510-2:303a-30: chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin nyid chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D2510-2:303a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams
T02D2510-2:303a-32: cad kyi de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni de bzhin
T02D2510-2:303a-33: gshegs pa'o // rdo rje mgon po zhes bya ba
T02D2510-2:303a-34: ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de dag
T02D2510-2:303a-35: gi bdag gi bde ba chen po'o //
T02D2510-2:303b-0: chen po yang yin la mgon po yang @303b yin pas na mgon po chen po ste /
T02D2510-2:303b-1: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D2510-2:303b-2: sems can tshogs zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang
T02D2510-2:303b-3: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems can gyi gzugs su
T02D2510-2:303b-4: bzung nas bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:303b-5: 'od chen po 'di la mnga' bas na 'od chen te /
T02D2510-2:303b-6: nam mkha' thams cad 'od kyis khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:303b-7: snang ba che zhes bya ba ni snang ba chen
T02D2510-2:303b-8: po 'di la mnga' bas na snang ba che ste
T02D2510-2:303b-9: / rdo rje nyi ma ye shes kyi nyi ma'i
T02D2510-2:303b-10: snang bas phyi nang gi mun pa dang bcas pa
T02D2510-2:303b-11: gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:303b-12: brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus
T02D2510-2:303b-13: chen po 'di la mnga' bas na brtson 'grus chen
T02D2510-2:303b-14: po ste / byang chub chen po yongs su sbyong
T02D2510-2:303b-15: ba'i brtson 'grus de thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir
T02D2510-2:303b-16: po ste / ro // stobs che zhes bya ba
T02D2510-2:303b-17: ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i chen po 'di
T02D2510-2:303b-18: la mnga' bas na stobs chen po'o //
T02D2510-2:303b-19: dpa' chen po ni yin pas na dpa' chen po ste /
T02D2510-2:303b-20: so sor rtog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin rdo
T02D2510-2:303b-21: rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs bdud bzhi las rgyal ba'i
T02D2510-2:303b-22: phyir ro // rab dpa' mchog ces bya ba ni
T02D2510-2:303b-23: shin tu dpa' bas na rab tu dpa' ba ste
T02D2510-2:303b-24: phyir ro // / de dag gi rab dga' mchog go //
T02D2510-2:303b-25: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sku nan tan du
T02D2510-2:303b-26: byed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin rdo rje khu
T02D2510-2:303b-27: tshur gzugs kyi khams na spyod pa'i bag chags dang
T02D2510-2:303b-28: bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa rtsad nas 'don pa'i phyir
T02D2510-2:303b-29: bde spyod ces bya ba la /
T02D2510-2:303b-30: bde ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde chen po'o //
T02D2510-2:303b-31: de'i bdag nyid du myong zhing spyod pas na bde spyod de //
T02D2510-2:303b-32: dpa' ba khyed ces bya ba ni dpa' ba gzi brjid can te /
T02D2510-2:303b-33: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma rgyal pos thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o //
T02D2510-2:303b-34: tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni tshangs pas 'dul ba rnams la de'i gzugs ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-2:303b-35: rang byung zhes bya ba ni slob dpon med par
T02D2510-2:303b-36: thams cad mkhyen pas mkhyen zhing rtogs pa'i phyir bsod
T02D2510-2:303b-37: nams ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pas bcom ldan
T02D2510-2:303b-39: de 'di la mnga' bas na bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D2510-2:303b-40: sh'akya'i dpa' bo thub chen po //
T02D2510-2:303b-41: zhes bya ba ni sh'akya rnams la dpa' bas na sh'akya'i dpa' bo ste /
T02D2510-2:303b-42: phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi chos so //
T02D2510-2:304a-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams las khyad par du gyur pas na thub pa che'o //
T02D2510-2:304a-3: kun bdag che zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams
T02D2510-2:304a-4: cad kyi chos kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir kun
T02D2510-2:304a-5: bdag go // thub pa zhes bya ba ni gdul
T02D2510-2:304a-6: bya rnams la thub pa'i gzugs bstan pas thub pa'o
T02D2510-2:304a-7: bdag go // // dag pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-2:304a-8: las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pas dag
T02D2510-2:304a-9: bdag go // // pa'o // chos rgyal khyod la
T02D2510-2:304a-10: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi chos kyi
T02D2510-2:304a-11: rgyal srid thob pa'i phyir na /
T02D2510-2:304a-14: nam mkha' sku ste zhes bya ba ni don dam
T02D2510-2:304a-15: par gzugs kyi sku med pas na de de bzhin
T02D2510-2:304a-16: nyid kyis gzugs dang sems can med pa'i sku la
T02D2510-2:304a-17: nam mkha'i sku zhes bya ste sku med pa'o //
T02D2510-2:304a-18: sku'i mchog ces bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi
T02D2510-2:304a-19: ngo bo'i sku la mchog tu gyur pas na sku
T02D2510-2:304a-20: gsum zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang
T02D2510-2:304a-22: chos kyi sku dang ldan pa'i phyir sku gsum mo //
T02D2510-2:304a-23: sku min bsgom pa'i zhes bya ba ni ji skad
T02D2510-2:304a-24: du bshad pa'i sku gsum chos bdag med pa'i lam
T02D2510-2:304a-25: gyis bsgoms pas snang ba med pa'i phyir na sku
T02D2510-2:304a-26: min bsgoms pa'o // kun gyi sku zhes bya ba
T02D2510-2:304a-27: ni ngo bo nyid du rnam par smin pa dang
T02D2510-2:304a-28: min bsgoms pa'o // / longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2510-2:304a-29: sprul pa'i sku'i gzugs kyi sku yin pa'i phyir kun gyi sku'o //
T02D2510-2:304a-30: sku che ba zhes bya ba ni skus nam mkha' khyab pas na sku che'o //
T02D2510-2:304a-31: rdo rje sku zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse
T02D2510-2:304a-32: lnga pa la sogs pa gzugs su gnas pa'i phyir
T02D2510-2:304a-33: rdo rje sku'o // mtshan bdun yin no ;
T02D2510-2:304a-34: / gsung min gsung ste zhes bya ba ni sgra
T02D2510-2:304a-35: brnyan dang mtshungs par gsung par mdzad pas na gsung
T02D2510-2:304a-36: min gsung ngo // gsung gi mchog ces bya ba
T02D2510-2:304a-37: ni ngag gi spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i
T02D2510-2:304a-38: ye shes ni gsung gi mchog go //
T02D2510-2:304a-39: gsung gsum gsung min ston pa po //
T02D2510-2:304a-40: zhes bya ba ni sku dang /
T02D2510-2:304a-42: thugs kyi gsang ba rnam pa gsum sgra brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i gsung ston pa'o //
T02D2510-2:304a-43: sgra yis gsum gsung med par ston pa po ni 'chad pa'o //
T02D2510-2:304a-44: kun gsung zhes bya ba ni ji ltar smos pa'i
T02D2510-2:304a-45: sems can gyi khams la skad sna tshogs pas skad
T02D2510-2:304b-0: @304b re res chos ston pa ni kun gsung pa'o
T02D2510-2:304b-1: // shin tu gsung ba che ba zhes bya ba
T02D2510-2:304b-2: ni gsung gis nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pa'i
T02D2510-2:304b-3: phyir na shin tu gsung che'o //
T02D2510-2:304b-4: rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba ni aom dang sv'a h'a gsung las ma 'das pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2510-2:304b-5: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la de gsungs pa'i phyir rdo rje gsung ste /
T02D2510-2:304b-7: sems min sems zhes bya ba sems min chos kyi dbyings te /
T02D2510-2:304b-8: de nyid kyi sems 'di la mnga' bas sems can sems so //
T02D2510-2:304b-9: sems can gyi mchog ces bya ba ni sems de
T02D2510-2:304b-10: nyid sems kyi ngo bos sems thams cad las phul
T02D2510-2:304b-11: du byung bas na sems kyi mchog go //
T02D2510-2:304b-12: sems gsum sems min ston pa po //
T02D2510-2:304b-14: sems rtse gcig ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang /
T02D2510-2:304b-15: gnyis pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang /
T02D2510-2:304b-16: sems gsum pa ni mig dang /
T02D2510-2:304b-21: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D2510-2:304b-22: de dag bdag med pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-2:304b-23: sems gsum sems min ston pa'o //
T02D2510-2:304b-24: thams cad sems zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i sems can thams cad de /
T02D2510-2:304b-25: bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin dug sal bas na thams cad de /
T02D2510-2:304b-27: sems dpa' che zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phra
T02D2510-2:304b-28: mo'i gzugs su yongs su brtags pa'i sems can gyi
T02D2510-2:304b-29: khams thams cad khyab pas na sems che'o //
T02D2510-2:304b-30: rdo rje sems zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse
T02D2510-2:304b-31: lnga par yongs su brtags pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin
